solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para pagar la reparación de un vehículo que tiene, ya que es muy necesario para hacer sus compras y ventas del negocio de bordados de blusas que tiene, quiere que su negocio siga generando mas ganancias.
texts.en:
Señora Maria Angelica is single and she is 29 years old. She completed her sixth year of primary education. She embroiders blouses for a living. She started doing this job with the help of a family member and so far she has three years experience.

She is requesting a loan that she will use to pay for repairs to a vehicle she has, as this is a necessary part of making the purchases and sales for her blouse embroidery business. She wants her business to continue making more profits.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her car

loans.name: Zarine

texts.en:
Zarine is 32 years old. She lives in Sisian with her husband, son and mother-in-law. 

Zarine cultivates potato and corn on her land. She also keeps a greenhouse. Zarine needs to repair the greenhouse, as current conditions are not favorable for a good harvest. 

Besides this, she wants to purchase seeds to cultivate the land and fuel for agricultural practices. With the help of this loan, Zarine plans to increase her income by 40%, which is important for her to ensure the improved living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to pay for seeds, fuel and greenhouse renovation

loans.name: C5693 Mfashakwifasha Group

texts.en:
Josee is 27 years old. She is married and has one child, who is two years old. 

Her business is well-organized. She sells sacks of charcoal and works from 6am until 6pm every day. Josee is the team leader of this group, which is called "C5693 Mfashakwifasha" in the local language. She is the first person on the righthand side. 

Josee has requested a loan from Kiva lender Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell. With this profit, she will pay her children's school fees, renovate her house and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Flor Alba

texts.es:
Flor es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y dedicada al bienestar de su familia. Flor se encuentra casada y es madre de 4 hijos, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer todo lo que necesitan. Flor se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a las actividades agropecuarias, pero siempre lo había hecho trabajando para empresas. Hace aproximadamente 3 años Flor decidió independizarse y montar su propio cultivo de legumbres. Gracias a esto Flor genera ingresos con los cuales contribuye junto con su esposo al sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Flor, con el ánimo de sacar sus cultivos adelante, busca un préstamo que le permita acceder a la compra de riegos y abonos para sus cultivos. 

Flor espera poder sacar adelante sus cultivos y poder así generar más ingresos para su familia, además, espera poder obsequiarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y una buena educación. Flor sueña con que su cultivo crezca y pueda convertirse en una gran comercializadora de legumbres, en la cual pueda generar mucho empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Flor is known for being a very hard worker and dedicated to her family's well-being.  She is married and the mother of four children for whom she has always tried to provide the best she could.  Flor has spent much of her life involved in agriculture, but always working for companies.  Approximately three years ago she decided to become independent and set up her own vegetable growing business.  This has allowed her to generate an income to help her husband cover household expenses.  In order to grow her crops successfully, Flor is seeking a loan to pay for irrigation and fertilizer.

Through her crops, Flor is hoping to generate more income for her family and also give her children a better lifestyle and a good education.  Flor's goal is to see her crop business grow so she can become a large vegetable merchant and generate employment for those who need it most.

loans.use: To pay for irrigation and fertilizer for crops.

loans.name: Everilda Azucel

texts.es:
La señora Everilda Azucel es casada, tiene 30 años de edad, cursó sus estudios de educación básica, tiene 2 hijos 1 de los cuales estudian, se dedica a la artesanía, al tejido de cortes típicos, inicio este negocio siendo operaria, y hasta ahora lleva 2 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien la apoya económicamente.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferente clases y colores para mejora su producción de cortes típicos, espera en el futuro tener una negocio grande.
texts.en:
Everilda Azucel is 30 years old and married.  She completed her primary education and has two children, one of whom is in school.  Everilda works making handicrafts.  She weaves traditional clothing.  She started out in this business as a worker and now has two years experience.  She has the support of her husband who supports her financially.

Everilda is requesting a loan to buy different type of threads in different colors so that she can improve her production of traditional clothing.  She hopes, in the future, to have a large business.

loans.use: to buy threads for her weaving

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare parts for vehicles.

loans.name: Juan Pedro

texts.es:
El señor Juan Pedro es casado, tiene 49 años de edad, cursó los estudios de educación primaria, tiene 8 hijos 5 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, inicio este negocio gracias apoyo de sus padres y hasta el momento lleva 20 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferentes clases y colores, espera tener en el futuro un  negocio amplio, y mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Juan Pedro is 49 years old and married.  He completed his 'educación primaria' (education for children aged 7-14).  Juan Pedro has eight children, five of whom are in school.  His business is weaving traditional clothing.  He started this business thanks to the support of his parents and he now has 20 years experience.

Juan Pedro is requesting a loan to buy different types of thread in different colors.  He hopes to have a large business in the future and to improve his profits.

loans.use: to buy threads for his weaving

loans.name: C9369 Abishyizehamwe Group

texts.en:
Immaculee is 48 years old and is married with four children between the ages of four and six years old. 

She sells spare parts. Her business is well organized. She employs one person to help her and works from 6am until 6pm every day. Immaculee has three years of experience in this business. She is the president of this group which is called "C9369 Abishyizehamwe" in the local language. 

Immaculee has requested a loan from Kiva lender, Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase more spare parts to sell. With the profit from the loan, Immaculee will renovate her house and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase more goods, such as rice, soap, sugar, Irish potatoes and beans to sell.

loans.name: C8056 Twivanemubukene Group

texts.en:
Viviane is 35 years old and married with five children between the ages of two and twelve years old. 

She sells sacks of charcoal and her business is open from 8 am until 6 pm every day. She currently employs two people to help her. 

Viviane is the leader of the group, which is called "C8056 Twivanemubukene" in the local language. In the photo, she is the person on the left side. She has a year's worth of experience. 

Viviane has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell. With this profit, she will save money for her future, reinvest in her business and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Emilsen De Jesus

texts.es:
Emilsen es una persona que ha atravesado muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo sus ganas de trabajar y salir adelante le ha permitido superarlas y continuar su vida junto a sus hijos. Emilsen es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijos debido a que el padre de sus hijos murió hace aproximadamente 3 años. Desde entonces, Emilsen es la que debe buscar todos los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Emilsen se dedica desde hace 10 años a la elaboración de bolsos, actividad que aprendió cuando en una empresa confeccionaba zapatos y aprendió a utilizar las máquinas de coser. Emilsen decidió independizarse y montó su propio taller de confección donde elabora bolsos y gracias a su buena calidad los vende a una buena cantidad de clientes. Emilsen actualmente tiene muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes, hasta el punto en que a veces no puede atender todos los pedidos por la poca capacidad de producción que tiene. Con el ánimo de mejorar esta situación, Emilsen busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina plana para poder hacer su trabajo más industrializado y aumentar su productividad.

Emilsen espera poder cumplir todos los pedidos de todos los clientes con la compra de esta máquina, ya que realizará su trabajo más industrializado y demorará menos. Emilsen sueña que con mayores ingresos sus hijos puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y poder acceder a una educación de calidad que los prepare para en un futuro obtener un empleo bien remunerado.
texts.en:
Emilsen has encountered many adversities in her life but through hard work has been able to overcome them and get on with life together with her children.  She is a single mother and head of household, with two children whose father passed away approximately three years ago.  Since then, Emilsen must seek ways to generate enough income to cover household expenses.  For ten years she has been making bags which she learned how to do while working for a shoe manufacturer where she also learned to use a sewing machine.  She decided to establish herself independently and set up her own sewing shop where she makes bags.  Because of the good quality of her products she has many customers.  

Emilsen now has so many orders that sometimes she cannot fill them because of lack of production capacity.  In order to improve her situation, Emilsen is seeking a loan to buy an overlock sewing machine so she can industrialize her work and increase production.

She is hoping to fill all her orders with this machine, since she will be able to speed up production.  Emilsen hope to generate more income so her children can have a better lifestyle and access to a good education so they can find well paid jobs in the future.

loans.use: To buy an overlock sewing machine to increase productivity.

loans.name: Clara Isabel

texts.es:
Clara es una emprendedora que siempre ha tenido la fortaleza de superar las dificultades que le ha presentado la vida y salir adelante junto a su hijo. Clara es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 1 hijo de 7 años debido a que el padre de su hijo los abandonó hace un tiempo sin hacer alguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento. Clara se dedica a la confección a terceros y gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos y la buena atención que presta es muy reconocida entre las personas de su región. Clara actualmente tiene la motivación de empezar a confeccionar su propia línea de productos, ya que aprendió de diseño en un curso que tomó hace unos días. Con el ánimo de poder llevar esto a cabo, Clara espera que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina plana y una máquina recubridora y telas para llevar a cabo la elaboración de su línea propia de prendas de vestir.

Clara espera poder llevar esto a cabo y emplear a más personas de las que emplea ahora, pues actualmente genera 2 puestos de trabajo para madres en la misma condición que ella. Clara sueña con tener un gran taller y poder abrir un almacén para vender su línea propia, además de seguir vendiendo a grandes cantidades a diferentes clientes. Clara espera que su hijo pueda tener una mejor calidad de vida y el acceso a una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Clara is an entrepreneur who has always shown great strength in overcoming the difficulties she has encountered in her life, and in getting by with her son. Clara is a single mother in charge of providing for her 7 year old son as his father abandoned them a long time ago without making any financial contribution to their upkeep. Clara is a dressmaker and, owing to the quality of the garments she produces and the care she takes in doing so, she is well-known among people in her area. Currently, Clara wishes to begin manufacturing her own line of products as she completed a course in design a few days ago. With this aim in mind, Clara hopes that a loan will allow her to buy a flat-bed sewing machine, an over-locking machine and fabrics to manufacture her own line of clothing.

Clara hopes to be able to achieve all of this and to employ more people than she currently does, as to date she has created 2 posts for mothers in a similar situation to her own. Clara dreams of having a large workshop and being able to open a department store to sell her own clothing line. Furthermore, she hopes to continue selling a large quantity of items to different clients. Clara hopes that her son will have a better quality of life and access to a better education.

loans.use: To buy a flat-bed sewing machine, an over-locking machine and fabrics for manufacturing her own line of clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Agustina Paulina

texts.es:
La señora Agustina Paulina es casada, tiene 27 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educacion primaria, tiene 2 hijos pequeños, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, inicio este negocio gracias a su familia, lleva 10 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de varios colores y clase y poder mejorar su producción de tejido, espera seguir teniendo un negocio prospero.
texts.en:
Agustina Paulina is 27 years old, married, and has two young children.  She completed three years of her 'educación primária' (education for children aged 7-14).  Her business is weaving traditional 'cortes' (lengths of material often worn as skirts).  She started this business thanks to her family and has 10 years experience.

Agustina Paulina is requesting a loan to buy different types of threads in different colors so that she can improve her production.  She hopes to continue having a prosperous business.

loans.use: to buy threads for her weaving

loans.name: Cirilo

texts.en:
At 57, Cirilo can still manage a hog raising business, primarily pigs for breeding. He has been in this business for 16 years. This is the business with which he sent his five children to school, paying their allowances and school fees. 

Now, Cirilo’s children have finished their education through the income he gained from the business. According to him, this doesn’t mean that he will also stop his business, just because his children have finished their education. He will still continue his business to gain profit and save for any future emergency needs.

Due to costly feed nowadays, Cirilo is asking for a loan of PHP 50,000 for additional capital to buy feed for his sow, piglets and boar. He knows that it will be a big help for him to acquire a loan and be able to provide his hogs with feed immediately.

loans.use: to buy feed for his sow, piglets and boar.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
El señor Victor es casado, tiene 53 años de edad, curso los 3 años de educacion primaria, se dedica a prestar sus servicios de guardianía, lleva 3 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica a la tejeduría.

solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de madera, machimbre que lo utilizara para arreglar el techo de su casa y así mejorar su condición de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Victor is 53 years old and married.  He completed three years of his 'educación primária' (education for children aged 7-14).  He works as a caretaker and has three years experience.  He has the support of his wife whose business is weaving.

Victor is requesting a loan to buy wood (boards) which he will use to repair the roof of his house and thereby improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy wood for his house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products for her store

loans.name: Danilo

texts.en:
Danilo is 51 years of age, married and they are blessed with three children. 

Danilo’s goal in life is to manage his hog raising business well and achieve a higher income. Through the business, Danilo can send his children to college to finish their education and become professionals someday. He believes that education will lead them out of poverty.

Danilo and his wife provide their daily expenditures for household use, children allowances and feed for their hogs. 

Sometimes they have financial shortages because of additional expenses. Therefore, Danilo is requesting a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy feed for his hogs. He believes that the loan will be a big help to him in reducing his concerns about his daily expenditures.

loans.use: to buy feed for his hogs.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta is married with two grown up children and she is 59 years old. 

She is engaged in the hog raising business. Violeta is a hardworking person and she ensures that she does everything she can to provide for the needs of her family. To this end, she is requesting a loan of 12,000 PHP to buy piglets and feed for her business.

She hopes that her hog raising business will be better than before so she can pay off the loan ahead of time and buy more pigs to raise.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets and feed for her hog raising business

loans.name: Maria Herlinda

texts.es:
La señora Maria Herlinda es casada, tiene 53 años de edad, cursó el segundo años de educacion primaria, se dedica al comercio a la vent6avde ropa para mujeres, inició este negocio sola con propia iniciativa, y hasta el momento lleva 18 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la sastrería.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para comprar mas mercadería, cortes, blusas, güipiles, cortes, delantales, etc. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio prospero.
texts.en:
Maria Herlinda is 53 years old and married.  She completed two years of her 'educación primária' (education for children aged 7-14).  Her business is selling women's clothing.  She started the business on her own and on her own initiative, and has 18 years experience.  She has the support of her husband who works as a tailor.

Maria Herlinda is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise: cortes (lengths of woven cloth worn as skirts), blouses, güipiles (traditional woven blouses), aprons, etc.  She hopes to have a prosperous business in the future.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Lesly Beatriz

texts.es:
La señora Lesly Beatriz es casada, tiene 22 años de edad, cursó sus estudios de educacion básica, tiene 1 hijos, se dedica al comercio a la venta de blusas, y ropa de de mujeres, ya también a adornar blusas, inicio este negocio para mejorar su condición de vida y lleva 3 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de mas blusas, y mostacillas y así, poder vender mas, y aumentar sus ingresos de ganancias, espera en el futuro tener un negocio mas amplio.
texts.en:
Lesly Beatriz is 22 years old, married, and has one child.  She completed her 'educacion básica' (primary education).  Her business is selling blouses and women's clothing.  She also embroiders blouses.  She started this business so that she could improve her living conditions and has three years experience.

Lesly Beatriz is requesting a loan to buy more blouses and beads so that she can sell more and increase her profits.  She hopes, in the future, to have a larger business.

loans.use: to buy blouses

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Hog raising is 52-year-old Rosemarie's business. She has been engaged in this business for seven years now and she is a light-hearted mother of six.

Aside from this, her spouse is engaged in the farming business.

She says her monthly sales returns total 5,000 PHP.

Rosemarie says she intends to use her loan to purchase more feed and vitamins for her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her hog raising business

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.en:
Rosalia is 59 years old, married and the mother of five children. 

Rosalia is a vegetable vendor for her neighboring clients. Due to her good quality work, she receives regular orders every month.

Her husband sells animals. He purchases pigs and then sells for a profit.

Rosalia has applied for a loan from KIVA partner ASKI for her husband, who will buy piglets and feed and raise them to sell later and earn a profit.

He has been operating his business for many years and Rosalia is very confident that a loan investment will help him earn more profits from his business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of feed and piglets for her hog raising business

loans.name: Elenita

texts.en:
Elenita is a very efficient lady and supports her family by selling different vegetables to her neighboring clients. She is very fair in her dealings and shows a great passion for her business. Due to her good quality work, she receives regular orders every day.

Her husband also helps her in selling vegetables. She believes in providing good quality, fresh vegetables to her customers at very reasonable rates. She has given birth to three children. 

She has applied for a loan of 12,000 PHP. With the loan investment, she will buy fresh seasonal vegetables to sell to her clients and increase her sales and profits.

loans.use: to buy a wider variety of vegetables and fruits for her business

loans.name: Marina Esther

texts.es:
La señora Marina Esther es casada, tiene 47 años de edad, cursó sus estudios de educacion primaria, tiene 3 hijos, se dedica a elaborar calzados para damas, sandalias y zapatos femeninos, inicio este negocio gracias al apoyo se su esposo, lleva 23 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara parea la compra de cuero, piel hilos omega, adornos, etc, espera seguir mejorando y tener un negocio amplio.
texts.en:
Marina Esther is 47 years old, married, and has three children.  She completed her 'educación primaria' (education for children aged 7-14).  Her business is making ladies' footwear, sandals and shoes.  She started this business with her husband's support and has 23 years experience.

Marina Esther is requesting a loan to buy leather, Omega threads, embellishments, etc.  She hopes to keep improving and eventually have a large business.

loans.use: to buy materials for making ladies' footwear

loans.name: Lydia Floridalma

texts.es:
La señora Lydia Floridalma es casada, tiene 45 años de edad, cursó sus estudios de educacion primaria, tiene 1 hijo que estudia, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropero, camas, muebles, etc. lleva 11 años de experiencia, inicio junto con su esposo.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de madera, pino blanco y pino colorado, tablas y reglas y poder seguir trabajando, ya que desea tener un negocio amplio.
texts.en:
Lydia Floridalma is 45 years old and married.  She completed her 'educación primaria' (education for children aged 7-14) and has one child who is in school.  Her business is selling wardrobes, beds and other items of furniture.  She started the business together with her husband and has 11 years experience.

Lydia is requesting this loan to buy wood, white pine, colored pine and boards so that she can continue working as she would like to have a large business.

loans.use: to buy wood, white pine, colored pine and boards

loans.name: Wilma Estela

texts.es:
Wilma es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y a pesar de las adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida ha podido superarlas y salir adelante. Wilma es una madre cabeza de familia de 1 hija de 17 años, a quien ha tenido que brindarle un crecimiento digno ella sola, pues el padre de su hija nunca hizo alguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento. Desde el nacimiento de su hija, Wilma tuvo que dejar su empleo en una empresa para poder estar al cuidado de ella, es por esto que se vio en la necesidad de generar un empleo en el que pudiera estar al cuidado de su hija al mismo tiempo que en la atención del negocio. Es por esto que Wilma montó una papelería en la casa donde vive y gracias a esto genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Wilma poco a poco ha ido sumándole variedad de productos que ofrece en su papelería, y actualmente ofrece cosméticos, prendas de vestir y bisutería, lo que ha hecho que pase de ser una simple papelería a ser una miscelánea; gracias a esto ha podido captar una mayor cantidad de clientes. Con el ánimo de seguir aumentando la variedad de mercancía que ofrece en su miscelánea, Wilma aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de bisutería, cosméticos y prendas de vestir, y poder así ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.

Wilma espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá atender más necesidades de sus clientes. Wilma espera poder ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su hija y sueña con que pueda ingresar a una educación universitaria.
texts.en:
Wilma is noted for being a very hard-working person.  She has faced some difficulties in life but she has been able to overcome them and make progress.  She is a single mother and has a 17-year-old daughter.  

Wilma has had to provide her daughter with a decent upbringing on her own as her daughter's father never made any financial contribution towards her upkeep.  When her daughter was born, Wilma had to leave her job in a company in order to look after her.  She needed to create work for herself so that she could care for her daughter as she worked.  She therefore decided to set up a stationery store in her home.  This business makes her the income she needs to support her household.  Wilma has gradually added a greater variety of products to her store and currently sells cosmetics, clothing and costume jewelry as well.  This has turned her humble stationery store into a 'miscelánea' (a small store that carries a wide variety of goods).  As a result, she has gained a large number of customers.  With the aim of continuing to increase the variety of merchandise that she sells in her store, Wilma would like to take out a loan which will allow her to buy costume jewelry, cosmetics and clothing.  This will enable her to provide her customers with a larger variety of products.

Wilma hopes that this will increase her income significantly as she will be able to meet more of her customers' needs.  She hopes to be able to provide her daughter with a better quality of life and she dreams of her daughter going to university.

loans.use: to buy costume jewelry, cosmetics and clothing

loans.name: Wilver De Jesus

texts.es:
Wilver es una persona que ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de trabajar y salir adelante le han permitido superar las dificultades y continuar progresando junto a su familia. Wilver se encuentra casado y es padre de 1 hijo de 5 años, quien es su motivación para trabajar fuertemente todos los días en su negocio. Wilver, debido a que no pudo acceder a una educación universitaria, tuvo que empezar a trabajar cuando terminó su educación secundaria. Wilver encontró un amigo que le enseñó a trabajar en la calle vendiendo ropa interior como medias, bóxer, entre otros. Gracias a su buena atención, Wilver ha podido captar una muy buena clientela, y esto le ha permitido tener muy buenas ventas. Con el ánimo de surtir su negocio, Wilver aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de ropa interior como medias, bóxer, entre otros, y poder ofrecer a sus clientes mayor variedad en sus productos. 

Wilver espera poder seguir generando los ingresos necesarios para su hogar, y poder ofrecerles a su esposa y a su hija una mejor calidad de vida. Wilver sueña con poder montar su propio local, para no tener que trabajar en la calle y no tener que pasar por las complicaciones de trabajar en la calle.
texts.en:
Wilver is a person who has experienced a lot of difficulties in life.  However, his desire to work and make progress has allowed him to overcome these difficulties and continue making progress together with his family.  Wilver is married and has one 5-year-old child who is his motivation to work hard in his business every day.  As Wilver was not able to go to university, he had to start working when he finished high school.  He found a friend who taught him how to work in the street selling underwear such as socks, boxer shorts, etc.  Thanks to his good customer service, Wilver has gained a very good customer base.  This allows him to make very good sales.  With the aim of stocking his business, Wilver would like to take out a loan which will allow him to buy underwear such as socks, boxer shorts, etc.  This will enable him to offer his customers a larger variety of products.

Wilver hopes to be able to continue making the income he needs for his household and to offer his wife and daughter a better quality of life.  Wilver dreams of being able to set up his own sales location so that he no longer has to work in the street and no longer has to experience the complications of working on the street.

loans.use: to buy underwear such as socks, boxer shorts, etc.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto se ha dedicado desde hace aproximadamente 25 años a la actividad de la fabricación de calzado. Anteriormente, Roberto trabajaba para empresa y un día decidió independizarse debido a la baja remuneración que tenía su trabajo. Desde entonces Roberto ha fabricado calzado en su taller y ha podido llegar hasta enviarlo a otros países. Debido una gran crisis que tuvo durante un tiempo, Roberto se vio obligado a cerrar su taller y a trabajar la fabricación de calzado para terceros. Gracias a su dedicación al trabajo pudo salir delante de esta adversidad y retomar su taller aunque con muy bajo capital. Como los productos de Roberto se han caracterizado por su buena calidad, ha podido captar gran cantidad de clientes y poder sacar adelante su taller poco a poco. Actualmente, Roberto tiene muy buenas ventas, pero debido a la poca capacidad de producción de su taller a veces no puede responder a todos los pedidos de sus clientes. Con el ánimo de poder aumentar su capacidad de producción y responder a estos pedidos, Roberto aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de insumos y materias primas para la fabricación de zapatos como son moldes, caucho, cuero, entre otros.

Roberto espera continuar mejorando su taller y llegar a los niveles de ventas que tenía antes de caer en la crisis. Roberto sueña con poder ofrecer más empleo para las personas más necesitadas, pues actualmente emplea dos personas que nunca tuvieron oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Roberto has been making footwear for approximately 25 years.  He previously worked for a company but one day decided to start working for himself owing to the low wages he earned from his job.  He started making footwear in his own workshop and even reached the stage where he sends them abroad.   Owing to a crisis that he experienced which lasted a while, Roberto was forced to close his workshop and work making footwear for third parties.  Thanks to his commitment to his work, however, he was able to overcome his difficulties and re-open his workshop, albeit with very little capital.  As Roberto's products are very good quality, he has been able to attract a large number of customers and gradually make progress in his business.  He currently experiences very good sales but, owing to the low production capacity of his workshop, he sometimes cannot fill all of the orders from his customers.  With the aim of increasing his production capacity and filling these orders, Roberto is hoping to take out a loan which will allow him to buy the supplies and raw materials he needs to make shoes such as molds, rubber, leather, etc.

Roberto hopes to continue improving his workshop and to reach the level of sales he enjoyed before he experienced his crisis.  Roberto dreams of being able to offer more jobs to people who need them most.  He currently employs two people who never had work opportunities.

loans.use: to buy supplies and raw materials for making shoes such as molds, rubber, leather, etc.

loans.name: Remy

texts.en:
Determination and patience have been Remy's weapon in achieving success in life. She is thankful that she has been able to operate her clothing business for four years. She and her husband work hard to get more income. While she runs her clothing business her husband is also busy in managing their rice field. Remy is thirty-six years old, married, and has three children who go to school.

Remy aims to have a progressive business and make it viable as a source of income for her family. However because she has generated inadequate capital from her clothing business, she is requesting a loan of PHP 50,000 which will allow her to buy more stock of used clothes for her stall. 

Remy would be thankful if this loan amount would be granted because she can make her clothing business more productive. In this way, she could send her children into a higher level of education and save some money for emergencies.

loans.use: to buy more stock of used clothes for her stall.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
Jesusa is a married woman who operates a fruit and vegetable business, selling her goods at the market. She's worked in this business for two years. Her primary customers are residents of her local area. Jesusa describes transportation as her greatest business challenge, and her highest monthly expense is food for her family. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. 

Jesusa will use the 12,000 PHP loan to purchase more stocks of carrots, mangoes, tomatoes, bananas, and onions for resale. Jesusa aspires to establish a fruit and vegetable supply business in the future.

loans.use: to buy carrots, mangoes, tomatoes, bananas and onions for her business.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita operates a grocery shop. She engages in selling variety of products and she also sells rice in their village. She is married to a farmer and has one kid.

Lolita has been operating this grocery shop for six years now. With her income, she supports her husband to feed their children. She will use her loan to purchase bags of rice and a variety of grocery items to satisfy her customers. She hopes to use the new profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase rice, snack foods, drinks, spices and canned goods for her business.

loans.name: Matilde Rosa

texts.es:
Matilde es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y tener un gran carisma. Matilde se encuentra casada y es madre de 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida. Debido a que los ingresos que genera su esposo no son suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, Matilde decidió iniciar su propio negocio de venta de productos de uso personal a través de catálogos, y gracias a esto contribuye económicamente al sostenimiento de su hogar. Gracias a la buena atención que ofrece Matilde, ha podido captar un gran número de clientes que le hacen muy buenos pedidos. Con el ánimo de entregar un pedido que le ha hecho un cliente, Matilde aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal como cosméticos, lociones, desodorantes entre otros y poder así responder a un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente.

Matilde espera que su negocio le siga generando ingresos con los cuales les pueda ofrecer a su esposo y sus 2 hijos una buena calidad de vida y sueña con tener un gran negocio ubicado en un local donde pueda generar empleo para las personas que más lo necesitan.
texts.en:
Matilde is noted for being a very hard-working and charming person.  She is married and has two children who she has always wanted to provide with a good quality of life.  Owing to the fact that her husband's income wasn't enough to cover their household expenses, Matilde decided to start her own business selling personal products through catalogs.  Thanks to her business, she is able to contribute financially toward supporting her household.  Thanks to her good customer service, she has been able to attract a large number of customers who place very good orders with her.  With the aim of filling an order that a customer has made, Matilde is hoping to receive a loan which will allow her to buy personal products such as cosmetics, lotions, deodorants, etc.  This will enable her to respond to the order from her customer.

Matilde hopes that her business will continue making income so that she can offer her husband and her two children a good quality of life.  She dreams of having premises for her business where she can create jobs for people who need them most.

loans.use: to buy personal products such as cosmetics, lotions, deodorants, etc.

loans.name: Maria Rocio

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre buscar un bienestar para su familia. Debido a que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, Maria decidió montar su propio negocio e inició una venta de dulces. Poco a poco fue aumentando la variedad de productos que ofrecía en su tienda y con un gran esfuerzo pasó a poder vender productos de la canasta familiar. Maria es una persona con muy bajos recursos económicos, y la tienda le ha permitido superar grandes dificultades que le ha presentado la vida. Con el ánimo de seguir aumentando la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes y hacer más atractiva su tienda para los clientes, Maria espera que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a realizar mejoras locativas a su negocio para ampliarlo y la compra de productos de la canasta familiar para hacer su tienda más atractiva para sus clientes.

Maria espera seguir aumentando sus ventas y poder ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Maria sueña con que su tienda le brinde la posibilidad de terminar de construir su casa, pues actualmente solo una parte se encuentra construida correctamente y otra parte esta hecha de plásticos y madera.
texts.en:
Maria is noted for being a very hard-working person who is always looking out for her family's well-being.  As her husband's income wasn't enough to cover their household expenses, Maria decided to set up her own business and started selling sweet treats.  She gradually increased the variety of products that she sold in her store and, with a lot of hard work, she managed to start selling basic household products.  Maria is a person with very low financial resources and the store has allowed her to overcome some big difficulties that she has experienced in life.  With the aim of continuing to increase the variety of products that she offers her customers and making her store more attractive for her customers, Maria hopes to receive a loan that will allow her to make some structural improvements to her store (expand it) in order to make it more attractive and also buy some basic household products to sell.

Maria hopes to continue increasing her sales and she hopes to be able to offer her family a better quality of life.  Maria dreams that her business will enable her to finish building her home as only one part is currently built correctly.  The other part is made from plastic and wood.

loans.use: to make some structural improvements to her business (expand it) and to buy basic household products

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a hard-working man and a responsible father to his five children. He is married to Bibsy who is in charge in taking care of their children. He says that farming was his family’s main source of income but because his children are growing up, he now needs more capital to meet all their needs. So, he decided to buy a jeepney (public transport vehicle) to increase his profit. He started to operate his transportation business in the year 1996. His route is from their village to Santiago where his passengers acquire their merchandise and basic necessities. His village is known to be a mountainous place and more focused on agricultural business.

Robert still wants to gain more income for his children's education. So he also runs a hog-raising business as an additional source of income. Due to his patience in managing all his businesses, he is able to finance his eldest son to pursue his studies. 

Robert said, "The greatest accomplishment in life is letting children finish their education". At the current time he supports two of his children’s education. This means that he is again suffering from a shortage of income because hog-raising requires more capital as it is an expensive business. 

For this reason, he is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 which will be use to buy feed and vaccines to improve the growth of his hogs. This amount will really help him to obtain his dream for his children and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccine for his hogs.

loans.name: Maria Eva

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que a pesar de las adversidades que le ha presentado la vida, ha podido superarlas gracias a sus ganas de salir adelante. Maria es una madre soltera de 7 hijos de los cuales 3 aún están en edad que requieren de su cuidado. Debido a que Maria debe garantizar el sustento de los gastos de su hogar, tuvo que iniciar un negocio que le permitiera estar al cuidado de sus hijos y a la atención del negocio al mismo tiempo. Fue así como empezó la cría y venta de cerdos, y gracias a esta actividad genera los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Maria tiene adecuado un lugar de su casa para la cría de los cerdos, sin embargo, este lugar es muy pequeño y no le permite tener una mayor cantidad de cerdos en este lugar. Con el ánimo de ampliar su cochera para poder aumentar la cantidad de cerdos para la cría, Maria espera que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a realizar mejoras locativas a la cochera donde tiene sus cerdos para aumentar la cantidad de cerdos que puede criar. 

Maria espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten, pues podrá tener más cerdos a disposición de los clientes. Maria espera que sus hijos puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida y sueña con poderlos sacar adelante para que puedan progresar económicamente.
texts.en:
Maria is a person who has experienced difficulties in life but she has been able to overcome them thanks to her desire to make progress.  Maria is a single mother and has seven children.  Three of her children are still at an age where they need her care.  As Maria is responsible for covering all her household expenses, she had to set up a business which would allow her to care for her children and work at the same time.  For this reason, she started raising and selling pigs.  Thanks to this business activity, she makes the income she needs to support her household.  Maria has a suitable place where she raises her pigs but it is very small and doesn't allow her to keep any more pigs.  With the aim of expanding her shed so that she can increase her number of pigs, Maria hopes to receive a loan which will allow her to make some structural improvements.

Maria hopes that this will increase her income as she will be able to have more pigs to sell to her customers.  Maria hopes that her children will be able to enjoy a better quality of life and she dreams of getting them ahead in life so that they can make progress financially.

loans.use: to make some structural improvements to the shed where she keeps her pigs

loans.name: Renato

texts.en:
Renato is proud to have been a farmer for about ten years now. He is married and has three children. Renato is motivated to support his family and his determination allows him to work hard and generate income for the sustenance of the family. 

He is now asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy rice seeds and rice fertilizers. He hopes to improve his crop production and someday make the family economically stable even only through his farming business.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Roger

texts.en:
Roger is forty-five years old, married and has three children. One is going to high-school and the other is in college. The eldest already settled into marriage. His spouse raises hogs to sell as supplement to the income they get from farming. Roger has been in the rice farming business for almost fifteen years.

He is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy fertilizers and seeds to grow. He hopes this loan will be granted to him as a way to help improve his output. 

Someday, he hopes to make the business more profitable and earn funds to finance the schooling of his children. He hopes to see them with a degree and a good employment someday.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds to grow.

loans.name: Danny

texts.en:
A farming business managed by Danilo has served as his family's source of income for about ten years now. His parents gave him a hectare rice field in which he grows rice. Danny is married and has four children. All attend school and need daily allowances.

He is now asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming. He hopes to increase his crop production so he can save funds for the college education of his children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming.

loans.name: Maria Gabriela

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de trabajar le han permitido salir adelante junto con su familia. Maria fue desplazada por la violencia de su barrio, por lo que tuvo que abandonar su casa y ubicarse en otro barrio con su esposo y sus 5 hijos. Debido a que tuvo que dejar todo abandonado, Maria necesitaba una fuente de ingresos diferente a la de su esposo, pues con los ingresos que generaba este no era suficiente para sostener los gastos de su hogar. Es por esto que Maria inició la venta de productos de uso personal a través de catálogos, y gracias a esto ha pudo empezar a generar mayores ingresos para su familia. Actualmente Maria es madre soltera cabeza de familia ya que se separó de su esposo, lo que hace que Maria tenga que generar unos mayores ingresos para su hogar. Gracias la buena calidad de los productos que vende Maria, y la buena atención que ofrece a sus clientes, ha podido conseguir grandes clientes para su negocio. Actualmente Maria tiene un pedido de un cliente que no alcanza a satisfacer con el inventario de mercancía que tiene, por lo que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal como cosméticos, lociones, accesorios, y prendas de vestir para satisfacer el gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente.

Maria espera seguir generando ingresos para su hogar y poder sacar adelante a su familia. Maria sueña con poder tener un buen negocio, estar ubicada en un local donde las personas la puedan reconocer más fácil y poder generar empleo para personas que se encuentren en su misma condición, donde requieren de unos ingresos y no han encontrado oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Maria is a person who has gone through a lot of adversity in her life. Nonetheless, her willingness to work has allowed her to get ahead with her family. Maria was displaced from her neighborhood because of violence. She had to leave her home and relocate to another neighborhood with her husband and 5 children. Since she had to leave everything behind, Maria needed a source of income that was different from her husband's, because the income he generated wasn't enough to cover the household expenses. That is why Maria started to sell personal use products via catalogs. Thanks to that, she has been able to start generating more income for her family. Right now Maria is a single mother head of the family because she separated from her husband.  Due to this, Maria has to generate more income for her home. Thanks to the good quality of the products that Maria sells, and the good service she offers her customers, she has been able to get great customers for her business. Right now, Maria has an order from a customer and she doesn't have enough inventory to cover it. That is why she hopes a loan will afford her the possibility of purchasing personal use products such as cosmetics, lotions, accessories, and clothing in order to fill the order the customer has made.

Maria hopes to keep generating income for her home and being able to get her family ahead. Maria dreams of being able to have a good business, located in a place where people can recognize her easier and being able to generate employment for people in the same situation as she is, needing income and having no employment opportunities.

loans.use: to buy personal use products such as cosmetics, lotions, accessories and clothing to fill a large order that a customer has made.

loans.name: Leidy Milena

texts.es:
Leidy se dedica a la atención de su propio negocio desde que decidió independizarse luego de trabajar durante mucho tiempo para una empresa. Leidy se encuentra casada y es madre de 1 hijo de 3 años, quien es la motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio todos los días. Leidy tiene una miscelánea en la cual ofrece toda clase de productos, desde juguetería, utensilios para el hogar, productos de uso personal, entre otros. Gracias a la buena atención que ofrece, y a la buena calidad de los productos que vende, Leidy ha podido captar un gran número de clientes que le garantizan muy buenas ventas. Debido a que tuvo muy buenas ventas en el mes pasado, su negocio redujo su inventario considerablemente, y con el ánimo de surtir su negocio Leidy busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de mercancía como juguetería, productos de uso doméstico, productos de uso personal, entre otros.

Leidy espera que su negocio siga adelante con buenas ventas y pueda seguir generando ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Leidy sueña con que su hijo pueda acceder a una buena educación y tenga una estabilidad económica que le permita progresar. Leidy espera poder tener su negocio en un local propio y no tener que pagar arriendo y poder aumentar sus clientes para expandir su negocio y generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Leidy has been working in her own business since she decided to start working for herself, having previously worked for a company for a long time.  She is married and has one son who is 3 years old.  Her son is her motivation to work hard in her business every day.

Leidy has a 'miscelánea'  (a small store that carries a wide variety of goods) where she sells all kinds of products, from toys to household tools, personal products, etc.  Thanks to her good customer service and the good quality of the products that she sells, Leidy has been able to attract a large number of customers which guarantees her very good sales.  Owing to the fact that she experienced very good sales last month, she currently has significantly lower stock levels.  With the aim of re-stocking her business, Leidy is looking to take out a loan which will enable her to buy more merchandise such as toys, household products, personal products, etc.

Leidy hopes that her business will continue enjoying good sales and that she will be able to continue making income with which to improve her family's quality of life.  Leidy dreams of her son receiving a good education and enjoying financial stability which will allow him to make progress in life.  She hopes to eventually own her own business premises so that she no longer has to pay rent.  She would also like to increase her number of customers so that she can expand her business and create jobs for people who need them most.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as toys, electrical appliances, etc.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
Javier es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y siempre querer brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Javier se encuentra casado y es padre de 1 hijo de 2 años, quien es su motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio todos los días. Javier se dedica a la atención de un puesto de comidas, el cual aprendió a trabajar gracias a que su hermana también tiene un puesto de comidas y le enseño a trabajarlo. Javier se ubicó en un local donde puede ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor comodidad y con esto logró aumentar sus ventas considerablemente. Actualmente, Javier tiene muy buenas ventas, hasta el punto en que su local ya no puede atender más clientes porque la capacidad llega a su máximo. Con el ánimo de pasarse de local para uno que queda cerca, el cual es más amplio, Javier requiere hacerle algunas adecuaciones locativas al local, de modo que la cocina quede más cómoda y el local quede más agradable. Es por esto que Javier aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder realizar mejoras locativas al local para poder hacerlo más atractivo y agradable para sus clientes.

Javier espera que sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá atender más clientes que ahora no caben en el local. Javier espera que el préstamo le permita continuar su negocio sin que se vean afectados sus ingresos mensuales y de esta manera pueda seguir ofreciendo a su hijo y a su esposa una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Javier is a person characterized as being very hardworking. He always wants to offer his family a better quality of life. Javier is married and the father of one two year old son who is his motivation for working hard at his business every day. Javier works at a food stand. He learned to do this work because his sister had a food stand and she taught him about it. Javier put his locale where he can serve his customers more conveniently and this led to him increasing his sales considerably. Right now, Javier has good sales, to the point that he can't serve any more customers in his locale because it's at maximum capacity.  Javier wants to relocate to a locale that is nearby because it is bigger, and he needs to make some improvements on that locale so the kitchen will be more convenient and the locale more pleasing. That is why Javier is hoping for a loan to afford him the possibility os making improvements on the locale to make it more attractive and pleasing to his customers. 

Javier hopes that his income will increase considerably. He'll be able to us serve more customers that don't fit in his locale now. Javier hopes that the loan will allow him to continue his business without his monthly income being affected and in this way keep offering his son and his wife a better quality of life and better opportunities to progress.

loans.use: to make improvements on his locale to make it more attractive and pleasing for his customers.

loans.name: John Lester

texts.en:
John Lester is 22 years of age, a college graduate, and still single.  He is currently living with his parents within the local community of San Marcos San Mateo.  John Lester is a nursing graduate but because he hasn't yet passed the board examination for nursing, he is using his other skill in photography in order to earn a living.  He works in a photo shop as an editor and photographer.

Since John Lester is the eldest son in the family, he is responsible for helping his parents to provide a better way of living for the family and to help his brother in his studies.  His family has owned and ran 1.5 hectares of rice fields for 23 years.  Since finishing his studies, John Lester only manages their rice field.  According to John Lester, the income generated from their farming business is utilized in their daily needs, tuition fees, and other school fees of his brother.  Due to high expenses of his family, the current capital in their farming business is no longer enough.  For this reason, he is asking for a loan amounting to P50,000 which will be used in buying farm inputs such as 18 cavans of fertilizers and insecticides for care of his rice crop.  Through this loan amount requested, John Lester could be able to make his rice field more productive and profitable.  In this way, he could gain a plentiful harvest this season.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as 18 cavans of fertilizers and insecticides for care of his rice crop.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en: Raquel has the characteristics of being patient and a hard worker.  She is a mother of two children and is engaged in a food selling business.  She sells a variety of food for snacks such as “malagkit," a type of rice.  Making this food requires a lot of ingredients and because of this, she is asking for a loan of P15,000 to purchase coconut milk, sugar, rice and flour.  She hopes to improve her small business to sustain the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase coconut milk, sugar, rice, and flour for making malagkit to sell.

loans.name: Alicia De Jesus

texts.es:
Alicia es una persona que a pesar de que ha tenido que atravesar muchas adversidades en su vida, sus ganas de salir adelante le han permitido superar las dificultades y seguir adelante junto con su familia. Alicia es una madre soltera de 3 hijos, debido a que el padre de sus hijos murió hace un tiempo. Debido a esta condición, Alicia tuvo que empezar a garantizar a sus hijos el sostenimiento de sus gastos, por lo que se vio en la obligación de tener un empleo que al mismo tiempo le permitiera estar al cuidado de sus hijos. Fue así como montó una venta de productos a través de catálogos, donde ofrece a sus clientes productos de uso personal, productos de uso doméstico, entre otros. Gracias a esto, Alicia ha podido captar un gran número de clientes que le garantizan muy buenas ventas. Gracias a que tiene grandes pedidos de productos de uso doméstico, Alicia aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso doméstico para satisfacer los pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes. 

Alicia espera poder continuar con sus ventas, de modo que le puedan garantizar unos buenos ingresos para su hogar. Alicia sueña con poder sacar su familia adelante y poder tener una estabilidad económica que le permita tener mejores oportunidades de progreso. Alicia quiere en un futuro poder montar un almacén y estar ubicada en un local en el que pueda ser más reconocida por las personas de su sector y generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Alicia is a person who, despite having passed through many adversities in her life, has got through thanks to her desire to get ahead together with her family. Alicia is a single mother with three children, due to the fact that the father of her children died a while ago. Due to this, Alicia had to started providing for the maintenance of her children and the bills, for which she was forced to get a job which would at the same time allow her to care for her children. This was hos she set up her catalogue sales business, where she offers her customers personal products, household products, as well as other things. Thanks to this Alicia has been able to make a good number of customers who guarantee good sales. Thanks to the fact that she has large orders for household products Alicia hopes that a loan will give her the possibility to buy household products in order to meet her customers orders.

Alicia hopes to continue with her sales, so she can have a guaranteed income in her house. Alicia dreams of being able to get her family ahead and being able to have economic stability which will in turn give her a better chance to progress. Alicia wants to in the future be able to set up a warehouse and be based in a store where she can be recognised by more people in her area and generate jobs for people in need.

loans.use: Compra de productos de uso doméstico para satisfacer los pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes.

loans.name: Honoria

texts.en:
Honoria and her spouse are both involved in a rice-farming business as their primary source of income. They have three children who attend school. Another source of income also comes from raising hogs. 

Honoria has been in the farming business since she and her husband got married 20 years ago. They are considered to be experienced in the farming business but still need to improve their farming practices to generate additional income. 

Honoria is now asking for a loan to achieve her goal of improving her crop production. She is asking for PHP 10,000 to pay for laborers for land cultivation and to prepare for farming. 

Some day, Honoria hopes to see all the fruits of their efforts and sacrifices in sending their children to school.

loans.use: to pay for laborers for land cultivation and to prepare for farming.

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en:
Loreta, age 40, is a single woman who works hard to generate income for the sustenance of her family. She lives with her parents in Manalo; Loreta is the breadwinner of the family. 

Loreta has a farming business. She hires laborers who plow the field, and she plants and harvests rice. She is now asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers and insecticides to use for farming. She hopes to improve her output to earn additional income for her family. 

Some day, Loreta hopes to acquire an abundant harvest and save the profits for the future expenses of her family.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers and insecticides to use for farming.

loans.name: Felicito

texts.en:
At age 20, Felicito started a farming business, as his parents had done for their source of living. Felicito is now 58 years old, and he is married with seven children. Though he has a large family, he still strives hard to meet all their needs.

As of now, he has insufficient funds so he is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides to use for farming. He hopes to improve his farming practices and earn a good income from his business. He also would like to finance schooling for his children so they can earn a degree.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides to use for farming.

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her clothes-selling business. With the loan investment, she will buy clothes in bulk quantity, which will allow her to offer more choices and a better variety of clothes to her clients. This will enable her to increase her sales and profits.

Razia is very experienced in her business and has been operating it for many years. She is very confident that her business will improve as a result of the loan investment.

Razia is the mother of two sons and one daughter. Her sons work while her daughter is studying.

Razia hopes that she will be able to send her daughter to a better school after improving her business.

Note:In the photo, the lady holding a book entitled "Asasah Passbook" is Razia.

loans.use: To buy a variety of clothes for her clothes-selling business.

loans.name: Hafeezan's Group

texts.en:
Hafeezan is a very supportive lady. In order to financially support her family, she makes bedsheets. She is the mother of five sons, three of whom work while the two younger sons study.

Hafeezan has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her business. With the loan investment, she will buy thread and fabric for making bedsheets in a larger quantity and of a different variety. This will allow her to earn more profits from her business.

Hafeezan is an experienced person in her business and has been operating it for many years. She is confident that a loan investment will help her positively grow her business.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book entitled "Asasah Passbook" is Hafeezan.

loans.use: To buy thread and fabric to make bedsheets for her business.

loans.name: Elmer

texts.en:
Elmer is a 43-year-old farmer from the village of Burgos province of Isabela. He is married and lives with his wife and two school-aged children. The only source of income for the family is agriculture. The family has a 4-hectare plot of land. The family sells harvested crops to the local market. The total average monthly income of the family is around 5,000 PHP. 

Elmer requested credit for renting a tractor for land cultivation and for purchasing seeds. After proper cultivation and sowing quality seeds, the family will get a good harvest in the summer season. They will sell it for a good price and get their planned income. The family hopes that increased income will allow them to make some savings for house renovation, in order to fix up their old house and create better living conditions.

loans.use: to rent a tractor and purchase seeds for his farming business.

loans.name: Zahida's Group

texts.en:
Zahida has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s milk-selling business. With the loan investment, he will buy a new motorbike for delivering milk to his customers. This will allow him to offer better quality services by providing milk to his customers at their doorstep.

Zahida stays at home and performs her household duties. She has given birth to 8 children. Her 5 elder sons work in the factory while her 2 youngest daughters are studying. Zahida has a lot of confidence in her husband - that he will successfully be able to improve his income after investing the loan.

Note: "In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Zahida."

loans.use: To buy a motorbike for delivering milk to the customers at their doorstep.

loans.name: Munawar's Group

texts.en:
Munawar is married and 41 years old, and she runs a canteen in a nearby school. She sells different snacks and cold drinks, and also prepares her own local food which is very popular among school children. The income she earns helps her to pay the school fees for her 5 children who are studying in different classes. Her husband is a watchman. He takes care of his community people and earns a monthly income.

Munawar has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her canteen business. With the loan investment, she will buy cooking materials, snacks and cold drinks that will allow her to earn more profits from her business. She is very confident that her business will grow further after the loan investment, and that will allow her children to continue their education.

Note: "In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Munawar."

loans.use: To buy snacks and cold drinks for her canteen business.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is recognized as a responsible mother of four children. At age 53, Milagros is still determined to work hard to lift her family from poor living. She is married to Rodrigo, a farmer in the village of Guam, San Guillermo. 

Milagros is engaged in selling bananas. She usually buys them in the market and sells them in their village. As of now, she is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to buy more bananas to resell. She believes that through her patience and sacrifices, she will improve her business and make it a viable and profitable source of income.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to resell.

loans.name: Arley Adolfo

texts.es:
Arley se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a la actividad de la producción agropecuaria, pues desde que salió del colegio empezó a trabajar en esta actividad. Arley aprendió la producción agropecuaria de su padre, quien posteriormente le heredaría la tierra donde actualmente tiene los cultivos Arley. Arley se encuentra casado y es padre de 1 hijo de 3 años, quien es su motivación para trabajar fuertemente todos los días. Arley, gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos y la buena atención que ofrece, ha podido tener muy buenos clientes, lo que le ha garantizado poder tener unas muy buenas ventas. Arley ha tenido que atravesar la dificultad del clima en su cultivo, lo cual ha hecho que sus siembras se vean afectadas y no estén creciendo de la manera correcta. Con el ánimo de sacar su cultivo adelante, Arley aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de abonos y riegos para su cultivo y poder sacar un cultivo de la mejor calidad.

Arley espera que su cultivo crezca de buena calidad y lo pueda ofrecer a un buen precio, y de esta manera pueda seguir generando ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Arley espera poder ofrecerles a su esposa y su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades de progreso. Arley sueña con tener un gran cultivo con muchas extensiones de tierra sembradas y poder generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Arley has devoted the better part of his life to agricultural production since he began working in this business upon leaving school. Arley learned agricultural production from his father who later would bequeath him the land where Arley currently grows his crops. Arley is married and the father of a three-year-old son who is his motive for working hard every day. Arley, thanks to the good quality of his products and the good attention he gives them, has been able to get very good customers, which has guaranteed very good sales. Arley has had to deal with the difficulty of the climate which has affected his plantings and kept them from growing correctly. Wanting to improve his crops, Arley is hopeful that a loan will give him the opportunity to make purchases of fertilizers and irrigation for the crops so he may have crops of the highest quality. 

Arley hopes his crops grow to be high quality crops and that he may offer them at a good price, and so be able to continue generating income for the sustenance of his household. Arley hopes to be able to offer his wife and son a better quality of life and better opportunities for progress. Arley dreams of having a large farm, with many extensions of cultivated land, and of being able to generate employment for more needy people.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and irrigation for his crops so he may get the highest quality of harvest.

loans.name: Safia's Group

texts.en:
Safia has requested a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will buy a new sewing machine, because with her current machine she is unable to complete the orders on time. Her husband is involved in a tie and dye business. His clients are very happy with his services and he receives regular orders every month.

Safia is the mother of 3 children. All of them are enrolled in the local school and getting their education. She is very supportive and performs her household duties very well, along with her business. She is confident that by purchasing a new sewing machine, she will be able to complete her orders on time and increase her profits.

Note: ”In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Safia.”

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for her sewing business.

loans.name: Khalida's Group

texts.en:
Khalid is a seamstress. She sews clothes for her neighboring clients to earn income for her family. She is very supportive and started her profession in order to afford the school fees of her children, because her husband alone was not able to provide education to both children. Her husband is a plumber by profession and offers good quality services to his customers at low rates.

Khalida has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband's plumbing business. With the loan investment, he will buy plumbing tools such as tabs, water pipes, etc. that will allow him to make his business more profitable. He has been operating his business for many years, and Khalid is confident about his success after investing the loan.

loans.use: To buy plumbing tools for her husband's plumbing business.

loans.name: Eliptico

texts.en: Eliptico is a 24-year-old single man living with his parents. Because of the high living expenses, he was obliged to work hard in order to cover their needs. He had twelve years of experience in the agriculture field before he decided to have his own land where he cultivates crops. Today, he needs to borrow 15,000 PHP from this Kiva partner to purchase new agricultural supplies in addition to fertilizers and seeds. This will certainly boost his productivity and thus his revenues. In the future, he plans to open his own farm supply shop.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer and seedlings for his business.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.en:
Ernesto is a 41-year-old married man who lives in the Philippines. He has two children who attend high school.  

Through rice farming, Ernesto provides for all his family's needs, including their meals, allowances and school expenses. He is now asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy seeds and fertilizers to use for farming. He hopes to improve his crop production this coming harvest season.

His hope is to make his family financially stable.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers to use for farming.

loans.name: Fidela

texts.en:
Fidela is a farmer who lives in Manalo with her spouse and four children. The couple manages a half-hectare rice field on which they grow rice. 

The income from the business pays for the school expenses of Fidela's children. Another part of the income also serves as revolving capital to buy seeds and fertilizers. She is now asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to pay for laborers to transplant the rice seedlings. 

Some day, Fidela hopes to make her business more profitable. She wishes to become a successful rice grower in her village.

loans.use: to pay for laborers to transplant the rice seedlings.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel, age 41, is married and has four children. She is married to a farmer in the village of Guam, San Guillermo. 

Maribel is engaged in a retailing business. She buys and sells different kinds of medicines in the market of Alicia, Isabela. 

Right now, Maribel wants to expand her business. Therefore, she is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy more medicines to sell. She hopes to obtain this loan so that she can improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more medicines to sell.

loans.name: Jorman Oliver

texts.es:
Emprendedor es la mejor manera de describir a Jorman, un joven que es hijo de una madre soltera cabeza de familia que decidió colaborar a su madre con la generación de ingresos. Debido a que los ingresos que generaba su madre no eran suficientes para el sostenimiento de su hogar, Jorman quiso colaborar con la generación de ingresos, por lo que desde muy temprana edad inició a trabajar en la limpieza en algunas empresas y posteriormente montó su propio negocio. Jorman montó una fabricación y venta de obleas, y posteriormente, con las ganancias que este le iba dejando montó una tienda general que apenas esta abasteciendo. Gracias a esto, Jorman ha podido contribuir a su madre económicamente y le ha permitido tener una mejor calidad de vida. Con el ánimo de seguir surtiendo su tienda, Jorman aspira a que un préstamo le brindará la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar para surtir su tienda y poder hacerla más atractiva para sus clientes.

Jorman espera que de esta manera sus ingresos sigan aumentando y pueda seguir contribuyendo a la generación de ingresos para su hogar. Jorman sueña con poder ofrecerle a su madre una mejor calidad de vida y lograr posicionar su propio negocio, de modo que puedan sostener todos sus gastos de este y en un futuro tener un gran negocio que le permita generar empleo.
texts.en:
Entrepreneur is the best way to describe Jorman. He is a young man who is the son of a single mother who decided to collaborate with his mother on the generation of income. The income his mother was making was not sufficient for supporting their household. Jorman wanted to contribute to the household income. Therefore, at a very early age, he started to work by cleaning some businesses. Subsequently, he set up his own business. He started a business making and selling wafers. Later on, with the profits from this, he set up a general store that he is stocking. Thanks to these things, Jorman has been able to contribute to his mother economically which has allowed them to have a better quality of life. With the desire to continue stocking his store, Jorman intends that the loan offered will give him the opportunity to purchase grocery products to stock his store and to make it more attractive for his customers. 

Jorman hopes that with this, his income will continue to increase and he can continue contributing to creation of household earnings. Jorman dreams that he can offer his mother a better quality of life. He also dreams of being able to set up his own business in a way that can support all of their expenses. In the future, he dreams of having a big business that allows him to create jobs.

loans.use: buy grocery products and make it more attractive for his customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase primary materials such as wood, glue, and nails among other items, for fulfilling his customers' large orders.

loans.name: Nymfa

texts.en:
Nymfa is 22 years old and married. She has two children. Nymfa owns a store where she sells cooking oil, rice, bananas, potatoes, spices and personal items. She has been running this retail shop for nearly a year.

Nymfa would like a loan of PHP 10,000 so she can buy a variety of goods to sell in her store. Her business has helped her to support her family. She would like to use the profits from this loan to reinvest in her business and also to create some savings for her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of goods to sell in her store.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma, a 35-year-old single woman. has been in the hog-raising business for almost five years, earning a profit of P7,000 per hog, money she uses to support her loving parents. Despite the hardships and difficulties of life, Vilma has the strong determination to uplift their standard of living and give them a better life.

Now requesting a loan of P20,000 to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines for use in her hog-raising business, she believes that this loan will help her enterprise to grow and become a viable source of income.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines for use in her hog-raising business.

loans.name: Diana Sofia

texts.es:
Diana es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de salir adelante le han permitido superar las dificultades y continuar progresando junto con su esposo. Diana es una tecnóloga industrial que debido las pocas oportunidades laborales que encuentra, tuvo que iniciar su propio negocio para generar los ingresos necesarios para contribuir con el sostenimiento de su hogar. Diana se encuentra casada y junto con su esposo ha podido salir adelante y superar muchas dificultades que le ha presentado la vida. Diana se dedica a la atención de su tienda de sentimientos donde además ofrece productos de papelería, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos para su hogar.
