Rorn, 47, is a mother of five dependent children. All of them are helping her in growing soybean and sesame as core business which she has been with for almost 10 years to feed her big family.

Rorn joined VisionFund in the past two cycles and completely repaid back.The loan has made her better living. Now she leads a group consisting of three members. She is applying for a loan of KHR 1,400,000.00 to grow sesame for sell. She hopes to generate more profit from her cash crop and expand her plantation.

loans.use: To grow sesame to sell

loans.name: Elvie

texts.en:
Elvie is married to a farmer and they raise their family in a village. They were gifted with three children and they plan to educate them and give them a better life. Due to hardships of living, Elvie is involved in a hog-raising business to generate additional income. She has been operating this business for almost three years and usually earns a profit of 7,000 PHP a month that she utilizes for their necessities and allowances of their children. 

She plans to improve her pigpen and raise more pigs. But due to inadequate capital, she wants to ask for an additional 15,000 PHP to buy feed, vitamins and materials needed in hog-raising. She believes that this loan will be helpful in carrying out their plan and hopes that they will be successful in carrying it out.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and materials needed in hog-raising

loans.name: Shameem's Group

texts.en:
Shameem is almost 50 years old, but still she is very active and performs her household duties very well by staying at home. She also operates a sewing business from her home and sews beautiful clothes for her neighboring clients. She has given birth to a son and a daughter; both are experts in sewing and operate their separate businesses.

Shameem has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will buy a new sewing machine that will allow her to finish the orders on time and earn extra profits. She is very experienced in her business and confident about her business success by purchasing a new sewing machine with a loan.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Shameem.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Jairo Antonio

texts.es:
Jairo es una persona que a pesar de todas las adversidades ha podido salir adelante gracias a sus ganas de trabajar. Anteriormente Jairo atendía un café Internet y video juegos, pero por algunas dificultades ajenas a su voluntad tuvo que cerrar su negocio. Posteriormente Jairo empezó a montar nuevamente un negocio del cual pueda generar los ingresos necesarios para su hogar, por lo que comenzó a montar una cafetería, donde ofrece café, gaseosas, licor, entre otros. Actualmente Jairo esta atendiendo la misma cafetería, pero el negocio ya ha crecido y se ha consolidado en el sector. Es por esto que ahora Jairo quiere aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes ofreciendo productos como snack, fritos, y otras clases de refrescos. Con el ánimo de realizar estas compras, Jairo aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de snack, fritos y refrescos para aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.

Jairo espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes. Además, podrá generar más ingresos para poder ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Jairo is a person that even against many adversities has found a way to move forward, thanks to his hardworking nature. Before, Jairo had an internet cafe and video game shop, but as a result of a few difficulties outside of his control he had to close the business. After, Jairo began setting up a new business in order to provide the income he needs for his household expenses. He opened a small restaurant where he offers coffee, sodas and liquor amongst other things. Currently Jairo is running the same restaurant, the business has grown and has become well established in the area. It is for this reason that Jairo wants to increase the variety of products that he has to offer his customers, offering snacks and chips and other types of drinks. With the motivation he has to make these purchases, Jairo hopes that a loan will allow him the possibility to be able to buy snack products, chips and drinks to increase the variety of products he has to offer his customers. 

He hopes that as a result his profits will increase considerably, so that he will be able to offer a better variety of products to his customers. Also, he will be able to have more income to be able to offer his family a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy snack foods, chips and sodas, to increase the variety of products he has to offer to customers.

loans.name: Luz Dary

texts.es:
Luz Dary es una persona casada y es madre de 2 hijos de 13 y 17 años de edad, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer todo lo necesario. Luz Dary se ha dedicado a la producción agropecuaria gran parte de su vida, y junto con su esposo trabaja en la venta de ganado y tiene algunos cultivos de legumbres. Debido a que su hijo mayor ya ha culminado sus estudios básicos y quiere poder acceder a una educación universitaria, Luz Dary quiere aprovechar al máximo el terreno que tiene su hogar para poder generar ingresos extras para su hogar. Luz Dary que tiene adecuado un corral donde anteriormente tuvo pollos para la venta, quiere volver a retomar este negocio para generar ingresos extras con los cuales le pueda ofrecer a su hijo una educación universitaria. Luz Dary aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de pollos para la crianza y posterior venta, y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos que le permitan ofrecerle a su hijo el acceso a una educación universitaria.

Luz Dary espera que su hijo pueda acceder a la universidad, además de poder mejorarle la calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Luz Dary is married and the mother of two children aged 13 and 17, whom she has always wanted to provide with everything they need.  Luz Dary has worked in agriculture for a large part of her life, and works alongside her husband selling cattle and growing some vegetable crops.

As her older son has completed his basic education and wants to be able to attend university, Luz Dary wants to take maximum advantage of her household's land to be able to generate extra income for her household.  Luz Dary has an adequate pen that previously held chickens for sale, and she wants to return to this business to generate extra income with which she can provide her son with a university education.

Luz Dary hopes that a loan will provide her with the opportunity to purchase chickens to raise and later sell, and in this way she can generate increased income which will allow her to provide her son with access to a university education.

Luz Dary hopes that her son will be able to attend university, and also that she will be able to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase chickens to raise and later sell, and in this way she can generate increased income which will allow her to provide her son with access to a university education.

loans.name: Mohpari

texts.ru: Мохпари замужем и любящая мать двоих детей. Она очень хорошая и добрая женщина. Около пяти лет она занимается купля продажей детской и мужской одежды. Бизнес начала с 300 Сомони, торговала носками и постепенно перешла на детскую одежду. Муж помогает  по перевозке товаров в бизнесе. Мохпари запрашивает займ в размере 2000 Сомони для покупки товара с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Mohpari is married and the loving mother of two. She is a very nice and kind woman. For about five years, she has been buying and reselling children’s and men’s clothing. She started out  in business with 300 TJS. She used to sell socks and eventually switched to children’s clothing. Her husband helps her transporting the wares. Mohpari is requesting a loan in the amount of 2,000 TJS in order to stock up on wares and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing for resale

loans.name: Ndèye Madeleine

texts.fr:
L’emprunteur est une dame de 60 ans qui s’active dans le commerce depuis plus de 12 ans. Elle se nomme Ndèye Madeleine  et loge à coté du guichet. Elle veut profiter d’un pèlerinage qui se tient chaque année et où les commerçants  vendent de la marchandise à des prix très abordables. Elle y va pour acheter des tissus .Mais concernant son commerce de tous les jours, elle se ravitaille en Mauritanie et achète des draps de lit, du basin teinté.
Ndèye Madeleine appui son époux dans  la gestion de la dépense quotidienne. Elle aimerait beaucoup diversifier ses produits et services pour avoir une bonne assise.
texts.en:
This borrower is a 60-year-old lady who has been engaged in commercial activities for over twelve years. Her name is Ndèye Madeleine, and she lives near the local branch. 

She wants to take advantage of the annual pilgrimage where merchants offer reasonably-priced goods, and where she plans to buy fabrics. As for her daily activity, she buys bed sheets and dyed basin in Mauritania.

Ndèye Madeleine assists her husband in managing the daily expenses. She would like to diversify her range of products and services in order to strengthen her activity.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and bed sheets.

loans.name: Honofre

texts.en:
Honofre is a responsible father who aimed to become progressive in the future.  He is now 52 years old and has three grown-up children. He is one of the farmers who raised his family in a village. He cultivates their farm lots by planting rice and vegetables for sale.  Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, he also engages in a hog-raising business to earn additional income for his family.  Being a hard-working father, he educates all his children despite problems and difficulties they encountered in life. 

Despite this, he wants to continue and improve the business to satisfy the family's daily needs and save for future emergencies.  He wants to ask for additional capital of P15,000 to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog-raising.  He mentioned that the loan would be a great help for him to improve the business.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog-raising

loans.name: Benedicto

texts.en:
Due to financial burden, Benedicto became involved in the hog-raising business to earn additional income for his family. He is a farmer who lives in a village with his four children.  Together with his wife, they planned to upgrade their poor living condition so that they will give their children a better life. They aimed to improve their sources of income so that they will become financially stable someday. 

In this regard, Benedicto aimed to improve his hog-raising business to earn and save more income to satisfy the family's necessities. He wants to ask for a loan of P15,000 to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog-raising. He hopes that this loan will help him to improve the business.  He also hopes that his business will become successful someday.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog-raising

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en:
Florencia manages a sari-sari store business from which she sells a variety of goods in her village. She is selling products like soap, shampoo, spices, breads and drinks. She has been doing this type of business for almost 6 years. Her profit from the business has served as allowances for her two children from the time she has sent them to school.

Florencia observed that the items of goods she buys in the market did not satisfy the demands of her costumers. She doesn’t have enough capital to buy the volume of goods able to satisfy her costumers' needs. In this connection, Florencia wishes for a loan of 30,000 PHP to buy additional spices, drinks and soap to sell in her village. She believes that through the loan, she will gain higher income from the business.

loans.use: to buy additional spices, drinks and soap to sell

loans.name: Rorn

texts.en:
The breadwinner of a big family, Rorn is a 58-year-old mother of eight children. She has four dependent children and one of her children is in school and three others are working as motor taxi drivers and factory workers in Thailand. To provide for her family, Rorn has been a farmer for almost the past 15 years. This is her primary source of income but she also works as a tailor to provide additional income. Rorn's husband also helps to generate income by selling traditional herbs. 

Rorn is requesting her fourth loan with VisionFund. She is requesting 2,000,000 KHR to hire farm labor to harvest her rice crop and to buy piglets to raise. She successfully repaid her previous loan that helped increase her crop yield provide savings to start her future pig-raising business. Rorn hopes to earn more profit and set aside some money to save for the future.

loans.use: to hire farm labor and buy piglets

loans.name: Myriam Lucelly

texts.es:
Myriam es una persona que siempre se ha preocupado por ofrecerle el mejor bienestar a su familia. Es por esto que siempre ha buscado la manera de colaborar a su esposo con la generación de ingresos para el hogar, pues los ingresos que genera su esposo no son suficientes para poder sostener los gastos de sus 2 hijos de 1 y 9 años de edad. Myriam actualmente trabaja en un cultivo de legumbres que tiene en la parte trasera de su casa, los cuales vende a un muy buen precio y esto le ayuda a contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Con el ánimo de aprovechar el terreno de su hogar, Myriam aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de ganado para criarlos y venderlos y poder generar así ingresos extras para su hogar. 

Myriam espera que de esta manera pueda contribuir con un aporte económico mayor a su hogar, y de esta manera pueda ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Además, Myriam espera que sus hijos puedan acceder a una educación de calidad y en un futuro poder ofrecerles una vivienda, una buena educación y una estabilidad económica que les permita progresar.
texts.en:
Myriam is someone who has always focused on providing the best for her family's well-being.  Is is for this reason that she always looked for ways to share with her husband in generating income for their household, as the income that her husband earns is not sufficient to be able to cover the expenses for their two children, aged 1 year and 9 years old.  

Myriam currently works growing vegetables, which she does behind her home.  She sells them at a very good price, and this has helped her in contributing financially to her household.  With the goal of being able to take advantage of her household's land, Myriam is hoping that a loan will provide her with the possibility of purchasing cattle to raise and sell, and in this way she will be able to earn extra income for her household.

Myriam hopes that in this way she will be able to contribute a larger financial amount to her household, and in this way she can provide her family with a better quality of life.  Myriam hopes that her children will be able to have access to a quality education, and that in the future she will be able to provide them with a home, a good education, and financial stability that will allow them to progress in life.


Myriam espera que de esta manera pueda contribuir con un aporte económico mayor a su hogar, y de esta manera pueda ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Además, Myriam espera que sus hijos puedan acceder a una educación de calidad y en un futuro poder ofrecerles una vivienda, una buena educación y una estabilidad económica que les permita progresar.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to raise and sell, and so be able to generate additional income for her household.

loans.name: C9268 Ukurinyako Group

texts.en:
Bernadette is 28 years old and married with three children between the ages of two and eight. For the past two years, she has run a well-organized small shop where she sells goods such as juice, soap, salt and other items. Bernadette works from five in the mornings through six in the afternoon every day. She employs one person to help her. Bernadette is the president of her loan group called "C9268 Ukurinyako" in the local language. In this photo, she is on the right side. 

Bernadette is requesting a loan from Kiva lenders through the Vision Finance Company to purchase rice, soap, salt, sugar, cooking oil, and other items to sell. She will reinvest the profits from her loan into her business.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, soap, salt, and other items to sell

loans.name: Marlen Yuriana

texts.es:
Marlen es una persona que ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de trabajar y salir adelante le han permitido superarlas y lograr progresar junto con sus hijos. Marlen es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijos de 12 y 7 años, pues el padre de sus hijos la abandonó hace un tiempo sin contribuir económicamente para el sostenimiento de sus gastos. Marlen, a pesar de que ya contaba con un empleo el cual le generaba ingresos para su hogar, se vio en la obligación de generar ingresos extras para el sostenimiento de sus hijos, pues con el salario que le pagan en su empleo no es suficiente para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar. Es por esto que Marlen inició su negocio de venta de productos de uso personal a través de catálogos, los cuales ofrece a sus amigos, vecinos y familiares. De esta manera, Marlen puede garantizar unos mayores ingresos para su hogar, lo que le permite poder ofrecerles a sus hijos todo lo que necesitan. Marlen, gracias a su buen servicio, ha podido captar muy buenos clientes, los cuales le hacen muy buenos pedidos. Con el ánimo de responder a un pedido que le ha hecho un cliente, Marlen busca un préstamo que le permita acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal como lociones, maquillaje, cremas, entre otros, para poder responder a un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente.

Marlen espera que de esta manera pueda seguir generando los ingresos que necesita para ofrecerles a sus 2 hijos una mejor calidad de vida y poder ofrecerles el acceso a una educación de mayor calidad.
texts.en:
Marlen is someone who has had to overcome many adversities in her life, however, her desire to work hard and get ahead has allowed her to overcome obstacles and succeed in moving forward with her children. Marlen is a single mother and head of household, with two children who are 12 and 7 years old. The father of her children abandoned her some time ago without contributing economically towards the family's expenses. Even though she already had a job which was supplying her with income for her household, she needed to find a source of extra income to support her children because the salary she was receiving in her other job was not enough to cover all of the expenses. It was for this reason that Marlen started her business selling personal hygiene products from catalogs, which she offers to her friends, neighbors and family. In this way Marlen is able to guarantee higher income for her family, which allows her to provide her children with everything that they need. Thanks to the good service Marlen offers, she has been able to secure good customers, who make good orders. With the desire to respond to an order that was made by a customer, Marlen is requesting a loan that will allow her to buy personal hygiene products like lotion, makeup and creams among other things, to be able to fulfill a large order that was made by a customer.  

Marlen hopes that as a result she will be able to continue earning the income that she needs to offer her children a higher quality of life and to be able to offer them access to higher quality education.

loans.use: to buy personal hygiene products like lotions, makeup and creams among other things, to be able to respond to a large order that has been made by a customer.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is 30 years old, married and gifted with three young children. She and her husband planned to strengthen their sources of income so that they will become financially stable to support their family needs. Being a responsible mother, Jennifer engages in a hog-raising business to supplement her husband's income. She has been in this business for almost 2 years and typically earns profits of 8,000 a month that she usually spends for the food, clothing and allowances of their children. 

She aimed to continue and improve her business so that she will earn a higher income. Due to inadequate capital, she is asking for a loan of P12,000 to buy feed, vitamins, vaccines and additional piglets to raise. She believes that through patience and hard work, she will improve her business someday.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, vaccines and additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Celso

texts.en:
Celso is 49 years old, a mixed crop farmer who is married to Leonora, a fellow farmer. They are blessed with a child. He has been in the farming business for the past three years with a monthly income of 5,000 PHP, which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for a loan of 15,000 PHP. He will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for his farm. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his child. His hopes and dreams are to venture into pig rearing, which will help him improve the living standard of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings for his farm business

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is proud that he is a farmer. He has devoted almost 20 years of endurance and hard work to his rice fields and has been able to earn a living. Daniel is grateful because he has been blessed with four children. His wife manages a sari-sari (variety) store to provide the family with an additional income source. 

Daniel is requesting a 27,000 PHP loan to purchase farm supplies such as fertilizer and insecticide. His loan will help him provide proper crop nutrition to obtain a higher harvest yield. Daniel hopes that he will  keep producing plentiful crops and earn more income to improve his family's lives and save for emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as fertilizer and insecticide

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
To make a living, Emmanuel plants and harvests rice crops to sell. He has been in this business for five years and earns approximately 18,000 PHP seasonally. Emmanuel is young and single. He joined ASKI to access financial services to help him improve his living situation and enable him to gain greater profit.

Emmanuel is requesting a 27,000 PHP loan to buy farm inputs and pay labor costs to prepare his land and transplant one hectare of his rice field. He believes that his loan will make his farm more productive and profitable. Emmanuel hopes to save some funds to serve as capital for the next crop season.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs and pay labor costs

loans.name: Ninfa Del Rocio

texts.es:
Ninfa es una persona que se ha caracterizado por tener una gran creatividad, y gracias a esto ha podido sacar su negocio adelante ofreciendo muy buenos productos. Ninfa se dedica desde hace aproximadamente 11 años a la actividad de la confección y elaboración de bisuterías, y gracias a esto contribuye con los ingresos para sostener los gastos en su hogar, donde convive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos. Ninfa es reconocida por ofrecer un muy buen servicio y gracias a esto ha podido tener una gran cantidad de clientes, los cuales le hacen grandes pedidos de su negocio. Con el ánimo de seguir aumentando sus ventas, Ninfa ahora está fabricando un nuevo producto de su negocio, y este ha tenido muy buena acogida por parte de sus clientes, pues hasta el momento tiene grandes pedidos de sus clientes que algunos no ha podido satisfacer por la falta de materiales de trabajo. Con el ánimo de fabricar los grandes pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes, Ninfa aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de materia prima para la fabricación de sus productos de confección y bisutería y responder así a los grandes pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes. 

Ninfa espera que su negocio siga aumentando sus ventas y pueda seguir generando una buena calidad de vida en su familia. Además, Ninfa espera que si sus ingresos aumentan pueda ofrecerle a sus hijos una mejor educación y en un futuro el acceso a una educación universitaria. Ninfa sueña con tener un gran negocio el cual pueda generar mucho empleo para las personas más necesitadas y en el cual sus hijos puedan obtener una estabilidad económica y grandes oportunidades para progresar.
texts.en:
Nifa is characterized by her great creativity, and thanks to this, she has been able to forge ahead with her business and offer excellent products. Ninfa has made clothes and costume jewelry for about 11 years. It has allowed her to contribute an income to cover the household expenses, which consists of her husband and three children. Ninfa is known for her good customer service. She has been able to gain a large number of customers, who make a lot requests from her business. With the goal of increasing her sales, Ninfa is making a new product for her business, which has been well received by her customers. 

So far she has many requests from her customers, but she has not been able to fill some of them because of a lack of working materials. In order to fill the many orders from her customers, Ninfa wants to take out a loan to purchase raw materials for making clothes and costume jewelry. Ninfa hopes that sales through her business will continue increasing and continue allowing her family to enjoy a good quality of life. Ninfa also hopes that if her income increases, she can offer her children a good education, and in the future, send them to college. Ninfa’s dream is to have a large business which can create jobs for those most in need. She also aims to use her business to give her children economic stability and opportunities for advancement.

loans.use: Purchase raw materials for tailoring and costume jewelry making so that she can fill the many requests from her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cattle to raise and sell, and in this way be able to contribute economically to her household.

loans.name: Arnulfo

texts.en:
Arnulfo is married and the father of four children that he has to support every day. He has devoted a great part of his life to farming and hog-raising. 

On his land he has three breeding stock, in addition to crops. Thanks to this, Arnulfo is able to generate enough income to meet his household expenses.

Arnulfo sells his crops to customers who are steady, and always do very well from their dealings with him. With the aim of satisfying the orders from some of his customers, Arnulfo is seeking to increase his crop to be able to deliver a greater amount of product to his customers. This is why he is seeking to buy seed and fertilizer for his crops. 

However, Arnulfo does not have sufficient working capital for these purchases, so he hopes the loan will provide him the opportunity to buy seed and fertilizer to increase his crop and be able to meet his customer orders.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings for his farm business

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa siempre ha sido una persona que se ha caracterizado por querer ofrecer a su familia una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que se esfuerza diariamente en su trabajo para poderlo sacar adelante y generar ingresos para su hogar. Rosa se encuentra casada y es madre de 1 hijo, a quien actualmente le está pagando la educación universitaria. Rosa, con el ánimo de contribuir económicamente a su hogar, decidió montar desde hace un tiempo un negocio de comidas rápidas, el cual se ha consolidado en su sector gracias a la buena atención que ofrece y a la buena calidad de sus productos. Debido a que sus ventas han sido muy buenas, Rosa ya genera un empleo para una persona que es muy necesitada y no tuvo oportunidades laborales, y espera en un futuro generar más puestos de trabajo. Rosa con el ánimo de seguir atendiendo su negocio, aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de insumos para la preparación de sus comidas rápidas. 

Rosa espera que de esta manera su negocio siga creciendo y siga teniendo muy buenos niveles de ventas, para poder ofrecerle a su hijo el acceso a una educación universitaria. Rosa sueña con tener un gran negocio donde genere mayor empleo para las personas más necesitadas y desde el cual puede ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Rosa is a person who has always been characterized as wanting to provide her family with a good quality of life. That is why she makes an effort every day to get ahead and to earn an income for her home. She is married and the mother of one son whose university education she is currently paying for. 

Rosa decided to start a fast food business a while ago in order to contribute financially to her home. She has been able to establish herself in the sector thanks to good service and the fine quality of her food. Because of very good sales, she has also created employment for a very needy person who lacks other job opportunities. She hopes to generate more jobs in the future. 

With the goal of continuing to run her business, Rosa aspires that the loan will enable her to buy ingredients to prepare her fast food. In this way she expects that her business will continue to grow and generate very good sales so that she will be able to provide her son with a university education. Rosa dreams of having a large business where she can generate more employment for the most needy people, while providing her family a better quality of life and greater economic stability.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to prepare her fast food.

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is 41. He lives in Burgos village, with his wife and school-age children. George has a mini store where he trades food and household goods. He is also engaged in farming. His wife helps her husband in his businesses. Thanks to his occupations, George is able to support his family.  Now he intends to develop his farm. So he needs a 20,000 PHP loan to buy more seedlings and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seedlings for his farm business

loans.name: Kholmurot

texts.ru: Холмурот трудолюбивый и добросовестный семьянин. Более 10 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. Он имеет землю и там выращивает пшеницу и картофеля. Холмурот хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль для того чтобы улучшить благосостояние семьи. Холмурот запрашивает займ в размере 2000 Сомони для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений и топливо. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Kholmurot is a hardworking and conscientious family man.  He has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over ten years.  He has land and grows wheat and potatoes there.  Kholmurot wants to expand his business in order to make a good profit, so that he can improve his family's welfare.  Kholmurot is requesting a loan in the sum of 2000 Somoni to buy seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a la atención de su venta de chócolo y legumbres, con lo cual ha podido generar los ingresos de su hogar, donde convive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos. Miguel tiene como clientes principalmente a restaurantes y cafeterías de su municipio, y con esto ha podido captar un muy buen número de clientes. Gracias a su buena atención, y a la buena calidad de sus productos, Miguel ha podido tener muy buenos niveles de ventas, lo que le ha permitido generar muy buenos ingresos para su hogar y ser muy reconocido en su municipio. Un cliente suyo le ha hecho un gran pedido que no puede satisfacer con el inventario con el que cuenta actualmente, es por esto que Miguel aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de chócolo y legumbres para satisfacer un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente.

Miguel aspira a que su negocio siga creciendo de esta manera, para poder generar ingresos con los cuales siga ofreciéndole a su familia una buena calidad de vida, además de garantizarle a sus hijos una buena educación.
texts.en:
Miguel has dedicated a large portion of his life to selling vegetables and corn on the cob. This has allowed him to earn an income to support his wife and two children. Miguel’s main customers are restaurants and cafes in his municipality, and through this, he has been able to acquire a large number of customers. Thanks to his good services and the good quality of his products, Miguel has been able to have good sales levels, letting him earn a good income for his family and be recognized within his municipality. One of his clients has put in a large order that he is unable to fill with his current inventory. This is why Miguel want to take out a loan; he wants to buy corn on the cob and vegetables to fill this customer’s order. 

Miguel hopes that his business will continue to grow as it has been. He wants to earn income to continue providing his family with a good quality of life as well as to ensure a good education for his children.

loans.use: purchase corn on the cob and vegetables to satisfy a large order that a client has made

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es: Josefina, originaria de Pueblo Nuevo municipio de Estelí, de oficio comerciante. Nos comparte el cambio que le produjo su primer crédito Kiva, que garadece mucho ese apoyo, el cual utilizo para comprar ropas nueva y cosméticos para surtir su tienda incluso pudo invertir en compra de calzado para vender y ofrecer variedad esto le ha permitido ampliar su negocio y mejorar poco a poco sus ingresos. Siempre sigue con su meta de ampliar aun mas su negocio es por ello que solicita este crédito para comprar ropa y calzado sobre todo en esta época escolar donde el zapato y uniformes para la escuela es muy buscado por sus clientes. Pues una mujer que desea salir adelante con su negocio sobre todo de darles una buena educación universitaria a sus hijos para que ellos salgan adelante.
texts.en:
Josefina, who is originally from Pueblo Nuevo in the municipality of Estelí, works in retail.  She shares with us the change that her first Kiva loan effected, for which she is very grateful.  She used it to purchase new clothing and cosmetics to stock up her store, including being able to purchase shoes to sell and provide variety.  This has allowed her to expand her business and bit by bit improve her income.

She is always continuing with her goal of growing her business further, and it is for this reason that she is requesting this loan to purchase clothing and shoes, especially as it is the school season when school shoes and uniforms are much in demand by her customers.

She is a woman who wants to move ahead in life with her business; above all she wants to give her children a good university education so that they can get ahead in life.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Isa

texts.ru: Иса трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. У него очень большая семья, на воспитании имеет семерых детей. Более 3 лет он занимается выращиванием и продажей сельхозпродукции. Является владельцем бизнеса и начал бизнес с куплей продажей мелкого и крупного рогатого скота. Затем постепенно начал заниматься выращиванием кукурузы и пшеницы. Затем расширял разные виды сельхозкультур такие как кукурузы, пшеницы, арбузы, дыни и арахиса. В данное время он имеет дехканское хозяйство. Иса запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений, горюче-смазочных материалов и оплаты труда работников. А также на остальную сумму хочет купить крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Isa is a hardworking and conscientious person.  He is raising seven children and has a large family.  He has been involved in growing and selling agricultural crops for over three years.  He is the owner of this business and started it with buying and selling small livestock and cattle.  Then, he gradually became involved in growing corn and wheat.  Then, Isa expanded various types of agricultural crops, such as corn, wheat, watermelons, cantaloupe and peanuts.  Currently, he has a dekhan farm.  Isa is requesting this loan to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and to pay for his employees' work.  Also, he wants to use the rest of the money to buy cattle.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Oulèye

texts.fr:
Madame Oulèye fait parti des plus anciennes clientes du guichet ou elle a eu à bénéficier de plusieurs crédits pour améliorer son commerce. Madame Oulèye est née en 1953, est mariée et a de grands enfants qui sont tous majeurs .Cela ne l’empêche pas de continuer son activité par amour qu’elle exerce depuis plus de 15 ans. Cette dernière qui consiste à acheter pour revendre et transformer des céréales : du mil, du mais ; elle en fait du couscous, de la bouillie épaisse qui est très prisé par l’entourage. Elle vend aussi au marché, du pain de singe, de l’oseille et des fruits de la période comme on voie sur la photo : du jujube ou autre selon la saison.
Elle ne laisse pas ses enfants gérer  la dépense quotidienne à eux seul ,elle leur donne un coup de main grâce aux bénéfices acquis .Elle travaille pour améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Oulèye is among the earliest members of the local branch where she obtained many loans to bolster her activity. Born in 1953, she is married and the mother of adult children. 

She loves the activity she has been practicing for over 15 years, and still does to this day. It consists in buying millet and corn, which she turns into couscous and thick porridge for sale to the locals with whom these products are very popular. She also sells « pain de singe » (baobab fruit), sorrel and seasonal fruit (such as jujube, a type of date) at the market, as shown in the photo. 

She doesn’t let her children handle the daily expenses on their own; she helps them with her own income. She strives to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cereals, pain de singe, sorrel and seasonal fruits for resale.

loans.name: Norman Ivan

texts.es:
Norman, 37 años de edad, casado, de oficio zapatero es originario de Granada tiene una hija a su cargo de 3 años de edad. Inicio su actividad con el apoyo de su suegra y su papa ya que necesitaba independizarse para cubrir los gastos y necesidades de su hogar a la edad de 24 años, este ha sido su primer negocio en el que le apoya su papa y su suegra su producto lo comercializa en Managua no tiene otros ingresos, le gustaría trabajar con clientes de otros departamentos como: León, chinandega. Ya que le han dicho que esos lugares es rentable. 

Solicito el crédito para compra de materiales (cuero, suela y pegamento) para elaborar zapatos. Este crédito le permitirá incrementar las ventas principalmente en esta temporada de colegio en  que se necesita mas inversión para poder cubrir los pedidos, le gustaría tener un taller en el que pueda producir fuera del país, seguir trabajando para poder cumplir sus planes a futuro.
texts.en:
Norman, 37 years old, is married and works as a cobbler. He was born in Granada and takes care of his 3 year old daughter. He started his trade when he was 24 years old with the help of his mother-in-law and father because he needed to become independent to be able to cover the expenses and needs of his home. This has been his first business with support from his father and mother-in-law. He sells his products in Managua, and doesn’t have any other form of income. He would like to work with customers from other areas, like Leon and Chinandega, since he has heard that those places are profitable. 

He asked for this loan for the purchase of materials (leather, soles and glue) for shoemaking. This loan will allow him to increase sales, especially during this school season, when a higher investment is needed to meet orders. He would like to have a workshop so as to manufacture outside of the country, and wants to keep working to be able to accomplish his plans for the future.

loans.use: to purchase materials (leather, soles and glue) for shoemaking.

loans.name: Macaria

texts.en:
Macaria and her spouse are both business-oriented people.  She manages a small store selling grocery items to the locals at their village while her spouse is raising hogs to fatten and re-sells for profit.  Macaria runs her store daily starting as early as 6 o'clock in the morning and finishes up to 7 o'clock in the evening.  She usually sets aside her daily profits for meals and allowances for her two children. 

She is now asking for a loan of P15,000 to buy grocery items and a refrigerator to use in her store.  A refrigerator will help beverages and soft drinks remain salable. 

Someday, Macaria hopes to have funds for house renovations and most of all, to provide a good education for their children.

loans.use: to buy grocery items and a refrigerator to use in her store.

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en:
Clarita is a married woman who engaged herself in a retail store for business.  She sells grocery items to the people in her village.  Clarita runs her store on weekdays and on weekends.  She goes down to the market to sell vegetables for additional income.  She is financing the education of her two children so she is trying to generate an income from the business.  Clarita's spouse is a farmer growing rice to sell.

Clarita is now asking for a loan of P28,000 to buy additional items to sell such as eggs, beverages, canned goods, and biscuits.  Though she has several competitors, she is confident enough that she will earn good profits from her business through affordable prices and the friendly service she renders to her customers.

Hopefully, she can meet all their demands and continuously educate her children.  She will be very proud to see them become professionals someday.

loans.use: to buy eggs, beverages, canned goods, and biscuits to sell in her store.

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia is 50 years old.  She is married and has seven children.  Three of them work while the others are studying.  She is a housewife, and remains at home to do her household responsibilities.
Her husband operates a cold drink stall in the market where he offers fresh cold drinks and juices to his customers.
Razia has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband who will buy cold drinks in a larger quantity.  He will also buy some chairs and tables to provide better sitting arrangements for his clients.
He has been operating his business for many years and Razia is confident that the loan investment will help him to make his business more profitable.

loans.use: To buy cold drinks for a corner business.

loans.name: Abida's Group

texts.en:
Abida has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s livestock business.  With the loan investment he will buy a buffalo which will allow him to produce larger quantities of milk to sell.
Abida also supports her family financially by operating a sewing business.  She has great technical skills and sews beautiful looking clothes.  Due to her good quality work, she receives regular orders every month.
She has given birth to three children.  Two of them are studying while her youngest daughter has not started her education yet.
Abida is very hopeful about the positive growth of her husband’s business as a result of this loan investment.
Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Abida.

loans.use: To buy a buffalo for a livestock business.

loans.name: Hameedan's Group

texts.en:
Hameedan has requested a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her son’s business.  He drives a tractor and delivers different kinds of goods like fruits, vegetables, crops, and the like, from one place to another.
With the loan investment, he will buy new tractor tires which will allow him to perform his work better and offer better quality service to his customers.
Hameedan stays at home and performs her household duties.  She is a very active, caring lady and takes care of her family very well.
She is hopeful that her son will be able to increase his income after investing in the loan as he is the only earning person in the family.
In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Hameedan.

loans.use: To buy tractor tires for a transport business.

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en:
Asmaa is a 41-year-old woman. She is a mother of two sons and two daughters. Her husband is a worker who earns an income, but not enough to cover the family's expenses. For the past five years, Asmaa has been raising and selling laying hens and eggs, which has been a profitable project.

Asmaa is requesting a loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing a bulk of laying hens and expanding and improving the coop's condition. This will increase sales and improve the family's income. Asmaa and her husband Mahmoud appear in her Kiva profile photo.

loans.use: To purchase laying hens, and to improve and expand the coop

loans.name: Ameen

texts.en:
Ameen is a 45-year-old man. He is a father with one son and one daughter. For the past five years, Ameen has operated a grocery store selling groceries, toys, and simple home appliances. This has been a profitable project and the only source of income to the family.

Ameen is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a collection of groceries, toys, and home appliances to resell. This will increase sales and improve the family's income. Ameen is photographed in his store.

loans.use: To purchase groceries, toys, and home appliances to resell

loans.name: Factor Emilio

texts.es:
Factor Emilio es una persona que siempre se ha preocupado por ofrecerle a su familia una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que se esfuerza diariamente en su trabajo para generar ingresos suficientes que le permitan ofrecerle a su familia todo lo que necesitan. Factor Emilio se encuentra casado y es padre de 4 hijos, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena educación. Factor Emilio, debido a las pocas oportunidades de empleo que se le presentan, decidió montar desde hace aproximadamente 10 años una tienda general donde ofrece todo tipo de productos de la canasta familiar. Al principio montar la tienda fue un gran reto, pues Factor Emilio no contaba con el capital suficiente para esto, sin embargo, sus ganas de trabajar le permitieron poco a poco ir aumentando la variedad de productos que ofrece. Factor Emilio tiene el sueño de poder llegar a tener un supermercado, por lo que cada vez que su tienda se lo permite le aumenta la variedad de productos que ofrece y le realiza mejoras locativas para cumplir este sueño. En esta oportunidad Factor Emilio busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar para aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.

Factor Emilio espera que con el préstamo su tienda pueda ofrecer mayor variedad y cada vez pueda estar más cerca de cumplir su sueño de tener un supermercado. Además, Factor Emilio espera que con ingresos extras pueda ofrecerle a su familia mayores oportunidades de progresar y pueda generar empleo en su tienda para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Factor Emilio is someone who has always focused on providing his family with a good quality of life.  It is for this reason that he strives on a daily basis with his work to earn sufficient income that will allow him to provide his family with everything they need.  Factor Emilio is married and the father of four children, whom he has always wanted to provide with a good education.

Owing to the few employment opportunities that presented themselves, Factor Emilio decided to set up a general store approximately ten years ago, where he offers all types of everyday products for the family for sale.  At first, setting up the store was a huge challenge, as Factor Emilio didn't have sufficient capital for it.  However, his desire to work allowed him bit by bit to increase the variety of products that he offers for sale.  

Factor Emilio has the dream of being able to have a supermarket, so every chance that his store allows, he increases the variety of products that he offers for sale and undertakes improvements to his store location to achieve his dream.

On this occasion, Factor Emilio is looking for a loan that will provide him with the possibility of purchasing everyday products to increase the variety of products that he offers for sale to his customers.

Factor Emilio hopes that with the loan, his store will be able to provide more variety, and each time he gets closer to accomplishing his dream of having a supermarket.  In addition, Factor Emilio hopes that with the extra income, he will be able to provide his family with better opportunities to progress in life, and he will be able to create employment in his store for those who most need it.

loans.use: to purchase everyday household products to increase the variety of products that he offers for sale to his customers.

loans.name: Jhon Jairo

texts.es:
Jhon Jairo es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y siempre querer brindar a su familia una buena calidad de vida. Jhon Jairo se encuentra casado y es padre de 2 hijos de 6 y 8 años, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer todo lo necesario. Jhon Jairo anteriormente trabajaba en una empresa de textil, pero debido a circunstancias adversas tuvo que abandonar su empleo y empezar a buscar otro medio de ingresos para su familia. Hace aproximadamente 6 años, Jhon Jairo montó una tienda general donde ofrece toda clase de productos de la canasta familiar y gracias a esto genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Con el ánimo de seguir aumentando la variedad de productos que ofrece en su tienda, Jhon Jairo aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar para aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.

Jhon Jairo espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente y siga generando ingresos con los cuales le pueda ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Además, espera que sus hijos tengan la oportunidad de acceder a una educación de calidad y en un futuro poder ingresar a una educación universitaria. Jhon Jairo sueña con tener un gran supermercado en el cual pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y de esta manera pueda ofrecer una mejor calidad para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Jhon Jairo is noted for being a very hard-working person who wants to provide his family with a good quality of life.  He is married and has two children who are 6 and 8 years old.  He has always wanted to offer them everything they need.  Jhon Jairo used to work for a textile company but, due to unfavorable circumstances, he had to leave his job and start looking for another way to make income for his family.  Approximately six years ago, he set up a general store where he sells all kinds of basic household products and makes the income he needs to support his household.  With the aim of continuing to increase the variety of products he sells, Jhon Jairo is looking to take out a loan which will allow him to buy basic household products for his store.

Jhon Jairo hopes that his income will increase significantly so that he can offer his family a better quality of life.  He also hopes that his children will be able to receive a good education and go to university in the future.  Jhon Jairo dreams of owning a large supermarket where he can create jobs for people in need and provide them with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic household products so that he can increase the variety of products he offers his customers

loans.name: Eman

texts.en:
Eman is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Yahiya appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Eman is a 31-year-old young woman, and she is a mother with two sons and one daughter. Her husband is a worker who gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's costs. Eman is requesting a loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing some necessary home appliances such as a stove and refrigerator. This will improve the family's home living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase necessary home appliances

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make some necessary repairs to the house

loans.name: Leidy Natalia

texts.es:
Leidy es una persona que siempre ha tenido interés en adquirir habilidades comerciales, por lo que desde temprana edad empezó a vender productos de uso personal a sus familiares y amigos, y de esta manera pagaba sus gastos del estudio durante un tiempo. Actualmente, Leidy ha montado un taller de confección y presta el servicio de confección a terceros y gracias a esto genera los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Leidy tiene un gran cliente el cual le hace muy buenos pedidos, por lo que Leidy siempre ha confeccionado la misma prenda de vestir. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus trabajos, Leidy ha podido contactar con otro gran cliente el cual requiere de la confección de unas prendas diferentes a las que confecciona Leidy con su cliente actual. Es por esto que Leidy aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina de 2 agujas la cual le permita confeccionar otro tipo de prendas y pueda confeccionarle a un segundo cliente.

Leidy espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá atender a un mayor número de pedidos y por ende tendrá mayores ventas. Además, Leidy espera que en el corto plazo pueda generar un puesto de trabajo en su taller y de esta manera pueda mejorarle la calidad de vida a otra persona.
texts.en:
Leidy is a person who has always been interested in acquiring sales skills.  When she was young she started selling personal products to her family members and friends and this is how she covered the cost of her studies for some time.

Leidy currently has a dressmaking workshop where she provides a dressmaking service to third parties.  Through her business, she makes the income she needs for her household.  Leidy has a big customer who places very good orders.  For this reason, she has always made the same item of clothing.  Thanks to the good quality of her work, she has been able to make contact with another big customer who needs her to make some different garments from those she makes for her current customer.  Leidy hopes to receive a loan which will allow her to buy a double needle machine for sewing other types of clothing for her second customer.

Leidy hopes that her income will increase significantly as she will be able to fill a larger number of orders and therefore make more sales.  In addition, she hopes to create a job for somebody else in her workshop in the near future.  This will enable her to improve somebody else's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a double needle machine which will allow her to make other types of garments for a second customer

loans.name: Shagufta's Group

texts.en:
Shagufta has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s grocery store business.  With the loan investment, he will buy grocery items such as salt, sugar, cooking oils, and snacks for the further improvement of his business.  This will allow him to fulfill the client's orders ontime and increase his sales and profits.
Shagufta is a housewife, and stays at home to take care of her household responsibilities.  She is very efficient and takes care of her family very well.
She has given birth to three children.  All of them are enrolled in the local school and are continuing their education.
She is very hopeful that her husband will make good use of the loan and successfully be able to increase his sales and profits.

loans.use: To buy grocery items for a grocery selling business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase a gas stove and supplies for preparing food.

loans.name: Flor Bibiana

texts.es:
Flor es una persona que a pesar de las adversidades que le ha presentado la vida, ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando en su vida. Flor es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 1 hijo de 4 años, pues su padre los abandonó hace un tiempo sin realizar ninguna contribución económica. Desde entonces, Flor tuvo que empezar a generar mayores ingresos para sostener los gastos de su hogar, pues los ingresos que generaba anteriormente no le alcanzarían para el sostenimiento de sus gastos junto con su hijo. Flor trabajaba como empleada en una empresa de confección, allí adquirió la experiencia y gracias a esto tomó la decisión de independizarse y montar su propio negocio. Flor montó su negocio de confección donde ofrece el servicio de confección a terceros, y gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, su taller tiene muy buen reconocimiento en su región. Una de las máquinas con las que trabaja Flor ya se encuentra un poco vieja, y ha hecho que Flor gaste mucho dinero en el mantenimiento que requiere. Es por esto que Flor busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina plana la cual le permita seguir trabajando sus productos con buena calidad.

Flor espera que de esta manera sus ingresos mensuales aumenten, pues no tendrá que generar tantos gastos por el mantenimiento de la máquina vieja. Además, Flor espera que con mayores ingresos le pueda ofrecer a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progresar, además de en un futuro acceder a una educación de calidad.
texts.en:
Flor is a person who, in spite of the adversities she has faced, has had the strength to move forward and continue to progress in life.  Flor is a single mother and head of household.  She has a son who is four years old.  His father abandoned them without ever making a financial contribution.  Since then, Flor has had to start earning more income to cover household expenses since her earnings before weren't enough for both her and her son.  

Flor used to work as an employee of a clothing company.  There she gained experience which allowed her to make the decision to work independently and to start her own business.  Flor set up a tailoring business, where she offers the service of manufacturing to third parties, a form of production that is set as a commitment by the owner of the production and / or a brand with the person performing the work.  Thanks to the high quality of her work, her shop is very well known in the area.  

One of the machines Flor works with is a little outdated, requiring that Flor spend a lot of money on its maintenance.  For this reason, Flor is seeking a loan that will permit her to acquire a new machine for manufacturing high quality products.

Flor hopes that her monthly income will thereby increase and that she won't have to spend so much on the maintenance of the old machine.  Furthermore, Flor hopes that increased earnings will allow her to provide her son a better life and more opportunities for advancement, in addition to access to a quality education in the future.

loans.use: to buy a new machine that will allow her to make high quality products.

loans.name: Paula Andrea

texts.es:
Paula es una persona que se ha caracterizado por tener muy buenas habilidades comerciales y siempre buscar que su negocio este creciendo. Paula se dedica desde hace aproximadamente 6 años a la elaboración de artículos en cuero como son billeteras, bolsos, carteras entre otros, y gracias a  esto genera los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Paula, gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos y a la buena atención que ofrece, ha podido captar muy buenos clientes, lo que le ha hecho generar muy buenas ventas. Algunos de sus clientes ya le han permitido que exporte sus productos a otros países y gracias a esto ha tenido muy buenos ingresos. Paula, con el ánimo de participar en una feria donde puede exhibir sus productos a un gran público, aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de materias primas como cuero, pinturas, entre otros, para elaborar una buena cantidad de productos para exhibir en una feria que participará.

Paula espera que en esta feria, si muestra buena cantidad de productos, pueda captar un buen número de clientes y de esta manera pueda seguir aumentando sus ingresos y seguir creciendo con su negocio. Además, Paula espera generar más empleo para las personas más necesitadas y seguir mejorándole la calidad de vida a otras personas que requieren de unos ingresos.
texts.en:
Paula is noted for having very good sales skills and she is always looking to grow her business.  For approximately six years, she has been making leather goods such as billfolds, bags, purses, etc.  Thanks to this work, she makes the income she needs for her household.  As she produces good-quality products and offers good customer service, Paula has been able to attract very good customers and made very good sales.  Some of her customers have already allowed her to export her products to other countries and this has made her very good income.  Paula would like to take part in a craft fair where she will be able to exhibit her products to a large number of people.  She hopes to receive a loan that will allow her to buy raw materials such as leather, paints, etc. so that she can make a large quantity of products to exhibit in this craft fair.

Paula hopes that if she displays a large number of products, she will be able to attract a good number of customers and so continue increasing her income and growing her business.  She also hopes to create jobs for people who need them and continue improving the quality of life of other people who need to make income.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as leather, paints, etc. to make a good quantity of products to exhibit at a craft fair

loans.name: Shazia's Group

texts.en:
Shazia applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her clothing business.  With the loan investment, she will buy clothes in larger quantities and of more variety.  This will allow her to attract more clients and increase her sales and profits.

She lives with her brother, who has a mobile repairing business.  She did not want to become a burden on her brother, and that is why she started her own business a few years ago, which is now well established.  She is very experienced in her business and confident that the loan investment will be productive for her.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding the book called Asasah Passbook is Shazia.

loans.use: to buy clothes for her clothing business.

loans.name: Rosalba

texts.es:
Rosalba es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre querer generar un bienestar para las demás personas. Desde hace aproximadamente 13 años se dedica a la actividad de la panadería, pues trabajaba como empleada en una panadería de la cual decidió independizarse para montar, desde hace aproximadamente 3 años su propia panadería. Rosalba ha montado su panadería con mucho esfuerzo, y gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, actualmente cuenta con un muy buen número de clientes. Rosalba, con el ánimo de aumentar sus ventas, busca producir otros productos en su panadería, para lo que requiere la compra de materias primas. Es por esto que Rosalba busca un préstamo que le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de materias primas e insumos para la elaboración de panes y así aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece en su panadería. 

Rosalba espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá ofrecer a sus clientes diferentes alternativas para consumir. Rosalba sueña con generar más empleo en su panadería y poder mejorarles la calidad de vida a más personas.
texts.en:
Rosalba is a person who has been characterized as being very hard-working and as always wanting to create well-being for other people. For approximately 13 years, she has worked in baking, since she worked as an employee in a bakery. About 3 years ago she decided to become independent and start her own bakery. Rosalba has started her bakery with a lot of effort, and thanks to the good quality of her products, she now has a very good number of customers. Rosalba, with the goal of increasing her sales, is looking to produce other products in her bakery, for which she needs to purchase raw materials. It is because of this that Rosalba is looking for a loan that will allow her to buy raw materials and supplies to make bread and thereby increase the variety of products that she offers in her bakery.

Rosalba hopes that in this way her income will increase considerably, since she will be able to offer her customers different alternatives to consume. Rosalba dreams of creating more employment in her bakery and of being able to improve the quality of life for more people.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials and supplies to make bread and thereby increase the variety of products that she offers in her bakery.

loans.name: Jose Raul

texts.es:
Jose, de oficio agricultor, es habitante de la comarca llamada el Consuelo localizada en Pueblo Nuevo municipio de Estelí, el tiene 44 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos de 13,12 y 11 años respectivamente. El se dedica a la siembra de maíz, frijoles y café. Actividad que aprendió desde muy por joven por tradición de sus padres quienes se ha dedicado a trabajar en el campo, su esposa lo apoya con las siembras y las tareas del hogar.
El realizo el crédito para compra de insumos y pago de mano de obra para siembra de una plantación de café. El espera una cosecha de buen rendimiento y calidad que le permita vender su café orgánico a un buen precio, ya que desea ir ampliando las areas de siembra poco a poco pues la inversión es grande y el quiere hacerlo que los recursos disponible para luchar por mejorar la calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jose is a farmer.  He lives in an area called el Consuelo which is in Pueblo Nuevo, Estelí.  He is 44 years old and has three children who are 13, 12 and 11 years old.  His business is growing corn, beans and coffee.  He learned this business when he was very young from his parents who also worked in agriculture.  Jose's wife helps him with his crops and with the household chores.

Jose requested this loan to buy supplies and pay laborers to sow some coffee crops.  He hopes to enjoy a high yield of good-quality crops from his harvest which will allow him to sell his organic coffee at a good price.  He would like to continue expanding the area of land on which he grows his crops.  He will do this gradually as the necessary investment is large and he would like to do it with the resources he has available so that he can work hard and improve his children's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies and pay laborers to sow his coffee crops

loans.name: Haya

texts.en:
Haya is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her son Shareef appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Haya is a 48-year-old woman, who is divorced and has four sons.  Her older son Shareef, who is 19 years old, is a worker with a low salary, which is not enough to cover his expenses. Haya has very old furniture at home, which is not suitable. She wants to change it and purchase new furniture instead such as new living room seats and new bedroom furniture for her sons. So she is requesting a US $1,500 loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing new home furniture. This will improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase new home furniture to replace her old furniture.

loans.name: Maria Cenobia

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que ha tenido que trabajar gran parte de su vida para poder salir adelante con su familia. Maria se encuentra casada y es madre de 3 años, a los que siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena educación. Debido a que el salario de su esposo no era suficiente para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar, Maria se vio en la obligación de comenzar a trabajar para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar. Anteriormente trabajaba como empleada para una empresa, pero por circunstancias de salud tuvo que abandonar el empleo. Sin embargo, debido a la necesidad de generar sus ingresos, desde hace aproximadamente 18 años Maria inició su negocio de venta de productos de uso personal por catálogo, el cual le ha permitido aportar económicamente a su hogar y de esta manera poder pagarle los estudios a sus hijos. Maria tiene muy buenos clientes, lo que le garantiza muy buenas ventas. Con el ánimo de satisfacer un pedido de un cliente, Maria aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal como lociones, maquillaje, desodorantes, cremas, entre otros para atender un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente.

Maria espera que de esta manera pueda seguir generando los ingresos necesarios para su hogar, y poder seguir pagando los estudios universitarios de sus hijos. Maria también espera poder mejorarle la calidad de vida a su familia y ofrecerles una mejor estabilidad económica. Maria sueña con tener un buen negocio ubicado en un local donde pueda exhibir sus productos al público y donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Maria is a person who has had to work a great part of her live in order to be able to get ahead with her family.  Maria is married and has three children.  She has always wanted to offer her children a good education.

Because her husband’s salary was not enough to be able to pay the household expenses, Maria saw the need to start working in order to be able to pay the household expenses.  She used to work as an employee of a company.  However, she had to leave that job for health reasons.

Nevertheless, out of the necessity to generate income Maria started, approximately 18 years ago, a business of selling personal use products by catalog.  This has allowed her to contribute to her household and pay for her children’s education.  Maria has very good customers, which guarantees her good sales.

With the intention of filling a customer’s order, Maria seeks a loan to buy personal use products like lotions, make-up, deodorants, and creams, among others.  She will do this in order to take care of a large order her customer has placed.

Maria hopes that this way she will be able to continue generating the necessary income for her household.  She also hopes to be able to continue paying for her children’s university education.  Additionally, she hopes to improve her family’s quality of life and to offer them better financial stability.

Maria dreams of having a good business located in a spot where she is able to display her products to the public.  She also dreams of being able to generate work for those people most in need.

loans.use: to buy personal use products like lotions, make-up, deodorants, and creams, among others in order to take care of a large order her customer has placed.

loans.name: Alcides De Jesus

texts.es:
Alcides es una persona que siempre ha querido ofrecerle a su familia una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que se esfuerza todos los días en su trabajo. Alcides se encuentra casado y es padre de 3 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido permitir el acceso a una educación de calidad. Hace aproximadamente 7 años inició con su tienda general, donde ofrece toda clase de productos de la canasta familiar. Poco a poco ha ido incrementando la cantidad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes y de esta manera poder generar mayores ingresos para su hogar. Con el ánimo de aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes, Alcides busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar para aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.

Alcides espera que de esta manera pueda ofrecer a sus clientes una tienda más atractiva y de esta manera incremente sus ventas. Alcides sueña con poder ofrecerles a sus hijos una buena educación universitaria y seguirlos sacando adelante para que progresen y tengan una estabilidad económica en sus vidas.
texts.en:
Alcides is a person who has always wanted to offer his family a good quality of life. This is why he works hard every day in his job. Alcides is married and is the father of 3 children. He has always wanted to provide them access to a quality education. Approximately 7 years ago he started with his general store, where he offers all kinds of staple household goods. Little by little he has been increasing the quantity of products he offers his customers. In this way he can generate a larger income for his household. Alcides is looking for a loan that will give him the opportunity to buy staple household goods in order to increase the variety of products that he offers his customers.

Alcides hopes that in this way he can offer his customers a more attractive store and thus increase his sales. Alcides dreams of being able to offer his children a good university education and to continue moving them forward so that they progress and have economic stability in their lives.

loans.use: to purchase staple household goods in order to increase the variety of products he offers his customers.

loans.name: Tha's Group

texts.en:
Tha is 54 years old and is living in a village of the Tbaung Khmum district of Cambodia.  She is a married mother of four children; two of whom are still dependent and in school.  She earns a living through farming rice and running a small scale grocery business to supplement her income.  Having been in this business for 21 years, she now earns US$3 per day from her current business. 

Tha took a first loan with VisionFund in 2011 and successfully repaid the loan.  Now she is leading a group of four members and requesting a new loan of KHR 1,200,000.00.  As the leader, she will use the entire loan to buy additional grocery items for sale such as soaps, biscuits, and canned foods.  She hopes to earn more income and make a better living.

loans.use: To buy additional grocery items for sale.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Nazia's Group

texts.en:
Nazia is very supportive and helps her husband in operating an animal sales business.  She gives the animals food on time and keeps their living place clean.
She also sews clothes in her spare time and earns a reasonable amount of income which helps her to pay utility bills.  She has given birth to a daughter who is studying in the seventh class.
Her husband wants some money to invest in his business, so Nazia has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah.  With the loan investment, he will buy goats and sheep in larger numbers.  He will sell the animals for a profit to butchers after growing them.
He is very experienced in his business and Nazia is confident that he will have more success in his business after investing in the loan.

loans.use: To buy sheep and goats for an animal sales business.

loans.name: Nizar

texts.en:
Nizar is a 47-year-old man.  He is married and has no children. For the past three years, Nizar has had a garden shop where he sells customers different types of seedlings and flowers.  This is a profitable project and his only source of income. 

Nizar is requesting a US $1,000 loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing other types of seedlings and flowers that have been requested by his customers and to purchase pots in bulk. This will provide Nizar's business with a better selection, which will help to increase sales and improve his family's income.  Nizar is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To purchase different types of seedlings and flowers as well as flower pots for resale.

loans.name: Maria Aracelly

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y lograr superar las adversidades que le ha presentado la vida con sus ganas de salir adelante. A sus 50 años de edad, Maria es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijos de los cuales 1 se encuentra estudiando en la universidad, la cual gracias a la dedicación por el trabajo de Maria pueden pagar. Maria siempre ha querido poder ofrecerles a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida, y desde el momento en que murió su esposo tuvo que trabajar para poder generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Maria se dedica a la venta de helados (ice cream) durante el día, y en las noches saca un carro de comidas rápidas, y de esta manera puede generar los ingresos suficientes para poder ofrecerles a sus hijos una buena educación y una buena calidad de vida. Gracias a la buena atención de Maria, ha podido captar una buena cantidad de clientes, lo que ha hecho posible tener muy buenas ventas. Con el ánimo de surtir su venta de helados (ice cream) con un mayor surtido de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes, Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de helados (ice cream) para surtir su negocio con una mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes.

Maria espera que sus ingresos mensuales no se vean afectados y pueda seguir mejorando su negocio de modo que sea más atractivo para sus clientes. Además, Maria sueña con poder ofrecerles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y a su hijo menor el terminar la educación universitaria.
texts.en:
Maria is a person who is known for being very hard-working and for managing to overcome, with a great desire to get ahead, the adversities that have presented themselves in her life.  At her 50 years of age Maria is a single mother and head of her family with two children.  One of them is studying at the university.  Thanks to Maria’s dedication to her work they are able to pay.

Maria has always wanted to be able to offer her children a good quality of life.  From the moment her husband died she had to work in order to be able to generate the income needed to support her household.  Maria sells ice cream during the day.  At night she takes out a fast food cart.  This way she is able to generate enough income to offer her children a good education and a good quality of life.

Thanks to Maria’s service she has been able to get a good number of customers, which has made it possible to have very good sales.  Maria is seeking a loan with the intention of stocking her ice cream sales business with more products to offer her customers .  The loan will give her the opportunity to buy ice cream to stock her business with a variety of products to offer her customers.

Maria hopes that her monthly income does not suffer and that she will be able to improve her business, making it more attractive for her customers.  Also, Maria dreams of giving her children a better quality of life and of her youngest son finishing his university education.

loans.use: to buy ice cream to stock her business with a variety of products to offer her customers.

loans.name: Safeeran's Group

texts.en:
Safeeran has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her animal sales business. With the loan investment, she will purchase goats and sheep of smaller age. She will raise by giving them good quality food and will sell to butchers once they become older and healthier.
