Her husband’s is a tailor and also does embroidery. He is well known in his community for his good quality work and receives good number of orders every month.
Safeeran has given birth to 4 sons. Her eldest son is a mason while her remaining 3 sons are studying.
She is very hardworking lady and confident about her business success as a result of a loan.

loans.use: To buy animals for animal sales business

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Pedro tiene 67 años de edad, es casado con tres hijos. Él se ha dedicado durante toda su vida a la agricultura y pecuario, lo aprendió de su familia ya que son ganaderos de nacimiento. Se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. todos los días, pues tiene un molino y tiene que atender a los clientes, luego se traslada a los terrenos a trabajar para cultivar.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para arrendar 14,000 metros cuadrados de terreno, pagar mano de obra para limpiar el terreno y cultivar maíz. Al asegurar el terreno podrá cultivar y generar ganancias para su familia ya que será un ingreso extra y dispondrá de maíz todo el año, aparte de los ingresos que recibe del molino.

Él espera que de la cosecha de maíz, poder obtener un buen ingreso, para mejorar una vivienda que tiene comenzada para dejársela de herencia a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Pedro is 67 years old, and is married with three children.  He has worked all his life in agriculture and raising livestock, which he learned from his family who have raised livestock from birth.  He gets up at 4:00 a.m. every day, as he has a mill and needs to serve his customers.  Later he goes to his fields to work at cultivating them.

The loan he is requesting at Fundacion Campo is to lease 14,000 square meters of land and pay workers to tidy up the land and plant corn.  Once the land is secured he will cultivate it and generate income for his family.  This will provide extra income as well as corn all year round, in addition to the income that he receives from the mill.

He hopes to receive a good income from the corn harvest, in order to improve a home that he has begun building to leave to his children as an inheritance.

loans.use: to lease 14,000 square meters of land, and pay workers to tidy up the land and grow corn

loans.name: Azra's Group

texts.en:
Azra has requested for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her tea selling business. She imports tea from other cities in bulk quantity and sells to her local area clients and at different general and grocery stores for profit.
With the loan investment, Azra will buy tea at a wholesale price and will sell for higher profits.
Azra has been operating her business for the past many years and confident that her business will be improved further after investing the loan.
Her husband has a motorbike rental business. He rents motorbikes to his clients and charges on and hourly basis.
Azra has given birth to 4 children. All of them are enrolled in local school.
She is very confident that her business will be improved after receiving the loan and she will be able to continue providing education to her children.

loans.use: To buy tea for tea selling business

loans.name: Fatima's Group

texts.en:
Fatima is married and has three sons. Her eldest son is studying while the others are not of school-going age yet. She is a very hardworking lady and sews clothes for her community clients. She learned about this art from her mother and now she uses her skills very well to earn income for her family.
She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will buy a new sewing machine that will allow her to complete the orders on time and increase her profits. She has been operating her business for the past many years and is confident that by purchasing a new sewing machine, she will be able to work more efficiently and increase her income.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Fatima.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Khaleel

texts.en:
Khaleel is a 31-year-old young man who is married and a father of one daughter. For the past four years, Khaleel has a store for selling fruits and vegetables, which has been a profitable project, but not enough to cover the family's costs.

Khaleel is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing fruits and vegetables in bulk that his customers usually request. This will offer Khaleel a better collection of fruits and vegetables, which will increase sales and improve the family's income positively. 

Khaleel is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To purchase fruits and vegetables to resell

loans.name: Duo Monte Oreb Group

texts.es: Duo Monte Oreb. Este duo esta integrado por la señora Ruth Anabella de 32 años,es soltera ella se dedica a la elavoracion de tejidos tipicos a mano,desde hace 10 años,esta contenta porque nuevamente esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos, ya que con la ayuda que le dieron con el credito anterior pudo aumentar su capital,al igual que la siguiente socia esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos.
texts.en:
Duo Monte Oreb.

This duo includes Ruth Anabella, 32 years old, who is single and has worked at hand-making traditional woven items for 10 years.  She is happy to be requesting a loan again to buy raw materials to produce woven items, because with the help provided to her by the previous loan she was able to increase her capital.  

The second partner is also requesting a loan to buy raw materials for the production of woven items.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for the production of woven items.

loans.name: Beeban's Group

texts.en:
Beeban has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her brother’s food restaurant business. With the loan investment, he will purchase utensils, and food-making ingredients that will allow him to provide better quality food and increase his profits.

Beeban is a housewife who remains at home and does her household responsibilities. She is very efficient and raising her four children very well. Two of her children are studying while the others remain at home.

She is very hopeful that her brother will make good use of the loan money and increase his monthly profits.

loans.use: To buy utensils and food ingredients for the restaurant

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
Mirian es una persona que se ha caracterizado por tener un gran carisma y siempre querer ofrecer a su familia una buena calidad de vida. Mirian es una mujer casada y es madre de 1 hijo de 18 años de edad, a quien siempre le ha querido cumplir el sueño de ingresar a una educación superior. Mirian se dedica desde hace un tiempo a empacar productos como clavos, tornillos, agujas, entre otros, en paquetes que luego vende a reconocidos almacenes de su municipio, y gracias a esto genera ingresos con los cuales contribuye económicamente al sostenimiento de su hogar. Mirian ha podido captar muy buenos clientes gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, lo que le ha permitido tener muy buenos niveles de ventas. Debido a que la pesa donde calcula la cantidad de productos que contiene una bolsa se ha averiado, Mirian aspira a la que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una pesa que le permita seguir desempeñando su actividad de la mejor manera.
Mirian espera que de esta manera su negocio le siga suministrando los ingresos que necesita para ofrecer a su familia unos ingresos con los cuales les pueda mejorar su calidad de vida, además, espera que con mayores ingresos pueda cumplir el sueño de su hijo de acceder a una educación superior.
texts.en:
Mirian is a person known for her great charm, and for always wanting to provide her family with a good quality of life.

She is married, and the mother of an 18-year-old son. She has always wanted to help him fulfill his dream of pursuing higher education.

Mirian has worked for some time packing products such as nails, screws, needles, and other products in packages that she then sells to well-known stores in her town. Thanks to this, she generates income with which she contributes financially to the support of her household. 

Mirian has been able to attract very good customers, thanks to the good quality of her products, which has allowed her to have very good sales volumes. 

Because the scale where she calculates the quantity of product per bag has broken down, Mirian hopes that a loan will enable her to purchase a scale. This will allow her to continue performing her work in the best way possible. 

Mirian hopes that in this way, her business will keep supplying the revenue she needs to provide her family with income so they can improve their quality of life. In addition, she hopes that with more income she can fulfill her son's dream of pursuing higher education.

loans.use: To buy a scale that will allow her to continue performing her work in the best way possible.

loans.name: Hawa

texts.fr:
Cette cliente est âgée de 39 ans, elle est mariée et mère d'un enfant, elle se lance dans la coiffure quand elle arrête ses cours en classe de troisième,et elle rentre dans un cours d'apprentissage de coiffure.
Deux ans après l'obtention de son certificat, elle ouvre son propre salon de coiffure.

Elle est une cliente de Hope depuis plus d'une année, elle est a son quatrième cycle de prêt et ces prêts ont apportés d'important changement dans sa vie sociale et a améliore ses conditions de travail.

Avec ce nouveau prêt, elle  va acheter un nouveau appareil a soin de visage, un nouveau casque , 50 l de démêlants, 50l de defrisants, des postiches, mèches et tissages.
Elle a de très bonne stratégie de travail, elle a su fidéliser ses clients et fait des promotions chaque weekend ,elle emploie a l'heure actuelle plus de 10 aide coiffeuses qui apprennent auprès d'elle. 

Tres entreprenante, elle emploie environ plus d'une dizaine des eleves stagiaires qui travaillent sous ses ordres, elle pense a ouvrir un autre salon de coiffure
texts.en:
This client is 39 years old, married, and mother of one child. She stopped her studies just short of high school, and began to pursue hairdressing by taking a class to learn how to become a hairdresser. Two years after obtaining her certification, she opened her own hair salon.

She has been a client of Hope for over one year now. She is in her fourth loan cycle. The previous loans have brought about a big change in her social life, and they have improved her working conditions.

With this new loan, she will buy a new facial toning device, a new drier, 50L of conditioner, 50L of hair straightening cream, hairpieces, hair extensions, and hair weaves. She has a very good work strategy. She has built a loyal customer base, and she has special offers every weekend. She currently employs over ten assistant hairstylists who are learning under her tutelage.

She is very entrepreneurial and employs over ten apprentice hairstylists who work under her command. She is thinking about opening another hair salon.

loans.use: to buy a new drier, facial toning device, 50L of hair straightening cream, conditioners

loans.name: Juan Fernando

texts.es:
Juan Fernando es una persona muy trabajadora que siempre se ha caracterizado por querer sacar su familia adelante y siempre buscar una mejor calidad de vida para sus padres. Juan Fernando se dedica desde hace aproximadamente 5 años al taller de herrajes en el que trabajaba su padre, el cual le enseñó la actividad y cuando ya no tenía capacidades para seguir trabajando lo heredó a Juan Fernando. Desde entonces Juan Fernando es el encargado del taller y gracias a la calidad de sus productos y el buen servicio que ofrece ha ido aumentando sus clientes con el pasar del tiempo. Juan Fernando tiene muy buenos pedidos en su taller y gracias a esto ha podido generar los ingresos para su hogar, pero a veces sus clientes le hacen más pedidos de los que puede responder por la poca capacidad de producción que tiene. Con el ánimo de mejorar este aspecto, Juan Fernando quiere comprar materias primas para aumentar la capacidad de producción que tiene y poder responder a todos los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes, sin embargo, no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar estas compras, es por esto que busca un préstamo que le permita acceder a la compra de materia prima como lámina de acero para su taller de herrajes.

Juan Fernando sueña con tener un gran taller y poder vender sus productos a otros municipios, de modo que pueda generar ingresos para las personas que más lo necesitan y poder ofrecerles a otras personas vulnerables una mejor calidad de vida y oportunidades de progresar económicamente.
texts.en: Juan Fernando is a very hard working person that has always been known for his wish to get his family ahead in life and his wish to improve the living standard of his parents. Juan Fernando has been working for approximately the last five years in the forge where his father used to work. His father taught him the job and left the forge to Juan Fernando when he found himself unable to work. Ever since, Juan Fernando has been in charge of the forge and thanks to the good quality of his products and the good service he offers, the number of his clients has increased over time. Juan Fernando receives a very good number of orders through his forge and thanks to this, he has been able to generate an income for his home, but sometimes his clients place more orders than what he can fulfill because of his limited production capacity. With the objective of improving on this aspect, Juan Fernando wants to buy raw materials to increase his production capacity and be able to fulfill all the orders he receives. However, he cannot afford the purchase. This is why he requests a loan that enables him to buy raw materials like sheet metal for his forge. Juan Fernando dreams with having a large forge and being able to sell his products in other municipalities, so that he can generate income for the people who need it the most and can offer to other vulnerable people a better quality of life and opportunities to progress economically.

loans.use: to buy raw materials like sheet metal for his forge.

loans.name: Shameem's Group

texts.en:
Shameem is married and has 3 sons. Her eldest son is a driver while the other 2 remain at home. Due to financial constraints, Shameem couldn’t provide them education. She herself is a housewife and remains at home and does her household responsibilities. She is very efficient and tries her best to give comfort to her family. 

She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her son, who is a rickshaw driver and wants to buy a new rickshaw body for his rickshaw. This will allow him to offer better transport services to his passengers and increase his income. He has been operating his business for many years and Shameem is confident that her son will get more success in his business after investing the loan.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Shameem.

loans.use: to buy a rickshaw body to improve rickshaw transport business

loans.name: Gilma

texts.es:
Gilma es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre querer ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Gilma es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijas de 11 y 15 años de edad, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena educación, y a quienes su padre abandonó hace un tiempo sin hacer ninguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento. Gilma trabaja como empleada en un negocio de comidas rápidas, y al ver la necesidad de generar mayores ingresos para su hogar, aprovechó la experiencia que tenía para montar hace aproximadamente 2 meses su propio negocio de venta de comidas. Gilma ha montado su negocio con muy bajo capital y con mucho esfuerzo, sin embargo, la buena calidad de sus productos le han permitido captar un buen número de clientes los cuales, a menudo, les demandan más productos de los que ella está en la capacidad de preparar. Es por esto que Gilma busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de insumos para la preparación de comidas rápidas y ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes. 

Gilma espera que de esta manera pueda aumentar sus ingresos, pues ofrecerá mayor variedad para sus clientes. Además, Gilma espera que con unos mayores ingresos pueda ofrecerles a sus 2 hijas una mejor calidad de vida y el acceso a una mejor educación. Gilma sueña con poder ofrecerles a sus hijas el acceso a una educación universitaria y una estabilidad económica que les evite pasar por las adversidades que tuvo que pasar ella.
texts.en:
Gilma is a person who has been described as being very hardworking and who always wants to give her family a better quality of life.  She is a single mother, head of the household, with two daughters, ages 11 and 15, whom she always has wanted to give a good education, and whose father abandoned them some time ago without making any financial contribution for their support.

Gilma works as an employee in a fast-food business.  Upon seeing the necessity of generating greater income for her household, she made the most of the experience she had to set herself up selling food approximately two months ago.  Gilma has set up her business with very little capital and great effort.  Nevertheless, the good quality of her products has allowed her to acquire a good number of customers, who often request more products than what she has the ability to prepare.

This is why Gilma is looking for a loan that will give her the possibility of being able to buy supplies to prepare fast food and offer a greater variety of products to her customers.

Gilma hopes in this way to be able to increase her earnings, because she will offer greater variety to her customers.  Gilma also hopes that with greater income she will be able to offer her two daughters a better quality of life and access to a better education.  Gilma dreams about being able to offer her daughters access to a university education and a financial stability that will keep them from experiencing the adversities that she had to.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make fast food and offer a greater variety of products to her customers.

loans.name: Sobia's Group

texts.en:
Sobia is married and has 2 daughters and a son. Her eldest daughter is in nursery class while the others are not of school-going age yet.

Sobia has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will buy a new sewing machine because her current machine has gone rough and needs replacement. Sobia is confident that by purchasing a new sewing machine, she will be able to finish the orders on time and increase her income. Along with her business, Sobia also does her household duties very well. She cooks great food and also cleans her home.

Note: In the photo the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Sobia.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for sewing business

loans.name: Asia's Group

texts.en:
Asia has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her sewing business. Her current sewing machine has become older and she wants to buy a new one. She is confident that by purchasing a new sewing machine, she will be able to complete larger orders on time and increase her profits. She is very skillful and learned the art of sewing before her marriage. Due to her good work, her customers are very happy and give her good money for her work.

Asia is the mother of 2 daughters and 2 sons. All of them are enrolled in local school and getting their education. She is confident that by improving her business, she will be able to continue providing education to her children who will play positive roles in the society after completing their education.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for sewing business

loans.name: Sajida's Group

texts.en:
Sajida has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her business making shoe uppers. With the loan investment, she will buy thread, leather and other raw materials for making better quality shoe uppers in larger quantities. This will help her fulfill the client orders on time and increase her income.

Sajida is the mother of 3 sons and 2 daughters. All of them are enrolled in local school and getting their education. Her husband is a rickshaw driver and provides transportation services to his passengers. Sajida feels a great level of satisfaction that she is able to provide education to her children. She is confident that they will continue their education and will become successful in life in the future.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding the book called Asasah Passbook is Sajida.

loans.use: To buy leather and thread for making shoe uppers

loans.name: Walter Marcelino

texts.es:
Walter, es originario de Palacaguina una pequeña  comarca del Departamento de Madriz, tiene 30 años de edad, es soltero,  de oficio   comerciante, trabaja en un taller de vidriería donde se elaboran puertas y ventanas de vidrio  y otros tipos de materiales metalúrgicos. Su primer crédito Kiva lo utilizo para comprar materia prima para hacer ventanas y puertas de vidrio esto represento un cambio  muy positivo para su negocio logro cumplir con los pedidos que le hicieron sus clientes.  
Ahora solicita este crédito para comprar aluminio, vidrio, tornillos para elaborar, ventanas, puertas, vitrinas y dulceras de vidrio. Pues su trabajo se ha dado a conocer poco a poco y los clientes le esta solicitando que le elaboren diferentes tipos de estantes, puertas y ventanas. El desea aumentar su volumen de producción y ofrecer variedad en sus productos que elabora con este tipo de materiales. Pues tiene como meta ahorrar para adquirir su propio local.
texts.en:
Walter is originally from Palacaguina, a small region in the Department of Madriz. He is 30 years old and single. He runs a business making doors and windows out of glass and different types of metals.

His first loan with Kiva was used to buy materials for making windows and doors. This represented a very positive change for his business as he managed to complete all the orders from his customers.

Now Walter is seeking a loan to buy aluminum, glass, screws, windows, doors, display cabinets, and glass shelving. Through his work he gradually learned more, and his customers are asking him to make different types of shelving, doors and windows. He wishes to increase production and offer a variety of products which he will make from these materials. Walter’s goal is to save enough money to buy his own premises.

loans.use: to buy aluminum, glass, screws, windows, doors, display cabinets, and glass shelving

loans.name: Jhon Geimar

texts.es:
Jhon es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y siempre querer ofrecer un mejor bienestar para su familia. Jhon es padre soltero de su hijo de 9 años, pues su madre los abandonó hace un tiempo. Jhon anteriormente trabajaba como empleado en una empresa, donde según Jhon, su empleo era muy mal remunerado y el dinero que le pagaban no le alcanzaba para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar. Jhon, con el ánimo de generar mayores ingresos para su hogar, se ha independizado y está montando una venta de legumbres, verduras y frutas. Jhon espera que de esta manera pueda generar mayores ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar, y así pueda ofrecerle a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida. Con el ánimo de poder montar su venta de legumbres, verduras y frutas, Jhon espera que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de canastas, y surtido de legumbres, verduras y frutas, además de realizar adecuaciones locativas al local donde montará la venta de alimentos.

Jhon espera que su negocio quede bien montado y pueda ofrecer muy buenos productos a sus clientes, además de generar ingresos con los que le pueda ofrecer a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y una educación de mayor calidad.
texts.en:
Jhon is a very hardworking person who is always looking to provide a better life for his family. He is a single father with a 9-year old son; the mother left them a while ago. Formerly Jhon worked for a company, where, according to Jhon, he was really badly paid. He didn’t even earn enough to cover household expenses. 

To earn more money, he has started to work independently selling vegetables and fruit. He hopes in this way to support his family and provide his son with a better standard of living. Eager to get his business going, Jhon is hoping for a loan to buy staples and a supply of fruit and vegetables. As well he wants to renovate the premises where he sells the produce.

Jhon hopes that his business will carry on doing well and he can offer very good products to his customers. As well, he hopes that with his earnings he can provide his son with a better quality of life and a good education.

loans.use: to buy staples, fruit and vegetables, and do some renovations

loans.name: Eshnazar

texts.ru: Эшназар трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет шестерых детей, из них двое несовершеннолетние. Он занимается купле- продажей скота и этим бизнесом успешно занимается уже 11 лет. Жена занимается домохозяйством, взрослые дети помогают по бизнесу. Эшназар запрашивает займ для покупки скота с целью увлечения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Eshnazar is a hardworking and goal-oriented person.  He is married and has six children, two of whom are adolescent.  He has been involved in buying and selling livestock successfully for 11 years.  His wife is involved in  household work, and the older children help with the business.  Eshnazar is requesting this loan to buy livestock in order to increase his working capital.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Kosar's Group

texts.en:
Kosar is the mother of 3 sons and a daughter. Her sons work while her daughter remains at home and helps Kosar in her household responsibilities. Kosar also operates a sewing business from her home. She is very skilled and makes beautiful clothes for her clients at very reasonable rates. She also supports her husband in his animal sales business. She gives them food on time and cleans their living place everyday.

Kosar has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband, who wants to buy some goats and sheep. He will raise them and sell them to butchers on profit. He is very experienced in his business and Kosar is hopeful that an investment will be more productive for him.

loans.use: to buy goats and sheep for animals sales business

loans.name: Alberto Rodrigo

texts.es:
Alberto inició con su tienda hace aproximadamente 10 años, gracias a que un amigo suyo le regaló el negocio donde trabajaba. De allí, Alberto inició con el negocio que es una choza donde ofrece gaseosas y licores a sus clientes. Alberto, gracias a este negocio, puede garantizar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar donde convive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos. Alberto, gracias a la buena atención que ofrece, ha podido captar muy buen número de clientes, y gracias a esto ha tenido muy buenas ventas. Debido a que el negocio es al aire libre, Alberto no ha podido adecuar su negocio con algunas mesas y sillas para la comodidad de los clientes, pues por no tener donde guardarlas las pueden hurtar en la noche. Gracias a que ahora tiene un lugar donde podría guardar las mesas y las sillas, Alberto busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de mesas y sillas para adecuar su local con estos asientos y poder así atraer más clientes.

Alberto espera que de esta manera pueda generar mayores ingresos, pues podrá ser más atractivo su negocio para los clientes. Además, Alberto espera que con mayores ingresos pueda ofrecerles a su esposa y sus 2 hijos una mejor calidad de vida. Alberto sueña con tener un gran negocio ubicado en un local más grande y donde pueda ofrecer mayor variedad de productos, además de poder generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Alberto opened his store about ten years ago after a friend generously gave him the business. He sells soft drinks and liquor from a hut. Through his earnings Alberto is able to guarantee having enough money to support his home where he lives with his wife and two children. Because he offers good service he has been able to obtain a good number of customers and makes a lot of sales. 

Because the business is in the open air, Alberto hasn’t been able to fit the business with tables and chairs for the comfort of his customers. Similarly, he has had nowhere to keep the furniture so it doesn’t get stolen overnight. Now he has a place where it can be kept safely, Alberto is seeking a loan to buy tables and chairs so he can attract more customers.

He hopes in this way to earn more money as his business will be more attractive. He will then be able to provide his wife and children with a better quality of life. His dream is to own a big store where he can sell a greater variety of products and give jobs to people who most need them.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs for his business

loans.name: Mengbuta

texts.ru: Менгбута женат и ответственный отец четверых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Более 10 лет занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Имеет богатый опыт в этом сфере деятельности. В бизнесе помогают жена, дети, братья и сестры. Менгбута хотел бы получить займ в размере 3900 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений и горюче- смазочных материалов. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Mengbuta is married and a responsible father of four children.  He is a very hardworking and kind person.  He has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over ten years.  He has a rich experience in this business area.  His wife, children, brothers and sisters help with this business.  Mengbuta wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 3900 Somoni to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Aigul

texts.ru:
Айгул 36 лет, воспитывает 4-х  и 2-х летних дочек. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Айгул занимается животноводством.  Начатое со стартовой суммы в 2,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня приносит около 12,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. На данный момент в хозяйстве Айгул  имеется  две коровы и одна лошадь.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айгул обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы. Доходы Айгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Aigul is 36 years old and raising four- and two-year-old daughters.  To provide a source of income for her family, Aigul is involved in animal husbandry.  The business, started with an initial sum of 2,000 som (KGS), today yields about 12,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and milk products.  Currently, Aigul's business has two cows and one horse.  In order to further develop her business, Aigul requested a loan in the sum of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy a dairy cow.  She plans to invest the earnings into increasing livestock headcount further.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase stationery products such as notebooks, pens and construction paper among other items, in order to be prepared for the start of the school year.

loans.name: Francoise

texts.en:
Francoise is 35 years old and is married.  She has five children aged between 10 and 16 years old. Her business is well-organized. She sells food and drinks such as tea, eggs, cakes, bread, etc.  She works from 6am until 10pm every day. Francoise has three years of experience in this business and she currently employs four people to help her. 

Francoise has requested a loan from Kiva partner Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more food and drinks like tea, eggs, cakes, bread, etc. to sell. With any profit from the loan, Francoise will be able to pay school fees for her children and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: buy food and drinks for her cantine

loans.name: Edouard

texts.en:
Edouard is 40 years old and is married.  He has five children aged between 1 and 17. He owns a business selling various goods such as juice, soap, books, pens, etc. This is his twelfth years in this business and he works from 6 am until 11 pm every day. He currently employs one person to help him.

Edouard has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase various goods such as juice, soap, books, pens, etc. to sell. With any profits, he will be able to save for his future and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: buy various goods

loans.name: Sergio De Jesús

texts.es:
El señor Sergio tiene 29 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos, un niño de 9 años de edad y una niña que esta por cumplir los 2 años de edad. Debido a su situación económica, él empezó a trabajar desde muy temprana edad, por eso solo estudio hasta el tercer grado. Su oficio de agricultor, lo aprendió de su papá, eso le ayudo para poder producir el grano para el consumo familiar. De modo que en época seca trabajaba con su papá en las ganaderías de la zona, aprendiendo de esta manera el oficio de corralero, y es lo que desempeña actualmente, se levanta a las 2:30 a.m. para ir a trabajar todos los días, regresando a su casa a las 4:30 p.m.

Los insumos agrícolas los compra en su comunidad, los transporta en una bicicleta hasta cierto punto del camino, luego lo acarrea en su espalda, todo esto lo realiza después de su jornada como corralero.

El señor Sergio solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para construir una vivienda, ya que en la que están viviendo esta en muy mal estado, debido a que esta vieja, sus paredes de adobe se encuentran deterioradas y en invierno se mete el agua, es poco segura y vive con el temor de que se venga a bajo cada día. Así él tendrá una casa segura, para comodidad de su familia y de él, además mantendrá en buen estado lo que humildemente tienen.

En un futuro don Sergio ve a sus hijos preparados académicamente, se esfuerza día a día para poder brindarles esa oportunidad con la que él no pudo contar. Además manifiesta que ya no le gustaría trabajar para una ganadería ajena, dentro de sus metas están trabajar en ganado propio, para así estar más cerca de su familia.
texts.en:
Sergio is 29 years old, is married, and has two children: a 9-year-old boy and a girl who is about to turn 2 years old. Due to his economic situation, he started working at a very early age and, therefore, only attended school until third grade. His trade is farming, which he learned from his father. This helped him be able to produce grain for his family's consumption. During the dry season, he worked with his father in the livestock ranches in the area. In this way, he learned the livestock hand's trade, which is what he currently does. 

Every day he gets up at 2:30 a.m. to go to work and returns home at 4:30 p.m. He buys agricultural supplies in his town, carts them by bicycle to a certain point on the road, and then carries them on his back. He does all this after his workday as livestock hand.

Sergio is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to build a house, as the one they are living in is in poor condition. Because the house is old, its adobe walls are deteriorating, and in the winter, water leaks in. It is not very safe, and each day he lives in fear that it will fall down. This way he will have a safe home for his family's comfort and his own. He will also keep the few things that they own in good condition.

In the future, Sergio sees his children well educated. He works daily to be able to provide them with that opportunity, which he did not have. He also says that he no longer wishes to work at another person's livestock ranch. One of his goals is to work with his own livestock so that he can be closer to his family.

loans.use: to build a house, as the one they are living in is in poor condition.

loans.name: Riffat's Group

texts.en:
Riffat will use the loan for her husband’s dry cleaning and laundry business.  With the loan investment, he will purchase a washing machine that will allow him to provide better quality dry cleaning services to his clients and increase his income.

Riffat is a seamstress.  She sews clothes for her neighboring clients.  She is very skillful and receives a good number of orders every month. She knows about the latest fashion trends and her clients pay her good money for her work.

Riffat has a 19-year-old son who lives at home. Riffat couldn’t provide him an education due to financial constraints.

Note:  In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Riffat.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine

loans.name: Nusrat's Group

texts.en:
Nusrat is 51 year old and has 5 sons and a daughter, 3 of them do different kind of work and contribute financially to the family.  Her other children remain at home. Due to financial constraints, her children had to leave their education after matriculation.

Nusrat is a housewife and stays at home and does her household responsibilities. She is still very active and performs her household duties very well. Her husband is a tailor master and expert in sewing clothes. He has also hired a worker for his assistance.

Nusrat has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her eldest son who is also a tailor and wants to buy a new sewing machine. This will help him complete client orders on-time and increase his profits.  Nusrat is hopeful that her son will make good use of the loan money and will be able to expand his business.

Note:  In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Nusrat.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Shakila's Group

texts.en:
Shakila has requested a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her sewing business. She will buy a new sewing machine that will allow her to finish client orders on time and increase her profits. She is very good in her skills and uses her creativity in sewing.  Due to her good quality work, she receives regular orders every month.

Shakila has given birth to 5 children. Her eldest daughter is a sewing expert while 1 of her remaining children is getting his education.  Her husband runs a local restaurant.  In her spare time, Shakila provides full support to her husband in preparing food.

Shakila is very confident that her business will be improved by purchasing a new sewing machine. She is very hardworking and has full confidence in her abilities.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Alam's Group

texts.en:
Alam has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her sewing business.  She has a great passion for her business and is very skillful in her work. Due to her good quality work, she receives regular orders every month.  With the loan investment, Alam will buy a new sewing machine that will allow her to finish the orders on time and increase her profits. 

Alam is the mother of a son and a daughter. Her son is a tailor while her daughter is studying.  Her husband has a loading business. He puts the goods on his donkey cart and delivers them to their destinations.

Alam is very confident that the loan investment will be a productive one for her and will put a positive impact on her business.

Note:  In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Alam.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia has three children, two of whom stay at home. Her husband is a mason and constructs houses. Razia is an expert seamstress. She sews clothes for her neighborhood clients and earns a reasonable income every month.

Razia is also a member of Razia's Group which is asking Kiva’s partner Asasah for a group loan. (She is the woman in the photo who is holding an Asasah passbook.) She will use her portion of the loan to support her eldest son’s business making school bags. His stitched bags are popular among his clients, and he receives regular orders.

With the loan proceeds Razia’s son will buy thread and cloth to make better quality bags and so increase his sales and profits. Razia is confident that by purchasing raw material in bulk her son will be able to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy thread and cloth for her son's business.

loans.name: Suzan

texts.en:
Suzan is a 34-year-old single woman from Madaba, Jordan.

Suzan has a beauty salon and she is requesting a loan of 1,000 JD to decorate her beauty salon.
.
Suzan is looking to improve her business to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to decorate her beauty salon

loans.name: Duo Fuente De Vida Group

texts.es: Duo Fuente Vida, Este Duo esta Integrado por la señora angela,quien se dedica a la venta de manias y roscas desde hace 10 años,ella nos cuenta que su venta es muy rentable por ese sector,es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas mercaderia para la venta,al igual que la siguientes socias esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas mercaderia para la venta,ya que estan convencidas de que nececitan mas capital para trabajar.
texts.en:
Duo Fuente Vida. Angela, who has been selling peanuts and roscas [ring-shaped cookies] for 10 years, is a member of this duo. She tells us that her sales in that sector are very profitable; therefore, she is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise to sell. 

The other member is also requesting this loan to buy more merchandise to sell, as they are convinced that they need more capital to work.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell, such as peanuts and roscas [ring-shaped cookies]

loans.name: Farzana's Group

texts.en:
Farzana is married and has 2 sons, both are getting their education by attending a nearby school.

Farzana and her husband operate a decorative embroidery business.   Her husband has a shop in the market while she works from her home. Farzana is very skillful and her clients trust her good quality services and give her regular orders.

Farzana has applied for a loan for the further improvement of her business.  With the loan investment, she will buy beads, thread, embroidery frames in larger quantity and of different variety that will allow her to fulfill the latest fashion needs of her clients by preparing beautiful looking embroidered clothes and increase her income.   Farzana has been operating her business for the past many years and she is confident about her business success after investing the loan.

Note:   In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Farzana.

loans.use: To buy beads, threads etc for decorative embriodery business

loans.name: Rashida's Group

texts.en:
Rashida has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s sales business.  He supplies toffees, candies and other grocery items to different grocery and general stores in the market. With the loan investment, he will buy items in bulk quantities to increase his sales and profits. Rashida is very confident that her husband will make good use of the loan investment and will successfully be able to improve his business.

Rashida is a housewife.  She stays at home and does her household responsibilities. She is a very responsible person and her family is very happy with her efforts. She has given birth to 5 children, none of them could get an education due to financial constraints. Rashida wants to send her younger children to school and she is confident that she will be able to do so once her husband’s business gets improved.

Note:  In the photo, the lady holding a book (Called Asasah Passbook) is Rashida.

loans.use: to buy wholesale merchandise

loans.name: Manar

texts.en:
Manar is a 25-year-old married lady. She has two daughters.

She lives in an area that is far from cell phone supplies shops. While most of the people are using mobile phones, it is hard for them to reach to a shop to get a prepaid credit card for their mobiles. So Manar used that to her advantage and started a small business selling those mobile prepaid credit cards to relatives, friends and neighbors.

She has applied for a youth loan to increase the amount of cards she gets so she can cover the needs of the area.

loans.use: to buy more mobile prepaid credit cards

loans.name: Gaudence

texts.en:
For five years Gaudence, a 33-year-old married mother of three children between the ages of 2 and 13, has operated a well-organized business selling cosmetics, mobile phones, etc. She works from 7 a.m. until 8 p.m. everyday except on Saturday and currently employs two people to help her.

Gaudence has requested a loan from Kiva partner Vision Finance Company to purchase more cosmetics, mobile phones, etc. to sell. With any profit arising from the loan, she will be able to pay school fees for her children and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics, mobile phones, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Theogene

texts.en:
Theogene, a 32-year-old married father of two children aged four and six, owns a business selling various goods such as clothes, shoes for men, etc. Working from 6 a.m. until 8 p.m. weekdays, he has owned this enterprise for five years.

Theogene has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company to purchase more clothes, shoes, etc. to sell. With any profits, he will be able to save for his future and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes, shoes for men, etc. to sell.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Farzana's Group

texts.en:
Farzana has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her sewing business.  She will utilize the loan money to buy a new sewing machine because her current machine has become old and she is unable to complete her orders on time.   Farzana is very experienced in her business and is confident that the loan investment will help her increase her sales and profits.

Farzana has given birth a son who is only 3 years old and hasn’t started his education yet.  She a great housewife too and performs her household duties very well.   She is very confident about her future business growth as a result of this loan investment.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Saima's Group

texts.en:
Saima has requested loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s farming business.  With the loan investment, he will buy farm supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, etc. for growing better quality crops and increase his profits by selling them.

Saima is a seamstress.  She sews clothes for her neighboring clients.  She is very skillful and learned sewing skills in her teenage years. Due to her good quality works, she receives regular orders every month.

Saima has given birth to 2 daughters and a son. Her eldest daughter is studying, while others are not of school-going age yet.  Saima is very confident that her husband will successfully be able to improve his business, and that will help her family to live a better life.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies

loans.name: Sonia's Group

texts.en:
Sonia is the mother of two daughters and two sons. Except for her youngest son, all of them are in school. She remains at home and takes care of household responsibilities.

Sonia’s husband runs a computer shop where he provides computer repair services for his customers. He has great technical skills and is very experienced in his business. His customers trust his services and prefer to purchase different computer accessories from him because he offers them at a good price.

Sonia’s group has applied for a 190,000 PKR loan from Kiva’s partner Asasah. She will apply her portion to her husband’s computer shop. With the money, he will buy computers, monitors and other computer accessories such as mouses, keyboards and memory upgrades to sell to his customers.

Sonia is hopeful that her husband will be able to improve his business after investing the loan. She is hopeful she will be able to send her youngest son to school as soon as her husband’s business expands.

loans.use: To buy computers, monitors and other accessories to sell from his shop.

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her business of making plastic bags. With the loan investment, she will buy plastic beans in larger quantity.  That will allow her to fulfill her clients' needs and increase her profits. Her clients are different shopkeepers who use plastic bags for packing.

Razia is a very skillful lady and also knows the art of sewing. She has a sewing machine with which she sews clothes for her neighboring clients in her spare time. Her husband is a mason and constructs buildings and houses on order.

Razia has given birth to 2 sons and 2 daughters. Her eldest son operates a local food selling business, while her remaining children are continuing their education. She is a very experienced and hardworking lady and is confident that her business will grow further after investing the loan.

loans.use: To buy plastic beans to make plastic bags

loans.name: Hameeda's Group

texts.en:
Hameeda is married and is 49 years of age. She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her son who has a loading business. He drives a tractor, which he uses to deliver goods to their destinations. He is a very hard-working person and deals with his customers very professionally.  With this loan investment he will repair his tractor because its engine is creating problems. By doing this, he will be able to provide better loading services to his clients and increase his profits.

Hameeda is a seamstress and sews clothes for her neighboring clients. Her clients give her regular orders every month due to her good quality work.  Her husband sells wood. He operates his business from a shop in the market and sells wood which is used for burning.

Hameeda has 5 other children who do different kind of works to financially contribute to the family.  She is very hopeful that a loan investment will help her son save his precious business assets and improve his income.

loans.use: to repair a tractor

loans.name: Fatima's Group

texts.en:
Fatima has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her grocery store business which she operates from her home.  With the loan investment, she will buy different grocery stock items like sugar, cooking oils, etc. in bulk quantity.   That will allow her to fulfill the client orders on time and increase her sales and profits.

Fatima has given birth to 2 sons and a daughter.   Due to financial constraints, she couldn’t provide an education to her children. Her husband is a paint expert and paints buildings and houses on order.  

Fatima is very confident that by investing the loan into her business, her business will be expanded and she will be able to send her daughter who is 4 years of age to school.

loans.use: to stock her grocery store

loans.name: Suhad

texts.en: Suhad is a 32-year-old woman.  She is married and is a mother to three sons and three daughters.  Her husband is a blacksmith who gets a low income, which is not enough to cover the family's expenses. Suhad is requesting a loan from FATEN to help her cover the cost of purchasing new home furniture such as living room seats and bedroom furniture for her children. This will offer to the family suitable home furniture and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: buy home furniture

loans.name: Vahob

texts.ru: Более 20 лет Вахоб занимается выращиванием и купле- продажей скота. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Кроме скотоводство он занимается земледелием. В основном выращивает ячменя. Отходы от выращивания идут на корм скота. Вахоб хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы улучшить свое благосостояние семьи и с этой целью запрашивает займ в размере 2000 Сомони для покупки семян ячменя и корм для скота. Вахоб надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Vahob has been involved in fattening up and buying and selling livestock for over 20 years.  He is married and raising four children.  Besides animal husbandry, he is involved in farming and primarily grow barley.  The leftovers from farming go toward feeding the livestock.  Vahob wants to expand his business in order to improve his family's welfare. To achieve this goal, he is requesting a loan in the amount of 2000 Somoni to purchase barley seeds and livestock feed.  Vahob relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds and livestock feed

loans.name: Shamshad's Group

texts.en:
Shamshad has requested a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her grocery store business which she runs from her home. She sells different grocery items such as sugar, snacks, candies, cooking oils, etc. at low rates.  With the loan investment, she will buy different grocery items in bulk quantity.  That will allow her to fulfill her clients' orders on time and increase her profits.  Shamshad has been operating her business for some time now and she is confident that her business will be expanded further after investing the loan.

Shamshad is the mother of 3 sons and a daughter, 2 of them work while her younger daughter is studying. Her youngest son is 6 years old and hasn’t started his education yet.   Her husband has a job which earns a low income.    Shamshad wants to provide education to her youngest son and she is confident that she will be able to do so after the improvement of her grocery store business.

Note:  In the photo, the lady holding a book (Called Asasah Passbook) is Shamshad.

loans.use: to restock her grocery store

loans.name: Perveen's Group

texts.en:
Perveen is a widow and operates a clothes selling business. She purchases clothes from the wholesale market and supplies them to her community clients and to different clothes selling shops for profits.

Perveen has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for the further expansion of her business. With the loan investment, she will purchase clothes in bulk quantity and of greater variety. That will allow her to fulfill her clients' needs and increase her profits.  

Perveen is very experienced and has been operating her business for the past many years. Due to her good nature and professional dealings, she is well-known among her clients and receives regular orders.  She is confident that a loan investment will help make her business more profitable.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Perveen.

loans.use: To buy clothes to resell

loans.name: Enelma

texts.es:
Enelma, de 57 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, además de ser alegre y cordial. Está casada con Ulises quien es comerciante y padre de sus 6 hijos quienes ya son independientes.  Juntos viven en su propia casa contando con la visita continua de sus hijos. La actividad que realiza Enelma es la venta de comidas  como desayunos y menús. Para eso cuenta con un restaurante en su propia casa, donde cuenta con varias mesas y sillas, atendiendo a sus clientes con exquisitos platos regionales ganándose sus preferencias por el buen trato que les brinda. Se inicio hace más de 10 años con un capital propio, logrando hacerlo crecer a base de esfuerzo y dedicación y hasta el momento cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo  más 3 ayudantes en la cocina y atención de los clientes.
Considera su negocio bastante rentable por las ganancias que le deja, así como por la clientela que siempre la visitan logrando vender todos sus comidas de manera rápida. Comenta que decidió empezar con su negocio por la necesidad de contar con un oficio y por la buena ubicación de su casa que está en una zona comercial y muy concurrida. Ahora viendo los buenos resultados desea ampliar si negocio y abrir una bodega en el espacio que tiene disponible, de esa manera aumentará sus ganancias. Este será el préstamo número 3 con la institución MFP. Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. 
Con el monto solicitado de 3000 nuevos soles. Lo invertirá en la compra de materiales como listones y tablas para realizar arreglos en su casa y acondicionar una bodega de abarrotes y la mercadería necearia para iniciar con ese negocio, buscando precios cómodos.
texts.en:
Enelma is 57 years old and is a hard-working woman with a lot of desire to get ahead in life. She is also very happy and polite. She is married to Ulises, a salesman and the father of their 6 children who live independently. They live together in their own home and always can count on their children visiting them.

Enelma works selling food such as breakfast and lunch. She has a restaurant in her own home with many tables and chairs, and serves her customers exquisite local dishes, earning their preference with the good service she gives them. She began this business more than 10 years ago with her own savings, making it grow through her hard work and dedication. At this time she has the support of her husband and 3 employees who work in the kitchen and wait on customers. She considers her business to be fairly profitable based on the earnings it provides, and because she has customers who always come to her, so that she is able to sell out of her food quickly. She shares that she decided to start her business out of a need to have her own job and the good location of her house, being in a busy commercial zone.

Seeing the positive results of her business, she wishes to expand and open a grocery store in the space available to her, and in this way she will increase her earnings. This will be her third loan with MFP. She is hoping for a small loan so that she can fulfill her goals. With the requested amount of 3,000 nuevos soles she will buy materials like wood and boards to make repairs to her home and add a grocery store, and also the merchandise necessary for starting that business. She will look for reasonably priced products.

loans.use: buy wood and boards to improve her house's infrastructure, also to stock a store with products to sell.

loans.name: Hernan Dario

texts.es:
Hernan es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y siempre querer ofrecerle un bienestar a su familia. Hernan se encuentra casado y es padre de 3 hijos, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena educación. Hernan trabaja como empleado en el mantenimiento de un acueducto, sin embargo, el salario que recibe no es suficiente para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar. Es por esto que Hernan decidió, desde hace aproximadamente 2 años, abrir una papelería en su casa la cual la atiende en sus tiempos libres y también le ayuda su esposa cuando el no puede atenderla. Gracias a esta papelería, Hernan ahora puede generar mayores ingresos y de esta manera puede ofrecer a sus hijos una mejor educación y una mejor calidad de vida. Debido a que Hernan abrió su papelería con muy bajo capital, no tiene un gran surtido de mercancía, es por esto que ahora que su papelería tiene buenos niveles de ventas, y que sus clientes le preguntan mucho por otros productos que no tiene, que Hernan aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de papelería como cuadernos, cartulina, lapiceros, entre otros y surtir su tienda para ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes. 
Hernan espera que con un mayor surtido sus ventas aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá satisfacer mayores necesidades de sus clientes, además, de que podrá ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Hernan sueña con que su negocio salga adelante, y en un corto plazo le permita generar buenos ingresos para no tener que seguir trabajando en el mantenimiento del acueducto.
texts.en:
Hernan has been characterized as a very hard worker who always wants to provide for his family's wellbeing.  He is married and father of 3 children, to whom he has always wanted to provide a good education. Hernan is employed as a maintenance worker on the water supply lines, but the salary he earns isn't sufficient to cover all of his household expenses.  For this reason, about 2 years ago, Hernan decided to open a stationery goods store in his home.  He works at the store in his free time and his wife helps out when he cannot be there.  Thanks to the store, Hernan is able to generate more income and provide his children with a better education and better quality of life.  Since Hernan opened his store with very little capital, he does not have a very large merchandise selection.  Now that his shop has strong sales and his clients often ask for other products that he doesn't have, Hernan hopes to get a loan that will enable him to purchase products such as notebooks, card stock paper, pencil holders, etc. so that he can stock his store and offer greater variety of products to his customers. 

Hernan hopes that with greater selection, his sales will increase considerably.  He will be able to meet more of his customers' needs and he will be able to offer his family a better quality of life.  Herman's dream is that his business makes progress, and that in the short term he will earn enough money that he will no longer have to work as a maintenance worker on the water lines.

loans.use: to purchase stationery products such as notebooks, card stock paper, pencil holders, etc. in order to stock his store and offer more variety to his customers.

loans.name: Sughran's Group

texts.en: Sughran is a mother of three sons and three daughters. Her eldest son is a mason; the others are students. She is a seamstress who sews clothes for her neighboring clients. In her spare time she also provides full support to her husband who has a business selling buffalo milk. Sughran has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan investment, he will buy a buffalo to increase the milk quantity and sales for more profits. He has been involved in this business for the past many years, and Sughran is hopeful that the loan investment will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: To buy a buffalo for dairy business

loans.name: Lina Victoria

texts.es:
Lina es una joven emprendedora que ha salido adelante a pesar de las dificultades que se le han presentado en la vida, pues tiene un gran carisma y un gran espíritu de lucha. Lina se encuentra casada y es madre de 1 hijo de 5 años, el cual es la motivación para trabajar fuertemente todos los días en su taller. 	Lina, desde el momento en que quedó embarazada de su hijo, encontró en su madre un gran apoyo, pues ella le enseñó la actividad de la confección para poder generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Desde entonces, Lina montó un taller de confección y ha venido prestando el servicio de confección a terceros, y esto le ha permitido ofrecerle a su hijo un buen crecimiento cubriéndole todas las necesidades. Lina, debido a que montó su taller con muy bajo capital, no puede ofrecer a sus clientes todos los servicios, pues aún le faltan algunas máquinas para ofrecer el servicio completo. Con el ánimo de mejorar esta situación, Lina aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina fileteadora y poder así ofrecer un servicio completo a sus clientes.
Lina espera que con esta máquina pueda captar más clientes, pues podrá ofrecer un servicio completo a sus clientes y estos no tendrán que buscar en otros talleres satisfacer sus necesidades. Además, Lina sueña con que su taller crezca y se consolide, de modo que pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y poder así mejorar la calidad de vida de otras personas.
texts.en:
Lina is a young entrepreneur who has gotten ahead despite the difficulties that she has experienced in her life because she has great charisma and a fighting spirit.  Lina is married and mother to one 5 year old son, who is her motivation to work so hard every day in her shop.  From the moment she discovered she was pregnant, Lina received great support from her mother, who taught her how to sew in order to generate an income to support her family.  Lina then set up her own sewing business and has been providing sewing services to third parties.  This has allowed her to provide for her son and raise him well, covering all of his needs.  

Since Lina set up her shop with very little capital, she cannot offer her customers full service, because she does not have some machines.  She wants to improve this situation, so she has requested a loan that will enable her to purchase an overlock machine, and therefore provide complete sewing services to her customers. With this new machine, Lina hopes to attract more customers, as she will be able to offer more services and they won't have to look for another shop to meet their needs.  Lina also hopes that her business grows and becomes stronger, so that it can provide employment opportunities for people who most need them, and in this way improve the quality of life of others.

loans.use: to purchase an overlock machine, so that she can offer more services to her customers.

loans.name: Cristian

texts.es:
Cristian es un joven talentoso que ha visto en su talento una oportunidad de generar ingresos para contribuir con el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Cristian toca diversos instrumentos y ofrece el servicio de dar concierto a sus clientes. Gracias al buen servicio que ofrece, Cristian es reconocido en su municipio y esto le ha permitido captar un gran número de clientes y tener muy buenas ventas. La principal dificultad que tiene es la numerosa competencia con que se encuentra en su municipio, es por esto que se encuentra estudiando para desarrollar sus habilidades y prestar un mejor servicio. Debido a que Cristian no proviene de una familia con grandes capacidades económicas, debe alquilar los equipos de sonido para sus presentaciones. Es por esto que Cristian espera que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de equipos de sonido profesional, con los que pueda ofrecer un servicio de alta calidad a sus clientes.
Cristian espera que de esta manera pueda manejar mejor su dinero, pues ya no tendrá que estar alquilando los equipos de sonido cada que tiene una presentación. Cristian sueña con tener un alto reconocimiento y con poder ofrecer a sus padres una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Cristian is a talented young man who has realized that his talent provides an opportunity to generate income and help pay for household expenses.  Cristian plays various instruments and performs concerts for his customers.  Thanks to the good service he provides, Cristian is recognized in his town and this has enabled him to attract many customers and have good sales.  The main difficulty he faces is the large amount of competition in his town.  For this reason he is studying to develop his abilities and provide better service.  Since he is not from a family with significant financial resources, he has to rent speakers for his concerts.  Cristian would like a loan to be able to purchase professional speakers, so that he can offer high quality service to his customers.  He hopes that he will then be able to manage his money better, because he won't have to rent speakers every time he has a concert.  His dreams are to be recognized for his work and to be able to provide his parents with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase professional speakers so that he can offer high quality service to his customers.

loans.name: Margarita Maria

texts.es:
Margarita es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre querer ofrecerle un bienestar a su familia. Margarita se encuentra casada y es madre de 4 hijos, quienes son la motivación para esforzarse en su trabajo diariamente. Margarita, al igual que su esposo, trabaja como empleada en una finca cercana a su casa, y gracias a esto contribuye con la generación de ingresos para su hogar. Anteriormente, Margarita tenía en una parte de su casa un cultivo de legumbres con lo que generaba ingresos extras para su hogar. Debido a circunstancias adversas se vio en la obligación de dejar a un lado su cultivo y dedicarse a su trabajo como empleada en la finca. Con el ánimo de reiniciar su cultivo de legumbres, Margarita aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de semillas, abono, riegos y fertilizantes, de modo que pueda reiniciar el cultivo de legumbres en su casa. 
Margarita espera que de esta manera pueda volver a generar ingresos extras y así ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Además, Margarita espera poder ofrecerles a sus hijos el acceso a una educación universitaria y brindarles una estabilidad económica. Margarita sueña con que su cultivo crezca y pueda conseguir muy buenos clientes, de modo que en un futuro pueda tener unos ingresos más seguros.
texts.en:
Margarita is a person who is known for being very hard-working and always wanting to provide for the well-being of her family. Margarita is married and is the mother of four children, who are the motivation for her to strive every day in her work. Margarita, like her husband, works as an employee at a farm near her house, and thanks to this she contributes to the income of her household. In the past, Margarita had a vegetable plot at her house, with which she generated extra income for her household. Due to adverse circumstances, she was forced to give up her cultivation and work at her job as an employee at the farm. With the spirit to re-establish her vegetable cultivation, Margarita hopes that a loan will offer her the possibility of purchasing seeds, compost, irrigation, and fertilizers, so that she can re-establish the cultivation of vegetables at her house.

Margarita hopes that in this way she can return to generating extra income and thus offer her family a better quality of life. In addition, Margarita hopes to be able to offer her children access to a university education and provide them with economic stability. Margarita dreams that her crops will grow and she will be able to find many good customers, so that in the future she can have some more reliable income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, irrigation, and fertilizers so that she can re-establish the cultivation of vegetables at her home.

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es: Eusebia,de 40 años de edad,ella se dedica a la venta de sandalias desde hace 5 años,y tambien a parte de eso ella tambien se dedica a la venta de pollos los dias Jueves y domingos en la plaza municipal de su comunidad,nos cuenta que esta muy agradecida primeramente con Dios y con Kiva porque a sido de mucha vendicion en su vida y en su familia Kiva a sido parte de su superacion personal y de los logros que ella a alcanzado en su vida,es por eso que ella sigue trabajando con kiva porque parte de sus sueños aun le faltan por cumplirse, solicita este nuevo credito para la compra de mas mnercaderia en calzado de sandalias de diferentes diseño y tamaños,para poder surtir las nececidades de sus clientes,el sueño mas grande es darles lo mejor a sus hijos para que tengan un mejor futuro,espera que sus metas puedan ser alcanzadas y hacerlas realidad con el apoyo de kiva.
texts.en: Eusebia, who is 40 years old, has been selling sandals for five years, and as a part of this she also sells chickens on Thursdays and Sundays in the municipal plaza of her town. She tells us that that she is very grateful, first to God, and to Kiva because it has been a blessing in her life and in her family. Kiva has been part of her personal achievement and successes that she has achieved in her life. It is for this reason that she continues working with Kiva, because part of her dreams has still not been accomplished. She is applying for this new loan to purchase more merchandise, sandals in different designs and sizes to be able to stock the needs of her customers. Her greatest dream is to give the best to her children so that they have a better future. She hopes that her goals will be reached and made a reality with the support of Kiva.

loans.use: to buy more sandals to sell.

loans.name: Guy Edmond

texts.fr:
Client de 49 ans, marié et père de 4 enfants dont tous sont scolarisés,il ya de cela 6 ans, considérant les charges de sa famille , il ouvre une boutique de vente des CD ,DVD et quelques appareils de musique.
Ce client a deja bénéficié de plusieurs prêts de Hope.

 il a fait des grands progrès dans le processus de remboursement du prêt,sa vie familiale a largement changée, ses enfants sont dans une école privée,il a largement agrandi son activité et ses  recettes ont largement évolués et épargne a chaque remboursement.


Avec le nouveau prêt, il va renforcer le stock et acheter des stocks des CD ,DVD, cassettes et quelques appareils de musique.

A l'heure actuelle, il a commence la vente en gros des CD et DVD qu'il fait commander a l'étranger et approvisionne les autres fournisseurs du meme secteur que lui et ses étalages sont fournis de toute qualité de marchandises
Tres Optimiste , il veut aller loin dans , ouvrir un grand dépôt et s'occupe de la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This borrower is 49 years old, married, and the father of four children, all in school. Given his family responsibilities, he opened a shop 6 years ago to sell CDs ,DVDs and other music devices. He has already obtained several loans from Hope.

His ability to repay his loans has improved considerably. His family life has changed, with his children now enrolled in private school. He expanded his activity, his revenue has increased substantially, and he regularly adds to his savings. 

He will use his new loan to stock up on CDs, DVDs, tape cassettes and other music devices.

He has started to sell CDs and DVDs wholesale. He orders the goods from foreign suppliers, and sells to other retailers in his area. He offers merchandise of all qualities.

A very optimistic person, he wants to go far in his business and plans to open a large warehouse. He provides for his children’s tuition.

loans.use: to buy CDs and DVDs for resale.

loans.name: Laurentine

texts.fr:
Cliente de 46 ans, celibataire avec 4 enfants, il y'a de cela 16 ans, elle se lance dans la vente des sandales enfants et dames.
Elle a deja bénéficié de 3 cycle de prêts, elle a eu des grandes succès dans la réalisation de son entreprise , elle a fait  des épargnes considérables  et il a rembourse effectivement ses prêts sans  difficultés.

A l'octroi de son nouveau prêt, elle va renforcer le stock des sandales en plastique pour enfants et dames,et elargir son commerce dans le sens de vendre aussi en gros chez certains détaillants. 
 Tres entreprenante,elle continue a épargner et elle a l'intention d'ouvrir une boutique des chaussures , avec ses benefices, elle prend soin de ses enfants et assure leur scolarité
texts.en:
Laurentine is 46 years old and a single mother of four children.  Sixteen years ago she began selling children's and women's sandals.  She has already had three loan cycles and has been very successful in her business.  She has made considerable savings and paid back her previous loans without difficulty.

With her new loan, Laurentine will increase her stock of plastic sandals for children and women and expand her business by also selling wholesale to certain retailers.  Very enterprising, she continues to set aside money with the intention of opening a shoe store.  With her profits, she cares for her children and pays for their education.

loans.use: to buy women's and children's sandals.

loans.name: Parviz

texts.en:
Parviz is a 45 year old man, married. He has three children. He is a very hardworking and kind person. He has been involved in buying and selling food products for more than 9 years. During these years he has gained skills and knowledge to run his business successfully. 

Parviz started his business with his own money and he has a store. He has regular customers because he brings in fresh products. His father helps him with the business. He sells candies, beverages, detergents, butter and other food products. His monthly income is 320 AZN.

Parviz is requesting an 1800 AZN loan to refill his working capital and to add more shelves and displays for products as well as to buy more food products. This is his third loan and he has positive credit history.

loans.use: to buy shelves and food products.

loans.name: Vasif

texts.en:
Vasif is a 58 year old man. He is married and he has four children. He is a market vendor and sells different kind of products like candies, cookies, sausages and other items.  He has 8 years of experience and knows his business very well.

Vasif is a hardworking, smart and kind person. His shop is located in a well-traveled place. Because he has many regular customers, Vasif always brings in and sells fresh products. Food products are in very high demand, especially candies. He delivers his products from a neighboring city, and resells for a more profitable price. Vasif`s monthly income is 350 AZN. His wife helps him to run the business. 

Vasif is requesting a 1500 AZN loan to increase his working capital, develop his business and expand his product selection. He will increase his capital in order to provide good living conditions for his family and meet his children's needs. Vasif has good credit history and this will be his second loan.

loans.use: to buy and diversify food products.

loans.name: Sanan

texts.en:
Sanan is a 31 year old man. He is married and has two children. He has been in the business of buying and selling auto parts for six years. His family is big and it's not easy to provide for a large family. 

The buying and selling of auto parts brings good profit, but because there are different makes of cars he has to buy the parts for all kinds of vehicles. His son helps him to run the business and his monthly income is 300 AZN.

Now Sanan wants to get a loan in the amount of1000 AZN to stock up on the variety of his products.

loans.use: to purchase and diversify more car spare parts.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel, de 31 años, es madre soltera vive en su propia casa junto a su apreciada hija Nicol de 03 añitos a quien le brinda mucho amor y cuidado. Ella se dedica a la atención de su tienda desde hace 02 años, este establecimiento esta ubicado en el Hospital de la ciudad de Kimbiri. Desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana Maribel se dirige a su puesto de ventas para  realizar su limpieza que es lo más importante antes de atender a sus clientes y después va acomodando sus productos. A inicios solo vendía golosinas; pero los trabajadores del hospital le pidieron que venda jugos porque a veces iban sin tomar desayuno o se quedaban en el turno noche; siendo así ella entabló a poner a su negocio como una fuente de soda donde puede ofrecer de todo. Es así que atrajo mas clientes. Ella trabaja sola,  de esa forma puede ver el sustento para su pequeña hija a quien desea brindar una mejor calidad vida. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, se compromete a ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago. Agradece a su banco comunal por trabajar con socios responsables y solidarios. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará frutas y otros productos que requiera su fuente de soda.
texts.en: Maribel, 31, is a single mother who lives in her own home with her precious daughter Nicol.  Nicol is 3 years old, and she provides her with a lot of love and care.
