Maribel has a store where she has worked for 2 years that is located in the hospital of the city of Kimbiri.  From the early morning hours, Maribel is at her sales post.  She starts the day cleaning, which is important to do before she will tend to her customers, and then later arrange her products.  At the start, she only sold candy, but the hospital workers asked her to sell juices, because at times they go without breakfast or they have to stay for the night shift. So she set up a soda fountain where she could offer all of these products, and in this way she attracted more customers.  She works alone, and this is how she makes a living and supports her small daughter, for whom she wishes to provide a better quality of life.  This will be her first loan with MFP, and she promises to be punctual with her payments.  She is grateful to her communal bank, because she is working with members who are responsible and supportive.  With the 1,000 Peruvian soles she requests, she will buy fruit and other products that she needs for her soda fountain.

loans.use: to buy fruit and other food for her business

loans.name: Nargiz

texts.en:
Nargiz is a 52 year old market vendor. She is married and has two children. Nargiz sells food items, beverages, toiletries, detergents and clothes. She has had this business for the last 9 years. During these years Nargiz has acquired the knowledge and skills required for the business. She is a very friendly and polite person and has permanent clients who always come to Nargiz`s shop to buy something. Her father helps her to sell the products.

Her monthly profit is 230 AZN and he would like to increase her income. From the products she sells, the most popular are butter, macaroni, cookies and sugar and she would like to take direction and purchase more of the items to her shop. For this purpose she has applied for 1000 AZN loan.

loans.use: to buy more food products.

loans.name: Hipolita

texts.es: Sencilla y laboriosa, así es la señora Hipólita, una mujer soltera de 53 años de edad, vive en su propia casa que logró obtenerla gracias a su esfuerzo. La rutina de Hipólita es levantarse muy temprano para dirigirse a su centro de trabajo, que es en los campos de cultivo donde produce plantas de cacao; normalmente ella va sola a su chacra pero en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros quienes le ayudan a extraer los frutos de cacao. Ella comenta que durante 20 años lleva realizando es actividad y que lo mas difíciles no poder evadir con las plagas que aquejan su producción; es por ello que desde que se entero sobre los préstamos de MFP, ahora siempre cuenta con el apoyo de los financistas quienes le ayudan con sus planes de trabajo. Este será su crédito número 15 con MFP y siempre cumple con las cuotas de pago de cada préstamo. Asimismo los socios de su banco comunal la consideran responsable y solidaria. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar abono, productos agroquímicos y contratar a  un peón para que le ayude a realizar el mantenimiento de sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Simple and hard-working, that is Mrs. Hipolita, a single woman, 53 years old, who lives in her own house which she acquired thanks to her own efforts. Hipolita's routine is to arise very early to head for her work location, which is the cultivated fields on which she grows cacao plants. Normally, Hipolita travels alone to her farm but at harvest time, she depends on the assistance of day laborers who help pick the fruit of her cacao plants.

Hipolita comments that for the last 20 years she has been doing this and the most difficult task is to avoid the diseases that afflict her production. That's why ever since she found out about these loans through MFP, she has always counted on this financial help to aid in her work plans. This will be Hipolita's 15th loan through MFP and she has always met her payment schedule for each loan. In addition, the members of her communal bank consider her responsible and dependable. With this 1,000 new sols she will buy fertilizer and agrochemicals, and contract a laborer to help attend to the maintenance of her plants.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and agrochemical products, and to contract a laborer.

loans.name: Higinio

texts.es:
El señor Higinio tiene 78 años de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijos. Desde que era muy pequeño se ha dedica a la agricultura, debido a que su familia ha sido de escasos recursos económicos y él se dedico a trabajar en el campo para ayudar con los ingresos a su familia, por ese motivo no pudo terminar sus estudios en la escuela. La persona que lo motivo y le enseño las actividades agrícolas fue su padre, al cual a pesar de su edad le sigue agradeciendo y desarrollando esa actividad.

Todos los insumos agrícolas, los compra en la ciudad más cercana que esta a una hora de su vivienda, él tiene que esperar por un largo tiempo para abordar el autobús que lo conduce a su hogar.   

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo es para cancelar el alquiler del terreno en donde desea cultivar que son aproximadamente 14,000 metros cuadrados y también para empezar a preparar la tierra para cultivar. De esta manera él tendrá segura la tierra donde va a cultivar más cantidad de maíz y fríjol, mejorando su calidad de vida.

Don Higinio desea continuar trabajando en la agricultura hasta que sus fuerzas se lo permitan y llevar el sustento a su familia, además quiere enseñarles las actividades agrícolas a sus nietos para que ellos se sientan capaces de desempeñarlo en cualquier lugar.
texts.en:
Higinio is 78 years old, married and has three children. He has worked in agriculture since he was very young because his family had limited economic resources and he spent his time working in the fields to help with the family income, for this reason he was not able to finish his studies in school. The person who motivated him and taught him agricultural skills was his father. In spite of his age, he is still working in this activity and thankful that he learnt it. 

He buys all his agricultural supplies in the closest city that is one hour away from his home. He has to wait for a very long time to get on the bus that brings him home.

He requests the loan through Fundación Campo in order to pay the rent of the land that he is working that is aproximately 14.000 square meters and also to start preparing the soil for cultivation. This will improve his quality of life by ensuring his access to the land where he is going to grow a higher amount of corn and beans

Higinio wants to go on working in agriculture as long as he has the stregth to do it and bring the daily bread to his family. Futhermore, he wants to teach agricultural skills to his great children, so that they find themselves able to use them wherever they are.

loans.use: to pay the rent of the land that he is working that is approximately 14.000 square meters and also to start preparing the soil for cultivation.

loans.name: Dioselina

texts.es:
Dioselina es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha podido brindar una buena calidad de vida y quienes son la motivación para esforzarse todos los días en su trabajo. Dioselina ha aprendido la actividad del corte y cepillado del cabello en varios cursos que tomó, los que le han enseñado muy bien a realizar la actividad y gracias a esto su negocio es reconocido por el buen servicio que ofrece. Dioselina tiene su sala de belleza muy bien posicionada, cuenta con un muy buen número de clientes y solo tiene un inconveniente; el salón de belleza se encuentra ubicado en la sala de su casa, y esto ha hecho que tenga que ofrecer sus servicios a todos sus clientes en un lugar que no es del todo óptimo porque la vista no es muy agradable. Con el ánimo de mejorar esta situación, Dioselina busca poder realizarle mejoras locativas a su negocio y de esta manera poder separar con una pared su casa de su sala de belleza. Debido a que Dioselina no cuenta con mucho capital disponible para realizar estas adecuaciones, tiene la esperanza en que un préstamo le brindará la oportunidad de acceder a realizar reformas locativas a su salón de belleza y hacerlo más atractivo para sus clientes.

Dioselina busca que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten, pues tendrá más visitas de más clientes y podrá mejorar su situación económica. Además, Dioselina sueña con ofrecerles a sus 2 hijos una mejor calidad de vida y una buena educación que los prepare para que en un futuro puedan acceder a un empleo que sea bien remunerado.
texts.en:
Dioselina is a single mom and head of household with two children, whom she has always been able to provide with a good quality of life and who are her motivation to make an effort every day at work. Dioselina learned hairdressing in several courses that she took. The courses taught her the skills very well and thanks to this her business is known for the good service that it provides. Dioselina's beauty parlour is very well placed, has a good number of clients and only one issue: her beauty parlor is in her living room. This has forced her to provide her services to all her clients in a place that is not completely optimal since it does not look very nice.

With the intention of improving this situation, Dioselina wants to make improvements to her business and divide her home and her beauty parlour with a wall. Because Dioselina does not have much capital available to carry out the improvements, she hopes that a loan will give her the opportunity to afford the improvements for her beauty parlour and make it more attractive for her clients.

Dioselina is trying with this to increase her income, since this will bring more clients in and she will improve her economic situation. Furthermore, she dreams with giving her two children a better quality of life and a good education that prepares them so that in the future they can have access to a job that is well paid.

loans.use: to make improvements to her beauty parlour and make it more attractive for her clients.

loans.name: Bahram

texts.en:
Bahram is a 32-year-old man. He is a friendly and well-mannered person. He is married and is a loving father of three sons. He has been involved in food sales for more than nine years. These nine years of experience in this field make him a knowledgeable and skilled person.

The food products he sells are very popular among people and are in high demand. His monthly profit from selling food is 350 AZN. His wife helps him with  selling products in the shop. He is a very successful entrepreneur because of his good location, in the central bazaar of his home city.

Bahram would like to increase his sales and invest additional capital. For this purpose, he has applied for 1,500 AZN. He will purchase and diversify into selling additional foodstuffs. This will be his second loan and he has a positive credit history.

loans.use: to buy and diversify into additional foodstuffs.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es: Liliana, de 25 años, es laboriosa y activa, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Jimi de 27 años y sus dos hermosos hijos Jim de 06 años y Kalef de 01 año,  a quienes desea ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida. Liliana es una mujer empeñosa y junto a su pareja, se dedican a la venta de repuestos para carros; hace 06 años que empezaron en esta actividad y comentan que le va muy bien ya que hasta ahora gracias a la buena atención y las mejores marcas de repuestos que venden lograron obtener bastante clientela. Ella vende los repuestos mientras que su pareja repara algunas fallas de los carros; los transportistas no dudan de su trabajo porque les trae buenos resultados por las rutas de viaje que realizan. Este trabajo le es rentable porque diario siempre logran vender un repuesto; pero también tiene sus dificultades, cuando se terminen los repuestos mas solicitados por los transportistas.  Para mas adelante desea en agrandar su mecánica con herramientas de todo tipo y de las mejores marcas que ya ofrece hasta ahora. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP y se compromete  a ser puntual con su cuota de pago. En su banco comunal es una socia muy activa y responsable. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, comprará mas repuestos como rotula, abrazadera, entre otros. Y de esa forma no pueda faltarle en su taller.
texts.en: Liliana, who is 25 years old, is hard-working and active. She lives in her own house together with her partner Jimi, who is 27, and their two beautiful children, Jim, who is 6 years old, and Kalef, who is 1, and to whom she wants to offer a better quality of life. Liliana is a determined woman and, along with her partner, works in the sale of spare parts for cars. They began this business six years ago, and they comment that it is going very well since, up to now, thanks to their good service and the best brands of parts that they sell, they have succeeded in obtaining a sufficient clientele. She sells the parts while her partner repairs some of the failures of the cars. The drivers don't doubt their work, because it brings them good results on the road. This work is profitable because every day they manage to sell a part, but it also has its difficulties, when they run out of the parts most needed by the drivers. In the future they want to increase their mechanical work with tools of all types and of the best brands, which they already offer up to now. This will be her second loan with MFP, and she promises to be punctual in making her payments. In her communal bank, she is a very active and responsible member. With the 3000 PEN, she will buy more spare parts, such as brackets and clamps, among other items, and in this way they won't be lacking anything in the workshop.

loans.use: to buy more spare parts for cars

loans.name: Jeanne

texts.en:
Jeanne, 36 years old, is married and has four children aged between three and 11 years old. Jeanne has eight years' experience selling various goods in her business, such as domestic irons and cables. Her hours of work are from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m.
Jeanne has requested a loan from Kiva lenders to allow her to expand her business by buying various goods, such as domestic irons and cables, to sell. Jeanne would like to satisfy her family's basic needs and be able to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more electronic goods to sell like domestic irons, cables, etc.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es: Sencilla y laboriosa, así es Marcelina una mujer de 58 años que con grandes esfuerzos logró comprar su propia casa donde vive con su esposo Obdulio de 66 años. Marcelina, se dedica a la venta de ropa en su puesto de ventas; donde la mayoría de la gente recurre para ver las prendas de vestir que ella trae exclusivamente de la ciudad de Lima; esta labor viene realizando hace mas de 28 años y ya tiene conocimiento sobre como atraer clientes; durante tanto tiempo a ella le gusto esta actividad que no la dejaría por nada, sin embargo en los momentos que queda casi vacío su negocio empieza a preocuparse por no tener que ofrecer a la gente que visita su puesto; por ese motivo acude a las oficinas de MFP para poder solicitar un préstamo en la que ella pueda viajar a la ciudad y  abastecerse de mercadería en prendas de vestir. Este será su crédito número 09 con MFP, se compromete a seguir siendo puntual con sus cuotas de pago. En su banco comunal es una socia alegre y colaboradora con las opiniones que aportan. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, comprará mas prendas de vestir de la ciudad de Lima.
texts.en:
'Unassuming' and 'hard-working' are words that describe 58-year-old Marcelina who worked hard to buy her own home where she lives together with her husband, 66-year-old Obdulio.  Marcelina's business is selling clothing from her stall where her customers come to see what she has brought back from the city of Lima.  Marcelina has been in this business for more than 28 years and she knows how to attract customers.  She enjoys her work and wouldn't stop doing it for anything.  However, right now her business has almost no stock and she is starting to worry that she will have nothing to offer the people who visit her stall.  For this reason, she has come to MFP's offices to request a loan that she will use to travel to the city and stock up with merchandise (clothing).

This will be Marcelina's ninth loan from MFP and she pledges to continue making her repayments on time.  She is a cheerful and cooperative member of her community bank.  Marcelina will use her 3,000 soles to buy more clothing in the city of Lima.

loans.use: to buy more clothing

loans.name: Boitemir

texts.ru: Бойтемир трудолюбивый и умный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 11 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. Он очень старается расширить свой бизнес для того чтобы получить хорошую прибыль. От ранее полученный займ от «ИМОН Интернешл» он получил хорошую прибыль и расширил свой бизнес. Бойтемир хотел бы получить займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки 3 голов крупного рогатого скота и 600 кг корма для них. Он надеется на вашу доброту и помощь.
texts.en: Boitemir is a hardworking and smart man. He is married and is raising three children. For more then 11 years Boitemir has been reselling livestock. He puts a lot of effort into expanding his herd so that he can increase his profits. Using a previous loan from "IMON International" he has imporved his livestock business and increased his income from it. Currently Boitemir wants to take out a loan of 5000 somoni so that he can purchase three heads of cattle and 600 kilogramms of feed for them. Boitemir hopes for your kindness and support.

loans.use: To buy cattle and feed for them

loans.name: Samat

texts.ru: Самат 49 лет, женат, имеет пятерых детей. С 20 лет занимается производством национальных окон и дверей. Самат и его дети производят национальные окон и двери из деревья на заказ, так как он аккуратно и честно работает, у него много клиентов. На полученную прибыль он сделал косметический ремонт дома и купил автомашину. Так как начинается сезон стройки на полученный кредит Самат хочет закупить деревянные доски. Самат благодарен нашей организации за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Samat is 49 years old, married and has five children. For 20 years he has worked as a woodworker, specializing in production of traditional Tajik windows and doors. Samat and his children make the doors and windows to order and since Samat does the work honestly and with care, he has a lot of clients. Previous profits from his business Samat used to buy a car and improve his house. With the coming of spring the building season begins again and Samat wants to use this loan to purchase wooden boards for his business. Samat is deeply grateful to IMON and Kiva for their financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy wooden boards for production of traditional Tajik windows and doors

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel, 31 years old, is married without children. He works from 7 a.m. until 7 p.m. every day. Emmanuel currently employs two people to help him. He has two years of experience in this business.

Emmanuel has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more water, milk, and juice to sell. With this profit from the loan, Emmanuel will reinvest in his business and pay for medical insurance.

loans.use: To purchase more water, milk, and juice to sell.

loans.name: Carlos Dario

texts.es:
Carlos trabajó durante mucho tiempo para una empresa de fabricación de calzado, y allí conoció la actividad y adquirió la experiencia necesaria. Al ver que su trabajo era muy mal remunerado decidió independizarse y montar su propio taller de calzado, donde pueda tener una mayor rentabilidad y por ende aportar un mayor ingreso para su familia. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, Carlos es muy reconocido en su región, lo que le ha permitido captar muy buenos clientes y tener muy buenas ventas. Carlos ha montado su taller con muy bajo capital, por lo que aún no cuenta con todas las máquinas necesarias y muchos de sus procesos los hace manualmente. Con el ánimo de hacer su trabajo de manera más productiva, Carlos aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina para su taller y de esta manera hacer más productivo su trabajo.

Carlos espera que de esta manera pueda atender a los clientes que ahora, por falta de tiempo, no alcanza a atender. Además, Carlos espera que con mayores ingresos pueda cumplir su sueño de terminar de construir su casa y vivir junto a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos worked for a long time for a shoe manufacturing company, where he learned the business and acquired the necessary experience. As his work was very poorly paid he decided to become independent and start his own shoe shop where he could get a higher return and thus provide more income for his family.

Thanks to the good quality of his products, Jack is well known in the region, which has enabled him to attract very good customers and generate very good sales. Carlos set up his workshop with very little capital, so he does not yet have all the necessary machines and many of the processes are performed manually.

Wanting to manage his work in a more productive manner, Carlos hopes that a loan will enable him to purchase a machine for his shop, resulting in increased productivity.

This way Carlos expects to serve customers that he is today unable to attend for lack of time. Moreover, Charles expects a higher income will enable him to fulfill his dream of finishing to build his house, where he will share a better quality of living with his family.

loans.use: Buy a machine for his shop resulting in improved productivity.

loans.name: Yeny

texts.es: Yeny, es alegre y empeñosa, tiene 30 años; convive con Delfín de 31 años y son padres de su hermosa hija Brithm de 01 añito; juntos viven en su propia casa en la ciudad de Kimbiri. Yeny, es una mujer que trabaja en los campos verdes de su chacra donde produce plantas de cacao; ella junto a su pareja siempre están al tanto de su producción. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros quienes le ayudan a extraer rápido los frutos y después lo llevan comercializar a los centros de acopio donde le pagan muy bien por cada kilo de cacao. Sin embargo le resulta difícil transportar sus sacos de cosecha desde su chacra hasta el lugar donde vende los granos de cacao. Es por ello que estuvo juntando todos sus ahorros para poder comprar una moto taxi y de esa forma tener mucha facilidad de transportar sus sacos de cosecha. Este será su crédito número 06 con MFP, una vez mas agradece a los financistas por seguir facilitándole los préstamos para su necesidad. En su banco comunal es una socia alegre y responsable. Con los ahorros acumulados que tenía y más los 1,000 nuevos soles de préstamo podrá comprar su moto taxi que más necesitaba.
texts.en: Yeny is happy and diligent.  She is 30 years old and lives with her spouse Delfin, 31 years old, and they are parents to their beautiful little girl Briithm of one year.  Together they live in their own house in the city of Kimbiri.  Yeny works in the green fields of her small farm where she grow cocoa plants.  She and her spouse are always up to date with their production.  At harvest time she uses day laborers who help her to pick the fruit rapidly which she then takes to the collection centers for sale. where she gets paid well for each kilo of cocoa.  However it becomes difficult for her to transport her crops from her farm to the place where she sells her cocoa grains.  For this reason she has been getting her savings together for the purchase of a motor taxi so that she can transport her harvest with more ease.  This will be her 6th loan with MFP.  She once more thanks the financiers for making the loans available to her.  She is a happy and responsible member of her community bank. With her accumulated savings and the 1000 new soles from the loan she will be able to buy the motor taxi that she needs.

loans.use: to buy a moto taxi.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria de 48 años, con el gran esmero de su vida, logró comprar su propia casa donde habita sola y se siente feliz por lograr sus objetivos. Hace 05 años que Victoria se dedica a su bodega, situada en su propia casa donde ofrece la mejor variedad de productos que a sus clientes les favorece. Ella siempre con una sonrisa y una buena atención ofrece a sus compradores; lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es que sus clientes se retiren con una sonrisa al saber que obtienen sus compras necesarias para su hogar, como también le es muy difícil el no poder abastecerse de mucha mercadería. Con el tiempo piensa en poder agrandar su negocio ya que siempre esta contando con el apoyo de MFP quienes le ayudan a lograr sus planes de trabajo y de esa forma lograr conseguir una mejor calidad de vida. Este será su crédito número 04 con MFP y siempre agradece por su confianza y promete seguir siendo puntual con sus cuotas de pago. En su banco comunal es una socia alegre como también responsable. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, podrá incrementar mercadería para su tienda como: leche, arroz, azúcar.
texts.en:
Victoria is 48 years old and lives her life with great care. She was able to buy the house where she lives alone and she feels happy to have achieved her objectives. For the last 5 years, Victoria has devoted herself to her general store, which is located in her own house. She offers the best variety of products favored by her customers. Victoria is always smiling and treats her customers attentively. What she likes best about her work is that her customers leave with a smile upon learning that they have obtained the purchases their household needs. On the other hand, it is very difficult to accept being unable to offer more merchandise. 

In time, Victoria hopes to be able to expand her business, availing herself, as usual, of financing from MFP, which always helps her achieve her work plans. In this manner, achieving a better quality of life. This will be Victoria's 4th loan through MFP and she is always thankful for its confidence in her. And she promises to continue being punctual with her payments. In her communal bank, Victoria is a happy member and always responsible. With this 1,000 new sols, she will increase her store's merchandise, especially of milk, rice and sugar.

loans.use: to buy milk, rice, sugar, canned products, and vegetables to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Godofredo

texts.es: El señor Godofredo es un hombre muy responsable, tiene 37 años y vive en su propia casa junto a su esposa y sus tres queridos hijos a quienes desea un buen futuro. Godofredo, se dedica a la producción de plantas de cacao, con este producto lleva trabajando durante 18 años y gracias a ello logró comprar su casa. Todas las mañanas siempre esta pendiente con sus cultivos y en los tiempos de cosecha lleva a los jornaleros para que le apoyen con la cosecha de su cacao. A inicios había muchos problemas por resolver con  sus sembríos como por ejemplo desyerbar las malezas, eliminar las plagas, entre otras. Desde que supo sobre los prestamos de MFP no dudo en acudir a uno de las oficinas para que le ayuden con los problemas que tenia que afrontar; es por ello que desde ese momento siempre cuenta con el apoyo de los financistas para que sus cultivos obtengan buenos frutos y así llevarlas a vender a los centros de acopio de su localidad donde obtiene buenas ganancias por cada kilogramo que vende y de esa manera darles un buen bienestar a su familia. Este será su crédito número 19 con MFP y se siente contento por la confianza que le dan, de esa manera se compromete a seguir siendo puntual con sus cuotas de pago. En su banco comunal es un socio comprometido con sus labores. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar plantas de cacao para incrementar en su parcela y con el resto comprará productos químicos para realizar el mantenimiento.
texts.en:
Godofredo, age 37, is a very responsible man.  He lives in his own house with his wife and their three beloved children, for whom they wish a good future.  Godofredo devotes himself to the production of cacao plants.  He has been working with this product for 18 years.  Thanks to this work he managed to buy his house.

Every morning he is attentive to his crops.  During the harvest he brings in day workers to help him harvest the cacao.  In the beginning there were a lot of problems to solve with his crops.  For example, he had to clear the weeds and get rid of pests, among others.  

Ever since he learned about the loans with MFP he did not hesitate to go to one of the offices to ask for help with the problems he had to confront.  That is why from this moment on he always counts on the support of the lenders in order to get good fruits from his crops.  This way he takes them to sell at the local collection centers where he gets good income for each kilogram that he sells.  This is the way he provides for the well-being of his family.

This will be his 19th loan with MFP.  He is happy about the trust they place in him.  He pledges to continue to be punctual with his payments.  In his communal bank he is a member who is committed to his work.  He will use the 3,000 soles to buy cacao plants to augment his parcel of land.  He will use the rest to buy chemical products to perform maintenance.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants and chemical products.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es: Alexander, de 28 años, es un joven de muchos oficios; vive en su propia casa junto a sus padres, a quienes les agradece por enseñarle lo mejor. Alexander es un hombre de lucro, se esmera por darles un buen bienestar a sus  padres, su labor es trabajar en su chacra donde produce plantas de cacao y coca;  Productos que en su cosecha lo lleva a vender a los centros de acopio de su localidad; lleva trabajando hace 10 años y comenta que son muy rentables en la parte económica que puede solventar con sus gastos. En las temporadas de lluvia no puede ir a sus campos de cultivo porque no se puede trabajar muy bien; pero en ese tiempo alquila un auto para laborar de transportista  desde su localidad hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, es así que él sabe como puede ayudar a sus padres brindándoles una buena estadía. Con el tiempo desea en ampliar sus campos de producción. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, se compromete a ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago para que en otra oportunidad pueda acceder a otro crédito. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles, comprará un terreno donde pueda incrementar más plantas de cacao.
texts.en:
28-year-old Alexander is a young man of many trades.  He lives in his own home together with his parents to whom he is grateful for having taught him the best they could.  Alexander is a productive man who goes to great pains to provide for his parents' well-being.  His business is working on his farm where he grows cacao and coca plants.  When he harvests these products, he takes them to the warehouse centers in his town.  

Alexander has been working for ten years and he says that his crops are very profitable which enables him to cover his expenses.  During the rainy seasons, he is not able to go out to his fields because it is not possible to work them very well.  During these periods, he hires a vehicle and provides transportation services between his town and the city of San Francisco.  This is how he helps provide for his parents.  Over time, Alexander would like to expand the amount of land on which he grows his crops.  

This will be Alexander's first loan from MFP and he pledges to make his repayments on time so that he can access another loan in the future.  He will use his 2,500 soles to buy a plot of land so that he can increase the number of cacao plants he grows.

loans.use: to buy a plot of farmland

loans.name: Karomat

texts.ru: Каромат женщина 49 лет, замужем, имеет четырех детей. Её муж инвалид второй группы, нигде не работает, но помогает жене по хозяйству и уходу за скотом. Она проживает в кишлаке, где все женщины работают в весенне летний сезон на кирпичном заводе. Там они  занимаются укладкой и сортировкой жжённых кирпичей. Она имеет пару коров, у которых не осталось корма и сена для питания, поэтому Каромат решила получить кредит. После того как она откормит своих коров и получит за них хорошую цену, Каромат намерена расширить свой бизнес и закупить еще молодых телят.
texts.en: Karomat is 49 years old, married and has four children. Her husband is disabled and cannot work, but he helps his wife around the house and takes care of livestock. Karomat lives in the mountain village where all the women work in spring at the local brick-making plant by sorting and packaging bricks. She also has a couple of cows who have run out of feed and hey over the winter, so Karomat needs to take out this loan to buy food for them. After Karomat fattens up her cows and sells them for a good price she is planning to expand her livestock business and buy a few calves.

loans.use: to buy feed for livestock

loans.name: Ayaba

texts.fr:
Ayaba est une femme âgée de 33 ans. Elle est mariée å un  maçon carreleur. Ayaba travaille comme revendeuse d’habits depuis 2005. Elle exerce son activité seule dans un marché de la place et s’approvisionne à Lomé. 
Ayaba a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin des habits pour mieux répondre à la demande de la population.
texts.en:
Ayaba is a 33-year-old woman married to a tile mason.  She has worked as a clothing reseller since 2005.  She works on her own in a local market and buys her products in Lomé.  

Ayaba has requested her first loan through WAGES in order to buy clothing to better meet local demand.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Adjoavi

texts.fr:
Adjoavi est une femme âgé(e) de 42 ans. Elle est mariée à un revendeur et a 05 enfants.
Adjoavi travaille comme revendeuse d’alimentation générale depuis 1995. Elle vend au marché et achète à Lomé.
Adjoavi a requis son second crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter plus de marchandises (riz, tomates, huile végétale) pour mieux répondre à la demande de ses clients. Elle veut réinvestir et assurer un assurer un avenir radieux à sa famille.
texts.en:
Adjoavi is a 42-year-old woman.  She is married to a merchant and has five children.  She has been selling food staples since 1995.  She sells in a local market and buys her products in Lomé.

Adjoavi has requested her second loan through WAGES in order to buy more products (rice, tomatoes, vegetable oil) to better meet her customers' needs.  She would like to reinvest her money and ensure a bright future for her family.

loans.use: to buy food staples.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en: Jean, 31 years old, is married and has three children aged between two and nine years old. He sells local drinks from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. every day. He currently employs four people to help him. Jean has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to expand his business by buying more local drinks to sell. He plans to use any profits generated from this loan to satisfy his family's basic needs, to pay his children's school fees and to pay for medical insurance.

loans.use: To purchase more local drinks to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a hot dog cart and ingredients to prepare snacks

loans.name: Kanymzhan

texts.ru: Канымжан 56 лет, вдова, воспитала 4 детей. В поисках источника финансирования для своей семьи, 30 лет назад Канымжан начала свой бизнес в животноводстве со стартовой суммы в 25,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Канымжан, на сегодня в ее хозяйстве имеется одна дойная корова, пять овец, и 1 бычок, что позволяет получать в месяц около 5,000 сом (KGS) от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов.  Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Канымжан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. Доходы Канымжан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Kanymzhan is 56 years old, a widow and raised four children.  In search of a financing source for her family, Kanymzhan started her own business in animal husbandry 30 years ago with an initial sum of 25,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her persistent work, today her business has one dairy cow, five sheep and one bull, which allows her to earn about 5,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and meat products.  In order to further develop her business, Kanymzhan requested a loan in the sum of 40,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep.  She plans to invest the earnings into increasing her livestock headcount further.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Marziya

texts.ru: Марзия родилась и выросла в сельской местности. Мать пятерых детей, муж работает разнорабочим на стройке. Марзия имеет пять коров, но они очень худые и ей для их откорма необходим зерновой корм, который дорого стоит на базаре.Поэтому она решила в кредит купить несколько мешков корма. Сама Марзия работает на заводе по производству кирпичей, по ее словам сезон ее работы начинается с апреля месяца. Хозяин завода платит ей по 25 сомони в день. Взяв все свои планы во внимание, с уверенностью оформила кредит на 6 месяцев.
texts.en: Marziya was born and grew up in the country side. She is a mother of five children and her husband works as a day laborer at construction sites. Marziya has five cows, but they are very thin and to fatten them up she needs grain. Grain is expensive at the local market, but to feed her animals Marziya decided to buy several bags of fodder for them. Marziya herself works at the local brick plant, according to her the brick making season starts in April. The owner of the plant pays Marziya 25 somoni per day. Taking all of her plans into consideration Marziya is confident that she will be able to pay back this loan within six month.

loans.use: to buy feed for livestock

loans.name: Chynara

texts.ru: Чынаре 37 лет. Чынара работает бухгалтером и в качестве дополнительного источника финансирования для своей семьи, занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Чынары, начатое с суммы в 20,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS)  в месяц от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов.  Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Чынара обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Чынара планирует вложить в реконструкцию дома.
texts.en: Chynara is 37 years old. She works as an accountant and supplements her salary by raising livestock for meat and milk sales. Due to Chynara's hard work she has expanded a business started with 20,000 som (KGS) to now yield 10,000 som (KGS) monthly profits. In order to further expand her herd, Chynara has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS). She is planning to use profits from the loan to repair her house.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Kossi

texts.fr:
Kossi est un homme âgé de 34 ans. Il est marié à une infirmière et a 01 enfant.
Kossi travaille comme revendeur de produits cosmétiques depuis 2011. Il exerce avec 01 personne son activité dans une boutique. Il s’approvisionne à Lomé et sa difficulté principale est la mévente.
Kossi a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits cosmétiques( pommade pour le corps, gel douche et autre). Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité et ouvrir une seconde boutique. Il dit qu’avec les profits il prévoit d’assurer les besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Kossi is a 34-year-old man.  He is married to a nurse and has one child.  Since 2011 he has worked as a cosmetics seller.  He works in a store with one other person.  He buys his products in Lomé, and his main difficulty is slow sales.

Kossi has requested his first loan through WAGES in order to buy cosmetic products (body ointments, shower gel, etc.).  He would like to reinvest in his business and open a second store.  He says that with the profits he plans to take care of his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products.

loans.name: Bernard

texts.en: Bernard, 29 years old, is married and has one child who is five years old. He owns a general store where he sells various goods such as shoes, umbrellas and utensils. He has four years of experience in this business. Bernard has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company to purchase various goods such as shoes, umbrellas and utensils to sell. He will use any profits to reinvest in his business and to pay children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more items to sell, like shoes, umbrellas and utensils.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en: Jean is 40 years old and married. He owns a business selling Irish potatoes. This is his third successful year in this business--he is open from 6 am until 9 pm every day with four people to help him. Jean has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more Irish potatoes to sell. With the profits from the loan, he will be able to save for the future.

loans.use: To purchase more Irish potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Jean Claude

texts.en:
Jean Claude is 26 years old and single. He has been selling clothes for two years and works every day from 6 a.m. until 8 p.m. He employs two people to help him.

Jean Claude has requested a loan from Kiva field partner Vision Finance Company in order to expand his business by buying more clothes to sell. He plans to reinvest in his business and save money for his future

loans.use: To purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Hector Dario

texts.es:
Hector es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y siempre querer ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Hector aprendió la actividad de la confección desde hace mucho tiempo, y con esta actividad es que ha generado los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Trabajó durante mucho tiempo en una empresa de confecciones donde adquirió la experiencia, y posteriormente decidió montar su propio taller de confección donde ofrece el servicio de la confección a terceros. Debido a que Hector monto su taller con muy bajo capital, aún le falta comprar algunas máquinas; esto se ve reflejado en las ocasiones que debe dirigirse hacia otros talleres donde le prestan una máquina fileteadora para poder terminar sus trabajos. Con el ánimo de mejorar esta situación, Hector espera que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina fileteadora para poder así ofrecer el servicio completo a sus clientes y poder así captar más clientes.

Hector espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues no tendrá que pagar por arrendar una máquina para terminar sus procesos. Además, como Hector está empezando a sacar su línea propia, esto le ayudará enormemente para poder sacar productos de la mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Hector is a person who is known for being very hard-working.  He always wants to give his family a better quality of life.

Hector learned the sewing trade a long time ago.  Through this business activity he has generated the income needed to support his household.  He worked for a long time for a sewing company, which is where he got his experience.  Later he decided to set up his own sewing shop where he offers his sewing services to third parties.

Because Hector set up his shop with very little capital, he still needs to buy some machines.  This is evident on the occasions when he needs to go to other shops where they lend him a overlock machine to be able to finish his jobs.

With the intent of improving this situation, Hector hopes that a loan will give him the opportunity to buy an overlocking machine.  This way he will be able to offer his customers complete service, and he will be able to get more customers.

Hector hopes that this way his income will increase considerably.  He will not have to pay to rent a machine in order to finish his work.  Also, as Hector is starting his own line, this will help enormously in order to be able to make the best quality products.

loans.use: to buy an overlocking machine in order to offer customers complete service and to get more customers.

loans.name: Sophanny

texts.en:
Sophanny (in the photo), age 38, is single. She lives with her widowed mother in a village about fifteen kilometers form Phnom Penh, the capital city of Cambodia.  

Sophanny is a garment worker. She is applying for her first loan in the amount of $1,000 to purchase a motorcycle to get work because she commutes to work by bike.

loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle for commuting.

loans.name: Seng

texts.en:
Seng, 39 years old, and her husband, Heang, 40 years old (pictured together), live in a village approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 1992 and have four sons and five daughters. Two are garment workers and others attend school.   

Seng and her husband are farmers. Besides farming, Heang also does construction work. 

Seng is asking for her first loan of $600 to buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticides to maintain her farm. She will also use a part of the loan to build a fence around her house.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticides to maintain her farm, and to build a fence around her house.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es: Edgar, de 20 años, es un joven entusiasta  y activo; vive en la casa de sus tíos quienes le apoyan para que pueda salir adelante. Hace 05 meses la municipalidad de Ayna San Francisco solicitaban trabajadores de obra para la elaboración de la pista de esta ciudad; entonces Edgar no dudo ni un poco y se presento donde los ingenieros le dieron la oportunidad de trabajar y poder pagarle muy bien si cumple con su obligaciones de labor; desde entonces él, con mucho esmero se dedica a ser un buen obrero y con las ganancias de su pago,  pueda estudiar tranquilo;  así también estar al lado de su madre. Edgar, comenta que desde que falleció su padre ahora esta al pendiente de su mamita a quien desea brindarle una buena estadía; es por ello que acude a MFP para solicitar un préstamo y poder comprar un terreno donde pueda vivir tranquilo con su adorada madre. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP y se siente comprometido a ser muy puntual con su cuota de pago que mensualmente realizará. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles de préstamo más su ganancia logrará comprar su terreno que tanto anhela y de esa manera vivir tranquilo con su madrecita.
texts.en: Edgar is 20 and is an enthusiastic and active young person; he lives in a house owned by his aunt and uncle, who help support him.  Five months ago, the municipality of Ayna San Francisco called for workers to help construct a new roadway; Edgar wasted no time in applying and was hired for the job which pays well.  Since then he has worked with great effort as a laborer and with his earnings has been able to study and spend time with his mother.  Since the death of his father, Edgar wants to take care of his mother; for this reason he seeks a loan from MFP to buy a plot of land for he and his mother to live on. This will be his 1st credit with MFP and he is committed to prompt repayment. With 2,000 nuevos soles he will be able to buy a plot of land and live happily with his mother.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land

loans.name: Tojimurod

texts.ru: Точимурод трудолюбивый и перспективный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Он занимается предоставлением транспортных услуг. Кроме того одновременно занимается купле- продажей скота. Помимо того он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. В бизнесе он уже 31 лет и набрал достаточно богатый опыт, чтобы успешно продолжать свой бизнес. Точимурод запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки скота и корма для них. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Tojimurod is a hardworking and promising person.  He is married and raising five children.  He is involved in providing transportation services.  Besides this, he is also involved in buying and selling livestock.  Also, he is involved in growing agricultural crops.  He has been in business for 31 years and gained a sufficiently rich experience to continue his business successfully.  Tojimurod is requesting a loan in the amount of 5000 Somoni to buy livestock and feed.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle and livestock feed

loans.name: Rasul

texts.ru: Расул мужчина в возрасте 47 лет, женат, имеет одного сына. Сам дехканин, имеет земельный участок. На этом земельном участке он выращивает земляной орех(арахис) и каждый год получает урожай арахиса. Расул кроме дехканского хозяйства занимается откормом и продажей скота. Покупает скот на Чайрухском рынке скота. Узнав у знакомых из кишлака решил тоже попробовать увеличить численность мелко рогатого скота, баранов и коз.
texts.en: Rasul is a 47 year-old man, who is married and has one son.  He is a dekhan farmer and has a plot of land, where he grows ground peanuts and gathers a harvest of peanuts every year.  Besides farming, Rasul is also involved in fattening up and selling livestock.  He buys livestock at the Chairuh market.  Having learned from village friends, he also decided to try to improve the quantities of small livestock, such as sheep and goats.

loans.use: to buy goats and sheep

loans.name: Abdullo

texts.ru: Абдулло женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и честный человек. Более 15 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. Имеет 4 голов крупного и 6 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Кроме того он занимается выращиваем картофеля и пшеницы, затем полученный урожай продает на местном базаре. Супруга помогает по бизнесу. Абдулло запрашивает займ для покупки крупного рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Abdullo is married and has four children. He is a hardworking and honest man. For more then fifteen years Abdullo has been reselling cattle on the market. He has four cows and six sheep/goats. Aside from livestock, Abdullo also grows wheat and potatoes for sale. Abdullo's wife helps her husband with the farm. Currently they are requesting a loan to purchase more cattle in order to expand their livestock business.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Sina

texts.en:
Sina (in the photo), age 33, is a garment worker. Her husband, Sarit, is 34. They have been married since 1999 and have four children, one son and three daughters, who attend school. .

Sina and her husband grow rice during the rice season. Sina's parents, who are also rice farmers, live with her. The family lives in a village about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Sina is asking for a loan of $1,000 to purchase a water pump, fertilizer and pesticides to maintain her farm.

loans.use: To purchase a water pump, fertilizer and pesticides to maintain her rice farm.

loans.name: Nouch

texts.en:
Nouch (in the photo), age 26, is a taxi driver. His wife, Neang, age 25, is a garment worker. They have been married since 2009 and have just one young son. They live about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Nouch is asking for a loan of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike for his wife to get to work.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike for his wife to get to work.

loans.name: Von

texts.en:
Von (in the photo), age 32, is a taxi driver. His wife, Chanret, age 30, stays at home and takes care of their children. They live in a suburb of Phnom Penh and they have one son who attends first grade. 

Von is applying for his first loan of $500 to repair his taxi which often breaks down.

loans.use: To repair his taxi.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora, es una mujer hacendosa y muy alegre, tiene 44 años y vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Alejandro de 49 años y sus 04 hijos a quienes le desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Teodora es muy empeñosa al tener que  labrar la tierra para sembrar plantas de cacao en su propio campo de cultivo; este actividad lleva realizando hace mas de 18 años con el apoyo de su esposo; a ella le gusta elaborar este trabajo ya que es lo que más sabe hacer y le es muy difícil llevar sus sacos de cosecha hasta los centros de acopio quienes le remuneran buenas ganancias por cada kilogramo de su producción. En los tiempos de lluvia, ella dice que las plagas aprovechan en malograr sus frutos; es por ello que acude a las oficinas de MFP para poder solicitar un crédito que le apoye en mantener muy sanos sus sembríos. Sus planes a futuro es incrementar mas plantas de cacao de este modo sus hijos podrán tener una buena educación. Este será su crédito número 03 con MFP y su compromiso es ser puntual con las cuotas de pago. Asimismo, en su banco comunal es una socia responsable. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, realizará el mantenimiento de sus plantas comprando productos agroquímicos y abono; para ser fumigadas y fertilizadas.
texts.en:
Teodora is a hardworking and very happy woman, 44, who lives in her own house with her husband, Alejandro, 49, and their four children for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life. Teodora  works very hard tilling the land to sow cacao pants in her own fields. She has been farming for more than 18 years with her husband’s help. She enjoys doing this work since it is what she knows how to do best. It is very difficult for her to take her harvest to the collection centers where they pay her a good profit for each kilogram of production.  

Teodora says that during the rainy season, pests take advantage to damage her crops. Consequently she has come to the offices of MFP to apply for a loan that will enable her to keep her fields very healthy. Her future plans are to increase her cacao plants so that her children will be able to have a good education. This will be her third loan with MFP and her commitment is to be punctual in making her payments. In addition, she is a responsible member of her communal bank. With the 2,000 nuevos soles, she will do upkeep on her plants by buying agrochemicals and fertilizer so they will be fumigated and fertilized.

loans.use: to purchase agrochemicals and bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Erkaboi

texts.ru: Эркабой добросовестный и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Более 10 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота и выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Отходы от выращивания сельхозкультур идут на корм скота. Жена помогает по бизнесу, и они вместе дружно работают и старается улучшить свое благосостояние семьи. Эркабой запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки 3 голов крупного рогатого скота и корма для них. А также на остальную сумму хочет купить семян ячменя для посева.
texts.en: Erkaboi is a conscientious and goal-oriented man. He is married and has four children. Erkaboi has been farming and raising cattle for more then 10 years. He uses stalks and leaf leftovers from his harvest to make feed for his cows. Erkaboi's wife helps with the farm and the two work well together to improve their family's financial well being. Erkaboi is requesting a loan of 5000 somoni to purchase three more cows and feed for them. He is also planning to use the leftover money to buy barley seeds for planting.

loans.use: To buy seeds, cattle and feeds for them

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.ru: Ахмад женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Его дети уже взрослые и помогают отцу на содержания семьи. Более 20 лет Ахмад занимается разведением и продажей скота. Имеет 2 голов крупного и 15 голов мелкого рогатого скота, также имеет хорошие условия на содержания скота. Кроме данного бизнеса он занимается выращиванием картофеля. От полученного дохода он намерен расширить свой бизнес. Ахмад запрашивает займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Ahmad is married and a responsible father of two children. His kids are adults and help his father to support the family. Ahmad has been raising livestock for sale for more then twenty years. He has two cows and 15 goats/sheep and good barns to keep his animals. Ahmad also raises potatoes for sale and invests his profits to expand his business. Ahmad is requesting a loan of 3000 somoni to purchase more livestock. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Nuridin

texts.ru: Нуридин женат, ему 38 лет. На воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 17 лет он занимается выращиванием и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Данный момент имеет 2 голов крупного рогатого скота.  Также занимается выращиванием картофеля и пшеницы. В бизнесе помогает жена. Он хочет получить хорошую прибыль. Часть прибыли направляет на улучшения жилищных условий, а остальную часть использует на расширения бизнеса. Нуридин запрашивает займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки 2 голов крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Nuridin is 38 years old, married and has two children. He has been farming and raising livestock for sale for more then 17 years. Currently Nuridin has two cows and also grows potatoes and wheat. His wife helps him with the farm. Nuridin wants to increase his profits so he uses a portion of the income to improve their house, but also expands his business. He is requesting a loan of 3000 somoni to purchase two more cows for his herd.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Olim

texts.ru: Олим женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и честный человек. Более 5 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота, имеет хорошую условию на содержания скота. Кроме скотоводства он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродукции. Жена помогает по бизнесу. Олим хотел бы получить займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки 3 голов крупного и 2 голов мелкого рогатого скота. А также на остальную сумму хочет купить горюче-смазочных материалов, семян ячменя и пшеницы. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Olim is married and has three children. He is a hardworking and honest man. Olim has been farming and raising cattle for five years and has good facilities for the animals. His wife helps manage the farm. Olim is asking for a loan of 5000 somoni to purchase three cows and two sheep. He plans to use the rest of the money to purchase fuel as well as barley and wheat seed. Olim hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Victor

texts.ru:
Виктор просит предоставить ему кредит на закупку печатной продукции, канцтоваров и сувениров. Предыдущий кредит был также потрачен на расширение ассортимента, что привело к получению дополнительной прибыли.
Виктор оптимистичен и целеустремлен. Он хочет развивать свой бизнес дальше для того, чтобы содержать свою семью, которую он сильно любит.
texts.en: Victor is asking for loan to purchase newspapers, magazines, office supplies and souvenirs. His past loan also went for the same purpose which has resulted in improved profits for Victor. Victor is optimistic and goal-oriented. He wants to further improve his business so that he can support his family whom he loves dearly.

loans.use: to restock items for sale

loans.name: Stanislav

texts.ru: Станислав женат, имеет маленькую дочь. Вот уже три года, как Станислав занимается выращиванием ранних овощей – помидоров, огурцев, редиса. Раньше он жил в большом городе на востоке Украины. Но там стало трудно с работой. Поэтому Станислав переехал в Каменку и начал свой бизнес. Сегодня у Станислава есть три большие теплица, а также две маленькие теплица для выращивания рассады. Дохода вполне хватает для того, чтобы содержать свою семью. Станислав планирует развивать свой бизнес дальше. Он просит предоставить ему кредит для установки отопления в теплицах. Это поможет ему получать более ранний урожай и соответственно большую прибыль.
texts.en: Stanisav is married and has a young daughter. For the last three years Stanislav has been growing early vegetables - tomatoes, cucumbers and radishes. Previously Stanislav lived in a big city in eastern Ukraine, but there was little work to be found there. That is why Stanislav moved to Kamenka and started his farming business. To this date he has three big greenhouses and also a few small ones for growing seedlings. His profits are enough to support his family but Stansilav wants to expand his business. He is requesting a loan to install heating in his greenhouses. This will allow him to get an even earlier harvest and bigger profits.

loans.use: to install heating in greenhouses

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Назире 31 год, замужем, воспитывает двух дочек 5 и 2 лет. В поисках источника финансирования для своей семьи, в 2006 году Назира начала свой бизнес в животноводстве со стартовой суммой 12,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Назиры, на сегодня  ее хозяйство приносит около 2,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. Для дальнейшего расширения своего бизнеса, Назира обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коз. Доходы Назира планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Nazira is 31 years old, married, and is raising two daughters who are 5 and 2. While looking for a source of income for her family, Nazira started her own livestock business in 2006 with an initial sum of 12,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Nazira's hard work, today her business earns around 2,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of meat and dairy products. In order to continue growing her business, Nazira has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to purchase goats. Nazira plans to invest her profits into further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Vuqar

texts.en:
Vuqar is a 42-year-old man, married with three children. He is a very hardworking, dedicated person. For the past 5 years, he has worked selling office supplies in the market. Two or three times a month he gets his goods from the city's central market.

In addition, he sells toys and perfumery. His wife helps him with his business. The key to his success is his friendliness to customers. Vuqar`s customers are school children and their parents, which require particular attitude. His monthly income is 300 AZN.

Vuqar would like to get a 1,500 AZN loan for to purchase and office supplies and toys in order to expand his business. This will be his 2nd loan and Vuqar has a positive loan history.

loans.use: to buy office supplies and toys.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more cassava flour.

loans.name: Sylvestre

texts.en:
Sylvestre is 27 years old and is married with one child who is one year old. He owns a business selling various goods such as: soap, lotions, soft drinks (fanta, juice and water), biscuits, etc. This is his fifth year in this business and he works from 7am until 6pm every day.

Sylvestre has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase various goods such as: soap, lotions, soft drinks (fanta, juice and water), biscuits, etc., to sell. With any profits, he will be able to save for his future and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To purchase various goods such as soap, lotions, soft drinks (fanta, juice  and water), biscuits etc to sell.

loans.name: Dolly

texts.es:
Dolly se encuentra casada y es madre de 4 hijos a quienes siempre les quiso ofrecer una buena calidad de vida. Debido a circunstancias adversas en su vida, Dolly no pudo ofrecerle a sus hijos una educación universitaria, o una estabilidad económica suficiente para progresar como ellos querían, sin embargo, siempre les ofreció lo mejor que estaba a su alcance y lucho fuertemente para poderlos sacar adelante. Dolly desde hace aproximadamente 1 año montó una papelería debido a que por problemas de salud tuvo que renunciar a su empleo. Como debía seguir generando ingresos con los cuales contribuyera junto con su esposo a la generación de ingresos para su hogar, Dolly montó su negocio el cual puede atender en la disponibilidad de tiempo que ella tenga y no tiene que estar al cuidado de una responsabilidad con un jefe. El negocio de Dolly es una papelería, miscelánea donde ofrece a sus clientes una variedad de productos con los cuales pueden satisfacer sus necesidades. Con el ánimo de aumentar la cantidad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes, Dolly espera que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de papelería como cuadernos, lapiceros, cartulinas, entre otros.

Dolly espera que de esta manera pueda hacer más atractivo su negocio para los clientes y así generar mayores ventas. Dolly sueña con ofrecer empleo en su negocio para las personas más necesitadas y a su esposo y a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dolly is married and the mother of four children, to whom she has always wanted to offer a good quality of life. Because of adverse circumstances in her life, Dolly was not able to provide her children a university education or sufficient financial stability for them to progress as they would have liked. However, she always provided the best she could afford, and struggled hard to help them succeed.

Dolly set up her stationery store approximately one year ago, due to the fact that she had to quit her job because of health problems.  She had to continue generating income, so that together with her husband she could contribute to the household income. So Dolly set up a business that she can run in the time she has available, and not have to be looking after job responsibilities and have a boss.  

Dolly's business is a stationery and notions store, where she offers her customers a variety of products to satisfy their needs.

With the intention of increasing the quantity of products she offers her customers, Dolly hopes that a loan will give her the chance to purchase paper products such as notebooks, pens, poster board and other goods. Dolly hopes that this way she can make her business more attractive for customers, and generate higher sales. 

Dolly dreams of providing employment in her business for the people who need it most, and of giving her husband and children a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy stationery products such as notebooks, pens, and poster board.

loans.name: Leonidas Q

texts.es: Trabajador y muy empeñoso es el señor Leonidas, de 38 años, vive en su propia casa a base de madera; con la señora Santa de 30 años y son padres de 05 hijos a quienes desea brindar un buen bienestar. Leonidas, es un hombre muy responsable y se preocupa por la felicidad de su familia; lleva 28 años realizando la actividad de labrar la tierra para luego cultivar plantas de café, producción que tiene más de 02  hectáreas.  En tiempos de cosecha siempre cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos y de jornaleros quienes le apoyan en la extracción de sus frutos. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder sacar una buena ganancia con los productos vendidos en los centros de acopio, lugar donde compra su cosechas, así logra tener dinero para el sustento de su familia. Por otro lado Leonidas acude a MFP para que pueda abrir una tienda de abarrotes  para su esposa, mientras él labora los trabajos de su chacra. Sus planes a futuro es hacer crecer su producción con más plantas de café y así darles una buena educación a sus cinco hijos. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP; se compromete a ser muy puntual con sus cuotas de pago ya que tiene en cuenta que si es cumplidor, podrá acceder a otro crédito. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, comprará insumos como: arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche, entre otros. Así podrá abrir la tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Leonidas, 38, is very hardworking. He lives in his own home, a wooden structure, with Sra. Santa, 30, and they are the parents of five children for whom he wants to provide a sense of well being. 

Leonidas is a very responsible man and is concerned about his family’s happiness. He has spent 28 years tilling the soil to cultivate coffee plants and has 2 hectares (about 4.94 acres) under production. At harvest time, he always relies on the help of his children and day laborers to help him extract the seeds from his coffee plants. What he most enjoys about his work is being able to earn a good profit from the products sold at the collection centers, a place where they buy his harvest so that he will have money to support his family.

Leonidas has come to MFP in order to be able to open a grocery store for his wife, while he continues to farm on his plot of land. His future plans are to increase his production with more coffee plants and thus provide a good education for his five children. This will  be his first loan with MFP and he is committed to being very punctual with his payments, since he is aware that if he is trustworthy, he will be able to apply for a future loan.. With the 3,000 nuevos soles, he will buy supplies such as rice, sugar, noodles and milk among other items. Thus, he will be able to open the grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, noodles and milk.

loans.name: Yekaterina

texts.ru:
Екатерина занимается выращиванием ранних овощей в теплицах. Она уже пользовалась кредитными средствами для постройки небольшой теплицы для рассады. В этот раз Екатерина просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 15,000 гривен для закупки семян, пленки и удобрений. 

Екатерина раньше жила в городе. От родителей в наследство остался дом в селе. Продавать не захотела, поэтому переехала и начала заниматься сельским хозяйством. Екатерине нравится этот бизнес. В планах на развитие - постройка еще 4 теплиц. У нее большая семья - трое взрослых детей и 6 внуков. Все живут рядом большой и дружной семьей.
texts.en:
Yekaterina grows early vegetables in greenhouses. She has previously used the lending system to build a small greenhouse for seedlings. Currently she is requesting another loan of 15,000 griven to purchase seeds, plastic foil and fertilizer. 

Yekaterina used to live in the city, but she inherited a house in the country from her parents. She chose not to sell the house but to move and start a farming business. Yekaterina likes being a farmer. In the future she plans to expand her farm and build four more greenhouses. Yekaterina has a large family - three children and six grandchildren. They all live nearby and are a large and very friendly family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, plastic foil and fertilizer

loans.name: Tolkun

texts.ru: Толкун 43 года. В качестве основного источника финансирования для своей семьи, в 2007 году Толкун начала заниматься животноводством. Начатое с кредита компании «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS)  в месяц от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов.  Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Толкун обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку одного теленка и минеральных удобрений. Доходы Толкун планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Tolkun is 43 years old. In 2007 Tshe started a livestock business and now it is the main source of income for her family. The farm was started with a 30,000 som (KGS) loan from "Bai-Tushum and partners" and currently it yields 10,000 som(KGS) monthly profits, mainly from meat and milk sales. To expand her business further Tolkun has again turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 40,000 som(KGS) which she will use to buy another calf and fertilizer. She is planning to use profits from this loan to further expand her herd.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Zhurabek

texts.ru: Журабек трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Более 6 лет он занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Он хочет расширить свой бизнес для того чтобы улучшить благосостояние семьи. Журабек запрашивает займ в размере 2500 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений и горюче- смазочных материалов. Он надеется на вашу доброту и милосердие.
texts.en: Zhurabek is a hard-working and driven person. He is married and is raising four children. For over 6 years, Zhurabek has been growing crops. He would like to expand his business in order to improve the well-being of his family. Zhurabek is requesting a loan of 2500 somoni to purchase mineral fertilizers, as well as fuel and lubricants. He is hoping for your kindness and compassion.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de salir adelante le han permitido superar las dificultades y continuar progresando al lado de su familia. Edgar es padre soltero de 3 hijos, pues la madre de sus hijos los abandonó hace un tiempo. Debido a que tenía que empezar a generar mayores ingresos con los cuales pudiera sostener los gastos de su hogar, Edgar decidió montar su negocio donde ofrece bebidas y licores a sus clientes. Edgar tuvo un tiempo de muchas crisis, pues su municipio tenía influencias de grupos armados, lo que hacía que sus ventas fueran muy bajas durante un gran tiempo. Gracias a su fortaleza pudo salir de esta dificultad y actualmente sigue atendiendo su negocio y generando los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Debido a que el refrigerador donde guarda las bebidas de su negocio se encuentra en un estado donde ya requiere ser remplazado, Edgar busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de un refrigerador para poder guardar sus bebidas, debido a que el refrigerador que tiene actualmente ya requiere ser reemplazado. 
Edgar espera que de esta manera pueda generar mejor atención a sus clientes, pues podrá ofrecer bebidas frías que hace un tiempo tuvo que dejar de ofrecer. Además, Edgar espera que con ingresos extras pueda ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Edgar is an individual who has had to go through a great deal of adversity in his life. However, his desire to succeed has allowed him to overcome difficulties and continue moving forward with his family. Edgar is a single parent with three children, as the children's mother abandoned them some time ago.  

Because he had to start generating greater income to be able to support the household expenses, Edgar decided to set up his business, where he sells drinks and alcoloholic beverages to his customers. 

Edgar had a time with many crises, as his town fell under the influence of armed groups, which for a long time made his sales very low. Thanks to his fortitude, he was able to get through that difficult time, and now he continues to run his business and generate the income he needs for his household. 

Because the refrigerator where he stores his business's drinks is in a condition where it needs to be replaced, Edgar is seeking a loan that will offer him the chance to purchase a refrigerator for storing his drinks, because the refrigerator he has now needs to be replaced.

Edgar hopes that in this way he can serve his customers better, as he will be able to offer cold drinks, that he had to stop selling some time ago.

In addition, Edgar hopes that with the extra income, he can offer his family a better quality of life and greater opportunities for progress.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator for storing his drinks, because the refrigerator he has now needs to be replaced.

loans.name: Gavhar

texts.ru: Гавхар кредитуется в Арванде с 2006 года. Она торгует конфетами и кондитерскими изделиями.Гавхар имеет клиентов не только с Таджикистана, но также есть клиенты с Киргизии, среди них есть постоянные клиенты. Она торгует на рынке около 15 лет. Раньше в бизнесе помогал муж, но к великому сожалению  месяц назад ее мужа скончался.В связи с этим   она почти 2 недели не выходила на рынок. Не смотря на своё горе  Гавхар необходимо продолжить реализацию своего товара. Недавно она построила  небольшой ларек, где будет торговать в холодное время года, для этого она получила кредит, чтобы расплатиться за постройку нового ларька.
texts.en: Gavhar has been receiving loans from Arvande since 2006. She sells candy and cookies and has clients not only from Tajikistan, but from Kyrgyzstan as well, many of them regulars. Gavhar has been selling sweets for more then 15 years. Her husband used to help her manage the business, but he has passed away recently. Due to her husbands death Gavhar didn't come to the market for two weeks. But despite her grief, she has to continue managing her business. Recently she built a new market stall where she can sell candy during the winter. Gavhar's loan was taken out to pay for the construction of the stall.

loans.use: for expansion of place of business

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор любящая мать,имеет 3 детей.Из за неблагоприятных условий в районах,она не могла получить соответствующее образование,поэтому она нигде не работает.Чтобы хоть как то улучшить условия жизни,она дома занимается откормом скота. Ее муж уехал со своими братьями в Россию на заработки, и каждый месяц присылает деньги, но заработанные деньги они тратят только на нужды первой необходимости.  Она попросила брата, что бы он помогал ей в купле продажи скота. Гулбахор сама ухаживает за скотом а  дети помогают при покупке корма. Она хочет увеличить поголовья скота, для этого ей необходимы деньги, поэтому она обратилась к нам за поддержкой.
texts.en: Gulbahor is a loving mother of 3 children. Due to adverse conditions in rural areas, she was unable to receive proper education and so is unemployed. In order to somehow improve her living conditions, she raises livestock at home. Gulbahor's husband has left with his brothers to find work in Russia and sends money every month, but this is only sufficient for bare necessities. Gulbahor has asked her brother to help her with the purchase and resale of livestock. She tends to the animals herself, while her children help when purchasing fodder. Gulbahor would like to increase the size of her herd, and so has turned to MDO Arvand, LLC for support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia Bibi is 27 years old.  She is married and has three children. All of them are enrolled in local school and are getting their education.

Razia sews clothes for her community clients. She has a great love for her work and uses her creativity in sewing beautiful clothes. Due to her good quality work, she receives regular orders every month.

Razia has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s plastic bag-making business. He uses plastic beans in making plastic bags, which he sells to different shops in the market.

With the help of loan, he will buy plastic beans in bulk quantity, which will allow him to make a larger quantity of plastic bags, increasing his sales and profits.  He has been operating his business for many years and Razia is confident about his business success after investing the loan.

loans.use: To buy plastic beans for her husband's business making plastic bags.

loans.name: Thou

texts.en:
Thou (pictured here), age 29, is a widow with one young daughter. She lives with her parents in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. Her mother stays at home and her father is a horse cart driver. 

Thou is a garment worker. She is requesting her first loan of $1,000 to replace the walls and wooden stilts of her house, because they are old and break.

loans.use: To replace the old walls and wooden stilts of her house.

loans.name: Sarom

texts.en:
Sarom and her husband live in a village about 25 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 2002 and have two daughters.

Sarom is a lotus farmer who transports her crop to sell at the market. Her husband, Voeun, is a fisherman and assists his wife in her farming. In addition, the couple also raise fish at home to sell.
