In the past Sarom had taken a loan through Kiva to purchase a motorbike. However, she was only able to afford a secondhand motorbike that was old and didn’t work well, so Sarom sold it. She is now asking for another loan to add to her proceeds from selling her old motorbike in order to purchase a new one. She will also use a part of the loan to buy fish feed.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike and fish feed.

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru: Мавлюда  43 года, любящая мать 4 детей.  Она получает первый кредит в нашей организации. Получает кредит  для увеличения поголовья скота. Живет она с родителями мужа, планирует построить  свой дом, так как растут у них дети и им пора отделяться. Для этого ей необходимо увеличить свой капитал. В бизнесе помогает муж, поддерживает всячески, разводить и перепродавать  скот. Также она торгует молоком и молочными продуктами. Ее клиенты это соседи, знакомые и родственники. Она благодарна за поддержку от КИВА, также благодарна. что может  улучшить свои условия проживания.
texts.en: Mavluda is 43 years old and a loving mother of four children. She is taking out a loan from Kiva for the first time. Mavluda is planning to use the loan to purchase more livestock for her herd. She currently lives with her husband's parents but is planning to build their own house as her children are growing up and it's time to live as separate families. In order to finance the purchase of a house Mavluda needs to save money. Mavluda's husband also helps with the livestock business as best as he can - he raises and sells livestock with her. Mavluda also sells milk and dairy products on the market. Her clients are her neighbors, acquaintances and relatives. She is very grateful for Kiva's support and hopeful that she will be able to improve her living conditions with this loan.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru: Дилбар замужем, имеет 3 детей. Она с мужем с 2007 года занимались откормом скота. Муж сезонно ездит в Российскую Федерацию, и каждый раз присылает деньги ей. Дилбар ни где не работает, поэтому у нее есть время ухаживать за скотом, продавать молоко и молочные продукты, а также продавать шерсть коз. Так она поддерживает прибыльность своего хозяйства. В настоящий момент ей необходимо прикупить скот, для этого она получает кредит  в "Арванде"
texts.en: Dilbar is married and has three children. She has been raising livestock with her husband since 2007. Her husband also seasonally leaves to work in the Russian Federation and always sends money back home. Dilbar does not work anywhere, but she takes care of livestock and sells milk and dairy products as well as goat wool. Wool and dairy sales allow her to keep her business profitable. Currently she needs to purchase more animals for her herd and has turned to Kiva for a loan.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Munira

texts.ru: Рахмонова Мунира  1972 года рождения, замужем  у нее есть двойня и одна дочь вышла замуж. Она работает продавщицей в ковровом магазине уже 4 года. Первый кредит получила для   покупки холодильника, все кредиты, которые она получала у нас использовала для улучшения условия своего дома. Ее муж тоже работает в этом же магазине, охранником.В связи с ухудшением здоровья Мунира решила приобрести кредит. За финансовую поддержку она благодарна  Арванду.
texts.en: Munira was born in 1972, she is married and a mother of twins. One of her daughters is married. Munira has worked as a sales woman at a rug store for four years. Her husband also works at the store as a guard. She took out her first loan to purchase a fridge and has used all the other credits to perform home improvements. Due to her failing health Munira has asked for another loan. She is very grateful for financial assistance from Arvandu.

loans.use: to finance medical expenses

loans.name: Pulat

texts.ru: Более 4 лет Пулат занимается купле- продажей продуктов питания. Он целеустремленный и трудолюбивый юноша. Имеет собственный магазин. В бизнесе помогает сестра. Пулат хотел бы получить займ для покупки продуктов питания с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу доброту и помощь. Спасибо!
texts.en: Pulat has been selling food for over 4 years. He is a dedicated and hard-working young man. Pulat has his own store, and his sister helps him with the business. Pulat would like to receive a loan to purchase more products in order to expand his business. He is hoping for your kindness and help. Thank you!

loans.use: to buy food products in order to expand his business

loans.name: Manuchehr

texts.ru: Манучехр трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. С детство вместе с отцом он занимался откармливанием скота, и ему было интересно заниматься этим. Когда он вырос он сам начал заниматься купле- продажей скота. Манучехр запрашивает займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Manuchehr is a hard-working and conscientious person. He is married and a responsible father of three children. His wife takes care of the household. Since childhood, Manuchehr has been taking care of livestock with his father and has always enjoyed it. When he grew up, Manuchehr started raising farm animals on his own. He is requesting a loan of 3000 somoni to purchase livestock and expand his business.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Sokhon

texts.en:
Sokhon (in the photo) is 60 years old and sells grocery items. Her husband stays at home. She lives in a village about thirty-five kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has three sons and two daughters. Three are married and live outside the family home, and the others are garment workers. 

Sokhon is asking for a loan of $1,000 to repair her house and build an addition onto it. She will also use a part of the loan to buy additional grocery items for resale.

loans.use: To repair her house and build an addition to it, and to buy additional grocery items for resale.

loans.name: Sangvat

texts.en:
Sangvat (in the photo), age 27, is a house builder. His wife, Tevy, age 22, sells vegetables. She buys vegetables under contract from farmers in her village and sells them in Phnom Penh market. Sangvat is asking for his first loan in the amount of $800 to help his wife’s vegetable-selling business by buying additional vegetables for resale. He will also use a part of the loan to repair the house where he lives. 

Sangvat and his wife have been married since 2007 and they just have one young daughter. The family lives on an island in the Mekong River about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

loans.use: To help his wife’s business selling vegetables by buying additional vegetables for resale, and also repair the house where he lives.

loans.name: Chinda

texts.en:
Chinda (in the photo), age 50, is a weaver, and her husband, Sao, age 52, raises cows at home. They live on an island in the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City, and they have two sons and four daughters. Two of their children are married and live outside the family home, three are garment workers, and another one stays at home.  

Chinda is asking for a loan in the amount of $500 to improve her house by laying and plastering the brick floor and the wall, in order to visually enhance it.

loans.use: To lay and plaster the brick floor and the wall of her house.

loans.name: Roth

texts.en:
Roth (pictured with his sister), age 29, is single and lives with his widower father and sister in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. His father is a farmer. 

Roth is a fisherman. He is applying for his first loan in the amount of $500 to purchase a boat and more fishing nets and to repair the house where he lives.

loans.use: to purchase a boat and more fishing nets and to repair the house where he lives.

loans.name: Narmirat

texts.ru: Нармират женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Более 7 лет он занимается выращиванием и продажей сельхозпродукции. Полученный урожай он продает оптом. В бизнесе помогают старшие дети. Нармират запрашивает займ в размере 2000 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений и горюче-смазочных материалов. Нармират надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Namirat is married and a responsible father of three children. He is a hardworking and conscientious man. Namirat has been farming for seven years and sells his harvest wholesale to distributors. His older children help him with the farm. Namirat is requesting a loan of 2000 somoni to purchase fertilizer and fuel for the planting season. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizer, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Mukhabat

texts.ru: Мухабат 45 лет, замужем и имеет  двух детей. Мухабат работает в кафе и в качестве дополнительного источника финансирования для своей семьи, в 2008 году Мухабат начала свой бизнес в животноводстве с покупки скота на сумму в 50,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Мухабат, на сегодня ее хозяйство приносит примерно 8,000 сом с продажи молочных и мясных продуктов.  Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Мухабат обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. Доходы Мухабат планирует вложить в оплату контракта на учебу для своей дочери.
texts.en: Mukhabat is 45 years old, married and has two children. She works in a cafe and also raises livestock to supplement her salary. Mukhabat started her livestock business in 2008 using 50,000 som(KGS). Her hard work has allowed her business to expand and now Mukhabat makes 8,000 som(KGS) monthly from milk and dairy sales. To further improve her business Mukhabat has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 40,000 som(KGS) to purchase sheep. She is planning to use the profits from this loan to pay for her daughter's education.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Muhiddin

texts.ru: Мухиддину 22 года, он женат имеет сына. Он  занимается откормом скота.У него есть несколько коров.Его жена домохозяйка.Так как некоторые коровы дойные ,чтобы хоть как то помочь мужу она  продает молоко и молочные продукты.Мухиддин не ограничивается только откормом скота в свое  свободное время он делает ремонты помещений в городе по заказу.Его мечта достойно вырастить сына,дать ему хорошее образование.Он живет со своими родителями.Его отец уехал в Россию на заработки и по мере возможности присылает им деньги.
texts.en: Muhiddin is 22 years old, married, and has a son. He raises livestock and currently keeps several cows. Muhiddin's wife take care of the household and, since some of the cows give milk, she tries to help her husband by selling milk and dairy products. Muhiddin does not limit himself to raising livestock, and during his free time performs indoor repairs in the city on request. His dream is to properly raise his son and to give him a good education. Muhiddin lives with his parents. His father has gone to Russia to find work, and sends money when possible.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Somreang

texts.en:
Somreang is a weaver. She is a widow with five sons and two daughters. Three are married, one is a motorcycle repairman, one sells grocery items, one is a weaver, and one is a garment factory worker. They live on an island in the Mekong River, about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh. 

Somreang has asked for a Kiva loan to help with her daughter’s grocery store by purchasing more grocery items. She wants to continue expanding her grocery store.

loans.use: To invest in her daughter's business by purchasing more grocery items for resale.

loans.name: Duo Elim Group

texts.es:
DUO ELIM,
Este dúo está formado por doña Marta Olivia, de 27 años de edad, tiene 1 hija de 5 años, ella es casada y se dedica a la venta de ropa típica y también vende pollo dorado y papas fritas desde hace 8 años, nos cuenta que solicita este crédito para la venta de ropa típica ya que la época escolar empezó y quiere comprar blusas para venderlas además también quiere invertir en su negocio de papas fritas ya que quiere cambiar de estufa ya que la que tiene está un poco viejita entonces quiere mandarle a hacerle unos arreglos y así seguir vendiendo porque ella es la única en su sector que tiene ese tipo de negocio entonces la gente los fines de semana ya la conocen entonces llegan y le compran, también esta doña Lidia del rosario, de 29 años de edad, ella tiene 2 hijos que están estudiando en la primaria, ella vende ropa típica nueva y usada también hace delantales desde hace 7 años, nos cuenta que por allí donde ella vive en su sector, ella hace diferentes costuras que las personas llegan a solicitarles, también ahora ha empezado a elaborar bolsas típicas, para que las mujeres lleven sus cosas, nos cuenta que Gracias a Dios se le han vendido pero necesita comprar material (retazos de güipiles y cortes, ) para la elaboración de las mismas y para ello está solicitando este nuevo crédito. Las dos señoras están confiadas de que fape les pueda seguir apoyando en lo que están solicitando.
texts.en:
DUO ELIM: this duo is formed by Marta Olivia, 27 years old. She has one daughter who is 5 years old. She is married and works selling traditional clothing and also sells fried chicken and french fries. She has done this for 8 years. She tells us that she is requesting this loan to sell traditional clothing because the school year started and she wants to buy blouses to sell them. Furthermore, she also wants to invest in her french fries business because she wants to change the stove since the one she has is a little old. So she wants to send it to be repaired so she can continue selling because she is the only one in her sector who has this type of business. So on the weekends the people already know her and they come and they buy from her.

There is also Lidia del Rosario, she is 29 years old. She has two children in elementary school. She sells new and used traditional clothing and she also makes aprons. She has done this for 7 years. She tells us that in her sector where she lives she makes different types of needlework and people come to ask for them. Also now she has started to make traditional bags, so women can carry their things. She tells us that thanks to God they have been sold, but she needs to buy material (scraps of tunics and shorts) to make them and in order to do that she is requesting this new loan. The two women are confident that FAPE can continue supporting them in what they are asking.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothing to sell.

loans.name: Komla

texts.fr:
Komla est un homme âgé de 35 ans. Il est marié à une revendeuse.
Komla travaille comme revendeur de friperie depuis 2000. Il vend de façon ambulante et achète au port Autonome de Lomé.
Komla a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter de friperies(pantalons, chemises et autres). Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité et assurer un avenir radieux à sa famille.
texts.en:
Komla is a 35-year-old man.  He is married to a reseller.

He has been reselling second-hand clothes since 2000.  He buys his merchandise at the Autonomous Port of Lomé and  resells it door-to-door.

He has requested his first loan from WAGES in order to buy second-hand clothes (pants, shirts etc...).  He wants to reinvest in his activity and provide a bright future for his family.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes (shirts, pants..)

loans.name: Srors

texts.en:
Srors (pictured above) sells grocery items at home. Her husband, Phoem, is a motor taxi driver. They live in a village in a suburb of Phnom Penh City.

Srors asked for a Kiva loan to repair and renovate the house where she lives. She has now completed that project and wants to repair the kitchen where she cooks, so she has decided to apply for another loan in order to make the repairs.

loans.use: To repair the kitchen where she cooks.

loans.name: Sokan

texts.en:
Sokan is 44 years old and her husband, Theng, is 50. They live on an island in the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City and have five children--four sons and one daughter. One has full-time employment, one is a weaver, and the others attend school.   

Sokan stays at home and does housework. The main source of income is her husband’s salary.  He is a policeman. Sokan is applying for a loan in the amount of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike for her husband to get work.   

Photo: Sokan is standing next to the motorcycle which she wanted to buy. She bought it, but she has not paid for it yet. She asks for the loan to pay for the purchase.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike for her husband to get work.

loans.name: Amneh

texts.en:
Amneh is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her son Montaser appears in her Kiva profile photo. Amneh is a 49-year-old woman, a mother with seven sons and two daughters. One of her sons is a worker and another son is a municipality employee; both are getting low salaries, which are not enough to cover the family's costs and the medical expenses. 

Amneh is requesting a loan from FATEN to help her cover the medical expenses for one of her sons, who is suffering from a disease and needs urgent treatment. This will improve Amneh's son's health and allow him to live with the family in better conditions.

loans.use: To pay for her son's medical expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of bananas to sell.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is 40 years old and married with two children. She sells blankets and bedsheets to earn a living. She has been in this business for 10 years and has employed one person. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to educate her children and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy blankets and bedsheets for sell.

loans.use: To buy blankets and bedsheets for sale.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en: Caroline is 26 years old and married with two children. She runs a retail shop to earn a living. She has been in this business for three years and has employed one person. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to grow her business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 80,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sugar, cooking oil, baking powder, and wheat flour to sell.

loans.use: To buy sugar, cooking oil, baking powder, and wheat flour for sale.

loans.name: Dolreen

texts.en: Dolreen is 33 years old and married with two children. She does dairy farming to earn a living. She has been in the business for five years and has employed two people. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 30,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a dairy cow and feed.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow and feed.

loans.name: 13006 Abadahemuka Group

texts.en:
Clementine is 34 years old and married with two children between the ages of 3 and 5 years old. Her business is well organized. In her small shop she sells fruits and vegetables, etc. 

Clementine works from 6 am until 8 pm every day and has five years of experience. She is the president of this group which is called "13006 Abadahemuka" in the local language. In the photo, she is the first person from the right. 

Clementine has requested a loan from Kiva lenders through Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more fruits and vegetables to sell. With the profits from the loan, she will be able to build her own house and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Inshirah

texts.en: Inshirah, 47 years old, is a divorced woman. For four years, Inshirah has been making embroidered traditional dresses to sell so she can afford her living expenses. Now Inshirah has applied for a loan to buy more sewing threads.

loans.use: to buy more sewing thread

loans.name: Afaf

texts.en:
Afaf, 39 years old, is a single lady who lives with her parents.

For six years, Afaf has been working in animal sales. She has a good number of sheep in her barn and she wants to have more. She also wants to buy sheep feed and work on improving the barn. For that reason, she has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to buy sheep feed and more sheep

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy mobile phones and accessories for resale.

loans.name: Hernan De Jesus

texts.es:
Hernan se ha dedicado a la actividad de la agricultura desde que tenía 15 años de edad, gracias a que su padre se dedicaba a esta actividad y así aprendió el oficio de llevar un cultivo. Hernan se encuentra casado y es padre de 1 hijo de 9 años de edad, a quien siempre le ha querido ofrecer una buena educación y una mejor calidad de vida. Gracias a sus cultivos, Hernan ha podido sacar a su familia adelante, y esto le ha permitido al mismo tiempo cumplir los sueños de su familia. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, Hernan tiene muy buen número de clientes, los que le garantizan unas buenas ventas mensuales. Con el ánimo de sacar adelante su cultivo, Hernan busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de insumos para su cultivo como abonos, riegos, insecticidas, plásticos de invernadero, entre otros.
Hernan espera que de esta manera sus cultivos puedan salir de buena calidad y poderlos vender a un buen precio, además que de esta manera podrá generar mayores ingresos para su hogar con los cuales les podrá mejorar la calidad de vida a su esposa y a su hijo y les ofrecerá mayores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Hernan has farmed since he was 15 years old, thanks to the fact that his father had the same livelihood. This is how he learned the skills involved in raising crops.

Hernan is married and the father of a nine-year-old son, to whom he has always wanted to offer a good education and a better quality of life. Thanks to his crops, Hernan has been able to raise his family, and at the same time this has allowed him to fulfill his family's dreams. 

Thanks to the good quality of his products, Hernan has a very good number of customers, which guarantees him good monthly sales. With the intention of getting his crop started, Hernan is seeking a loan that will give him the chance to purchase agricultural supplies for his crop, such as fertilizers, irrigation supplies, insecticides, greenhouse plastic sheeting, and other things. 

Hernan hopes that in this way, his crops will turn out to be good quality, and that he will be able to sell them at a good price. In addition, he hopes that in this way, he will be able to generate greater income for his household, with which he will be able to improve the quality of life for his wife and son, and offer them greater opportunities for progress.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies for growing his crops, such as fertilizers, irrigation equipment, greenhouse plastic sheeting, and other things.

loans.name: Saeed

texts.en:
Saeed is a 50-year-old married man from Irbid, Jordan and a father of two children.

Saeed is looking to improve his family's living conditions. Thus, he is requesting a loan of 1300 JD to purchase new furniture for his home with an aspiration of improving his house and expanding it.

loans.use: to purchase home furniture

loans.name: Rahme

texts.en:
Rahme is a conservative person who is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. Thus, the man in the photo is her husband.
Rahme is a 52-year-old married woman from Madaba, Jordan and a mother of three children.
Rahme is looking to improve her house so she is requesting a loan of 400 JD to do maintenance on it.
Rahme is looking to improve her family's living conditions and increase their living standards.

loans.use: to do maintenance for her house

loans.name: Nidal

texts.en:
Nidal is a 49-year-old man. He is married with eight sons. For the past 13 years, Nidal has run a cafe which offers hot drinks like tea and coffee, in addition to a pool table to entertain customers. This has been a profitable project, but not enough to cover all the family's costs.

Nidal is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing new chairs and tables and another pool table in order to improve the cafe's condition. This will be more attractive to customers and therefore increase sales and improve the family's income.

Nidal is pictured in his cafe.

loans.use: To purchase new chairs and tables and an additional pool table for his cafe.
